title: AlcoDroid Alcohol Tracker
description:
AlcoDroid is an alcohol consumption tracker, drinks diary and blood alcohol content calculator. AlcoDroid helps you get a better handle of what you drink and change your drinking habits. Optionally it also tracks costs of your drinks.

AlcoDroid also provides an estimate of your blood alcohol content (BAC) based on the drinks you've logged, plots your BAC development in a chart and indicates when you get below the legal limit or back to sobriety.

Widgets are available to display your current BAC on the home screen.

Named a Top Alcoholism App of 2015 in Healthline: http://www.healthline.com/health/addiction/top-alcoholism-iphone-android-apps

AlcoDroid also allows you to:
- show, edit and export your drink logbook
- chart your drinking habits daily, weekly or monthly
- display and export daily, weekly and monthly alcohol consumption statistics
- set your drinking goal (e.g. 21 standard drinks per week, SD/w) and see how your drinking matches the goal
- setup your own list of "drink presets" to log your drinks fast
- pin the most frequently used drinks to the main screen to log your drinks by two clicks
- share your status and BAC chart on Facebook, by e-mail etc

Supports US, imperial and metric units. Alcohol intake can be displayed in standard drinks (US, UK, CA, AU), grams or milliliters per week or day.

For feedback and support, visit AlcoDroid on Facebook.

summary: Track Your Drinking
developerAddress:
Domluvilova 569
757 01 Valašské Meziříčí
The Czech Republic
recentChanges: - Storage permissions issue fixed
comments: Brilliant for tracking alcohol consumption. Really useful graph shows how pissed you are now, and information reminds you how useless you may be at your current level. Looking at that has stopped me having one (or more) last drinks when I see the estimated time to sober. The graphic is so striking it even works when you're not sober! I think I'm talking myself into contributing for the pro version! The history graphs and stats are brilliant. Only prob is no export to CSV

Can't recommend this app enough. Interface is a bit complex at first but after a small amount of time it's easy to navigate, this really helps me manage and time my drinks throughout the week, helps me see how much I'm drinking and to be consistent with measurements instead of free pouring. I'd recommend fully! I also love the live time input you can put in to really spread your drink out.

On the whole, I like this app despite its dated UI. What I find really annoying however is the graph showing weekly consumption. I have four 'dry' days a week and my weekend consumption varies between 14 and 21 units. Last Friday, I consumed just 1.42 units but the graph shows 8 or thereabouts. On Saturday, 5.84 units but the graph for that day shows about 42. On Sunday, 11.4 and the graph is off the scale (over 75). Whatever logic is being applied is not user friendly.

Really great app for making it easy to see how much you're drinking and sticking to a limit. My only complaint if you can call it that is I wish it had a cumulative weekly figure rather than an estimate based on previous consumption.

I have used for many years and find it vey useful. Some have complained of inaccurate BAC but if I correctly set up with weight and absorbtion rate it compares very closely to two different breathalysers that I own. To start your week on a Monday, simply enter one dummy drink on a sunday. It will then start new from the next day. Only issue is that if you put a weekly limit in of 14 units and drink 4 units in one day, it shows 200% of target, however weekly & monthly figures correct over time.

title: Sobriety Counter - Stop Drinking (EasyQuit)
description:
"EasyQuit" is a free app that will help you quit drinking immediately or by using a "quit drinking slowly" mode.
It has many motivational features such as the money you save, motivational health statistics about your body and how it improves without alcohol and personal motivations with a reminder function.


Motivational Health Section
★ Countdown timer to watch many aspects of your health improve as a result of your great decision to stop this bad habit.

★ See how much money you saved by not drinking and set a custom treat to buy from your savings.

★ Play a game of memory to distract yourself from the urge to have a drink.

★ "Quit Slowly" Mode with a customised plan and reminders to ease your body into quitting drinking.

★ Write your own personal motivations of why you want to stop drinking alcohol and let the app remind you of them daily.

★ 64 Beautiful Badges for your sobriety time and drinks passed; with congratulation reminders and sharing functionality.

★ 28 beautiful themes to personalise your experience.

★ High level of Privacy. No log in, no collection or selling of your sensitive data like email, password or contacts. Your data is saved locally on your phone.

★ Two awesome widgets to put on your home screen and always see the money you saved by quitting drinking and your time as an alcohol free person.


I hope my sobriety counter app helps you break this habit and stop drinking for good to become a sober healthy person for ever :)

recentChanges:
- added feature to export data to the professional version.
- updated libraries and privacy policy.
comments: I can't express how much this app has helped me! All the things it shows-from money saved to life added to the badges-they are all a great help! I especially love the notifocations when you hit a milestone. I'm on Day 9 and this app is a part of that success!

It's great and easy to use. It's not just a time tracker. It goes through the physical and mental effects from day one to 10 year. We know about hangovers and withdrawals...but do you know about cell regeneration or how long it take the neuron activity to take place? Interesting app. I wish it had an option for more reminders or different types (not just you've been sober now 100 hours...congratulations)

This app keeps track of not just how many days you're alcohol free, but potentially how much money you have saved. The positive benefits to your health. A little distraction game to get you through a hard moment, and a way to track triggers so "IF" you are trying to do deep dives into the WHY of your drinking habits. Totally a neat tool whether you are doing this on your own, with a therapist, or through an organized group.

Terrible app! Too many ads and you can't even use any of the sections such as how long since your last drink. This is supposed to motivate you into quitting slowly yet you can't even select sections such as how many days/ hours sober. Worthless! Uninstalling

Really, really wish the icons for the badges were each different from the last. Takes away from the satisfaction of achievement if they all look the same (for me at least). Otherwise, love the app and you can honestly use it to track any addiction tbh

title: Drizly: Alcohol delivery. Order Wine Beer & Liquor
description:
Get the door. It's the liquor store.™

Looking for your favorite beer, wine or liquor? Wish you could get alcohol right to your door? Don’t schlep to the liquor store. Use the Drizly alcohol delivery app to shop the biggest selection of beer, wine and liquor and get drinks delivered to you. Order from multiple liquor stores at once and compare prices online. 

You can get almost anything delivered. Pizza? Delivery. Groceries? Delivery. Clothing? Delivery. That random store down the street? Delivery. So why walk to the liquor store to shop for beer, wine and spirits, settle for the drinks they have and pay whatever they say? What if you could shop from more than one liquor store, choose the best price and get your beer, wine or liquor brought to you? Now, you can. Drizly’s alcohol delivery service gives you the convenience of mobile ordering, more beer, wine and liquor options and alcohol delivery. 🍺🍷🍸

🌟KEY FEATURES
•Largest Selection: See thousands of beers, wines & spirits by shopping multiple liquor stores at once.
• Price Comparison: Compare prices of alcohol from liquor stores in your area.
• 1-Hour Delivery: Get beer, wine or liquor delivered in under 60 minutes.
• Shipping: Not in a Drizly city? We offer 2-3 day alcohol shipping ANYWHERE in the states of CA, CO, CT,  FL, IL, MA, MN, MO, NJ, NY, NC, OR & WA.
• Easy Payment: Pay with your credit card in the Drizly alcohol delivery app & show ID upon delivery or pickup.
• Top Shelf Service: Have questions about  beer, wine & spirits available in your area? Our customer support team is ready to help.

📱 THE LARGEST LIQUOR STORE IS NOW IN YOUR POCKET

We work with liquor stores to give you the largest selection of beer, wine & spirits at your fingertips. Shop for your favorite bourbon, a new whiskey or champagne, or get the ingredients to make that new cocktail you heard about. 

🏪 WHEN SHOULD YOU USE DRIZLY

Whenever you want your alcohol delivered or shipped. Whether it’s a new bourbon, a favorite champagne or a new liquor for a cocktail recipe, mobile order your drink of choice, and select delivery to your door. Comes in handy when...

• Drinks are running low. Order reinforcements when the drinks are running low.
• Mixing a new cocktail? You focus on the drinks, we’ll provide the alcohol delivery.
• Missed a friend’s birthday?  Nothing quite says, ‘happy belated’  like a delivery of champagne or a nice bottle of whiskey. 🍾
• Need more beer or bourbon for poker night? Save yourself from running to the liquor store & order your drinks instead. 🍻
• Traveling for work? Order beer, wine or liquor to your hotel & never spend an arm & a leg on the minibar again.
• Trying to locate a hard-to-find whiskey? Check multiple liquor stores without taking a step. Select it & order it right to your door.
• Have something to celebrate? Order a celebratory bottle of champagne, or that bourbon you’ve been eyeing. Cheers to you.
• When you want to up your home bar status with a new bourbon, an aged whiskey or a unique wine.
• Now? Yup. Get adventurous & try a new beer, wine or spirit. Or get the goods to your favorite cocktail. Everything tastes better delivered.

🌎 CURRENTLY SERVING:

Drizly is now providing alcohol delivery & shipping in more than 100 cities in North America. Check ‘em out: https://drizly.com/cities

Not in your city? Sign up to hear when we’re bringing the drinks to you. 

Must be of legal drinking age to order from Drizly.

About Permissions:
• Camera: Scan a credit card to add to your account.
• Location: Auto-locate your delivery address. (Can be denied in Android 6.0+)

Love the Drizly alcohol delivery app? Rate us!

You can opt out of interest-based advertising delivered by third parties that follow the Digital Advertising Alliance's Self-Regulatory Principles for Online Behavioral Advertising at https://youradchoices.com/control.

summary: Drinks delivered in under 60 mins! Find new wine, whiskey, craft beer & more!
recentChanges: We fixed some bugs. Yeah, we’re pretty stoked too.
comments: Could not parse result. That is all I get from ordering from this app. Was great, no more. I figured it out. You can put any text into the deliver notes anywhere until after you push the order through. Huge design flaw for you if guest can't check out. Luckily,I work in data, so I think is silly things like testing different parts of the checkout process. Thanks for the quick response! I will change my 1 star to 4 star because it's your response time.

Wow that was so easy. I ordered from a local business, was able to sort and view their inventory, shop by volume, flavor, and type of alcohol. Truly one of the easiest, most enjoyable app experiences I've had in a long time. Filling my cart and checking out was an absolute breeze. I might never go to a liquor store again.

I really appreciate your service, and the only reason I'm rating the app 4 stars, instead of 5, is because the driver location update is really slow. I had a driver waiting outside my door for a few minutes because the app didn't update. I was watching the driver location the whole time and by the time it updated, he had already been waiting. This hinders other customer's delivery times. I don't want to be responsible for someone else waiting for their delivery. Please patch this

Mostly works great. One suggestion I have is this: once you add something to the cart from a store, automatically sort the subsequent search and product listings pages by the items from the same store. Where the items from said store end, add a seperator and a header for items from other stores.

Awesome app, so convenient. Docked one star because sometimes when I'm scrolling it will register a click and open a product page (but that might just be me?) It shows the discount codes on the home page but it would be sweet if it automatically put them into the checkout for you if it qualifies. Other than that I use the app all the time. Also have always had awesome delivery people.

title: My Cocktail Bar
description:
You have alcohol, some beverages and fruits and wonder what cocktails you can make? My Bar is for you. Just choose what ingredients you have and My Bar will show you a list of all cocktails you can enjoy and offer to your friends. 

Check out the screenshots! Features:

★ BROWSE ALL COCKTAILS ★ just a list of all cocktails available. Do you really care about 9000 cocktails other applications offer? Most of them you probably won't like. We include only carefully chosen and most popular cocktails. The cocktails you can make are highlighted, you know that you can make it. For other cocktails missing ingredients are listed.

★ MY BAR ★ all your ingredients in one place. For each one, quickly see what cocktails you can make with that particular ingredients.

★ MY COCKTAILS ★ all cocktails you can make using only ingredients you have. Below that list - cocktails that you almost can make, missing one or two ingredient. You can easily see what exactly you need to add to your bar shelf to expand a list of your cocktails.

★ CUSTOM COCKTAILS AND INGREDIENTS ★ Create your own unique cocktails and add new ingredients.

★ FAVORITE COCKTAILS ★ Manage your favorite cocktails and have them quickly accessible in a separate tab.

★ MANAGE BAR ★ choose what ingredients are on your bar shelf, see how many cocktails are available with particular ingredient.

★ BROWSE BY CATEGORY ★ Select a category to see only IBA official cocktails or shooters etc. For ingredient list select a category to see only strong alcohol, beveragers etc.

★ SEARCH ★ Quick cocktail and ingredient search option.

★ COCKTAIL DETAILS ★ Description, detailed recipe with variations and a list of needed ingredients including garnish.

★ INGREDIENT DETAILS ★ Browse all cocktails with Tequila, for example, quickly see which of these cocktails you can make right now.

★ If you cannot find a cocktail you love, tell us! We will update our cocktail database regularly.

★ Having problems with application? Want a feature we don't have? Contact us at support@mybarapp.com and we will try to help.

★ Don't want any ads? Support our development and get a Pro version. Thank you!

developerAddress:
Paketservice Veit / fairpreis24
c / o Roman Shuvaev - +41779259871 -
Schaffhauserstr. 3
D-79798 Jestetten
Germany
recentChanges:
- Ability to remove advertisements
- Edit or delete any ingredient
- Restore deleted stock ingredients and cocktails in app settings
- New cocktails
comments: Really easy and useful app. Adding new ingredients and creating new cocktail is super easy. The ads are never in the way but $2 is an easy way to say thank you to the developer. I do wish there was a community space to share, search and up vote custom cocktails. Also, a different color scheme, but I'm just being a picky brat by this point. Great app!

Great, simple app for managing my bar. I like that it's not bloated with copies of variations of the same recipes and that I can edit any recipe to suit my tastes. It would be nice if it came with or updated with more ingredients and recipes, while still keeping the bloat down. It's also a little unclear which recipes I created vs which recipes came with the app. Also I'd love to be able to organize recipes into lists within the app. But overall I love this app and I use it all the time! Thanks!

I can't say more! This application is just amazing for new baristas. You can learn everything from here. You could add more non-alcoholic drinks though. The only problem I face is the quality of my drinks. I may know how to mix everything up, but usually whatever I make (and it has fruits in it) usually comes out "thick" and is not easily drunk. It would be interesting to add various general guides and tips, or videos in each drink. Thank you for your work!

It has been super handy and fun to try new cocktails! I also love that it lists cocktails that you would only need one or two more ingredients for, so you know what to buy. I just wish they had a more extensive library or would add more cocktails, there are a few well known ones missing, as well as the more rare ones. Otherwise, I love it immensely!

A great cocktail app to have all your favorite drinks. My only complaint is that there isn't an official "lemon juice" ingredient. I know I can add my own but I would have to change all the cocktails already listed for them to have lemon juice just because they don't have it on there already. This can be a very tedious job. So I would appreciate if the developers can add that on there. Also I love to use the metric system and I would love to be able to use 22.5 ml in the drink recipes.

title: Quit Drinking – Stay Sober
description:
Quit Drinking – Stay Sober helps you to stop drinking alcohol. It contains many inspirational features that helps you to stay away from alcohol and stay sober.

You just need to provide quit drinking date and time, money spent weekly, & drinks per week and you will get sober statistics. You will get daily notifications about how much time you have been sober.

Quit Drinking – Stay Sober App Features: 
* Statistics : App shows sober statistics like time you have been sober, money you have saved from not drinking alcohol, life regained, & number of drinks not drunk.

* Diary Note : You can add diary note to record your number of urges for drink and your mood during the day, and short description / note about whole day.

* Quit drinking reasons : You can add reasons for quitting alcohol. So, whenever you have urge to drink alcohol, read these reasons and feel strong toward your quitting alcohol decision.

* Treats : You can add treats, and can purchase from money you have saved from quit drinking.

* Health Stats : It shows how your body and health improves as long you have been sober. It also shows progress of your body and health improvement. You can also share your health improvement to your friends or family.

* Tips to quit drinking : There are some tips given that helps you to quit drinking and stay motivated.

* Trophies / Badges : You can achieve trophies on Sober time, money save, life regained and number of drinks not drunk. 

We hope that our app helps you to quit drinking, stay sober and make your life and family happier. 

Use Quit Drinking – Stay Sober and Take firm determination to quit drinking right now. Stay Sober and Stay Motivated!!

summary: Helps you to quit drinking with stats like sober time, money save, life regain.
recentChanges:
** In app purchase refund issue solved
- Shows stats Time Sober, Money Saved, Life regained, and number of drinks not drunk.
- Features like Diary note, Treats, Health statistics, Tips to quit drinking and Trophies helps to stay motivated.
- Daily notifications about how much time you have been sober.
comments: I absolutely LOVE this app how it tracks time and money and allows me to set goals. Highly recommend!

Great app! Really helps you stay on track and gives you good information on everything, like how your health improves and gives you goals and a diary so you can write what your feelings are and why you quit to begin with. Overall a great app for motivation and staying on track.
As cynical as I may be, it really helps put a smile on my face and helps keep me sober.

I gotta say, I like this. After AA and the hoax virus shutting that down I started drinking again. Im at 5 days which usually 3 i start having issues but with this it shows the money saved, what to expect day by day and a built in journal that you can go look at your entries. If i make it past 2 weeks thatll be the longest sober ive been in years, also it shows health and how long it will take and progress bars so you can get a good idea of what your body is doing healing itself

Find another app! The ads on this are ridiculous. You can't even open the app without playing an ad, and even if you do, you aren't redirected after. There is no way to get the ad off of the screen. I'm completely OK with ads, as long as I'm redirected after, but it took me five minutes just to open it up and see my progress. I grabbed my stop date and am uninstalling.

title: Sober One — Your Personal Drinking Assistant
description:
👀 What can Sober One help with?

😏 Drinking less and controlling yourself

— Take control of alcohol!
— Each day you have a drink, make a note of it on the calendar in Sober One.
— Keep track of how much you drink and how strong your urge to drink is.
— Throughout the month, Sober One will tell you whether you are drinking too much.
— And then, you will decide what to do next.

😎 Quitting for a while or forever

Do it yourself, without an internal conflict, when you are ready.

— Mark your sober days on the calendar and track your progress.
— Sort things out with alcohol. Sober One will help you to better understand why and what for you are drinking.
— Keep track of your mood and important events in the diary. You will notice the impact alcohol has on your mood, and the effect your mood has on your urge to drink.
— Find strength and motivation with the help of Sober One.
— Maintain your determination and sobriety for a long time.
— Learn to enjoy life without alcohol.

What else?

— Learn more about alcohol, health, and healthy habits. You do not have to read a whole number of websites anymore.The editors of Sober One find the most important information and check the facts for you.
— Get advice from our experts and make your life better. 
— Control the level of anxiety and depression. Sober One will tell you when your condition is normal and when it is better to see a doctor.

We are guided by science and evidence-based medicine. The efficiency of the methods underlying Sober One is confirmed by research. The app has been developed with the participation of the experienced doctors and psychotherapists.
 
All of these features are free and will always be available to you without a subscription.
descriptionHTML:
👀 What can Sober One help with?

😏 Drinking less and controlling yourself

— Take control of alcohol!
— Each day you have a drink, make a note of it on the calendar in Sober One.
— Keep track of how much you drink and how strong your urge to drink is.
— Throughout the month, Sober One will tell you whether you are drinking too much.
— And then, you will decide what to do next.

😎 Quitting for a while or forever

Do it yourself, without an internal conflict, when you are ready.

— Mark your sober days on the calendar and track your progress.
— Sort things out with alcohol. Sober One will help you to better understand why and what for you are drinking.
— Keep track of your mood and important events in the diary. You will notice the impact alcohol has on your mood, and the effect your mood has on your urge to drink.
— Find strength and motivation with the help of Sober One.
— Maintain your determination and sobriety for a long time.
— Learn to enjoy life without alcohol.

What else?

— Learn more about alcohol, health, and healthy habits. You do not have to read a whole number of websites anymore.The editors of Sober One find the most important information and check the facts for you.
— Get advice from our experts and make your life better.
— Control the level of anxiety and depression. Sober One will tell you when your condition is normal and when it is better to see a doctor.

We are guided by science and evidence-based medicine. The efficiency of the methods underlying Sober One is confirmed by research. The app has been developed with the participation of the experienced doctors and psychotherapists.

All of these features are free and will always be available to you without a subscription.
summary: Drink less or put alcohol on hold. A tracker, plan, motivation, and support.
recentChanges:
— Improved user onboarding
— Minor fixes
comments: Can't use this. I want to be able to fill out out exact quantities and alcohol percentages. Like 4 16-ounce bottles of 7.5% beers. And a note of the kind of beer too as I suspect specific hops exacerbate my hangovers, want to be able to track that. This would only allow me to document that I drank between 5-6 "units" in this example.
I just started using this app but I think its cool how it gives me daily tasks to read and then even asks questions for me to answer regarding alcohol...
That's exactly what I needed! It's far better than just a journal. The advises and tests they have here are extremely helpful). Love it!

I found this app to be the most helpful in understanding & working through addiction. Unfortunately I cannot open the app but the wonderful dev has emailed me a link to the web view until the connection is fixed. Thank you dev. I would highly recommend this for anyone wanting to understand addiction behaviour & learn some great new insights & strategies for success. It is not a sober day counter, it's more of a help & education toolbox.

Very good app. It's not an app that counts how much money you have saved, or gives awards each day etc. What it does, its explains what is happening, how you got where you are, where you can go etc. Its not a total fix for you, but it doesnt say that it is. Highly recommend, it's a clever clever app.

title: AlcoTrack 🍻📈・BAC Calculator & Alcohol Tracker
description:
No breathalyzer at hand, but you need to know your current blood alcohol level (BAC)? Or do you want to track your alcohol consumption? Get motivated to stay sober? Or to improve your drinking habits and overall health? Try AlcoTrack - BAC Calculator & Alcohol Tracking App rolled into one.

🏆 Featured on xda-developers.com as the perfect Alcohol Tracker for New Year’s Eve.

Are you out with friends and want to know your current blood alcohol level? Do you need a rough estimation of when you are going to be sober again? Do you aim to stop drinking, stay sober, and get a more overall impression of your drinking habit? Do you search another app to add to your "quantified self" or "lifelogging" software stack?

AlcoTrack gives you all of that. The blood alcohol content (BAC) calculator approximately substitutes the breathalyzer/alcohol test. It uses the well-established and scientific Watson formula, taking many individual factors like age, gender, height, and weight into account. Our alcohol calculator app respects drinking times and nutrition and visualizes the BAC metabolism in a line chart. Go get a grip on your alcohol consumption habit! 

FEATURES
★ Presets 🍺🍷🍸: Quick access to your favorite drinks like certain beers, cocktails or wine varieties
★ Intuitive, Slick Interface: Follows Material Design guidelines and provides two themes (including an AMOLED-friendly dark mode)
★ Line Chart 📈: Understand your blood alcohol content metabolism 
★ Detailed Stats: Analyze your alcohol consumption and expenses looking at different time frames (weeks, months, years)
★ Achievements 🏆: Motivate yourself to limit your drinking behavior by completing the next challenge
★ Notification Widget: All information at one glance & quick access to the alcohol calculator
★ Drinking Diary 📒: Look at previous sessions from the past
★ International Units: All relevant units for size, weight, fluids, etc.
★ Reminders 🔔: Never forget to keep track of your drinking
★ Fun Features: Random alcohol facts, beer trivia, etc.
★ Scientific 🔬: Takes many individual factors like age, gender, height, and weight into account

DISCLAIMER
AlcoTrack: BAC Calculator & Alcohol Tracker is a drinking diary app to track your alcohol consumption, analyze your drinking behavior, and, ultimately, to estimate your blood alcohol content (BAC). Please note that since your BAC is depending on many individual factors, this app can only give you a rough orientation. AlcoTrack cannot replace a breathalyzer. In case of doubt, you should never drink and drive. I do not assume any liability for the correctness of the results.

Formerly known as AlcDroid.

recentChanges:
Please: I urgently search for someone to complete the Spanish translation of AlcoTrack (which is already halfway done).

New:
- Romanian translation
- Automatically hide stats for values that not tracked
- Remember the selected stats time frame

I am regularly spending my free time on improving the app and implementing new features. If you ever have any suggestions or problems regarding AlcoTrack, don't hesitate to get in touch with me. I am always happy about feedback.

comments: Very easy to use app. Charts are clear and informative.
Excellent Tracker. Simple interface. 👍

When the Medicare/Medicaid advertisement shows up you can't get out of it, it will NOT show an "X" to get out of it, so you can't get back to your BAC level or inputs. A scam when it makes it a requirement to go to an ad that you don't apply to. I've restarted my phone numerous times and it still pops up and won't show me my inputs or BAC level 😩. I was happy initially, but that soon faded as a random healthcare ad shows up and you can't get out of it. Piss poor job to say the least.

Unfortunately you can only track one person at a time. No way to create separate profiles. A bit selfish (irresponsible?) to track yourself, while not being allowed to assist your drinking companion(s). Uninstalled.
Really good app, helps keep my drinking in check when out with the boys and no breathalyzer in hand. How easy it is to go way higher than you think you are and think your fine. Quite eye opening.

title: Sober Time - Sober Day Counter & Clean Time Clock
description:
Sober Time is a sober day counter with a built-in community that tracks how long you have been clean and sober.

Start or continue your sober recovery journey: Sober Time's sober day counter is helping thousands of recovering addicts recover from serious addictions like substance abuse, alcoholism, drug abuse or smoking.
Put the power of sobriety back in your hands by tracking your addictions in a beautiful and elegant sobriety counter.

Features
✔ Sober day counter and sobriety tracker
✔ Vibrant and active sober community
✔ Track as many addictions as you want
✔ Daily motivational messages
✔ Tracks money saved
✔ Goals and milestones
✔ Relapse statistics
✔ Share your progress
✔ Fully customizable

Why this sober app works
At the core of sobriety is motivation and a support structure. You'll stay motivated with daily messages, goals and simply watching your sobriety counter tick by. The built-in community provides much needed human connection, allowing you to share and learn from people with years or even decades on their sobriety clock.
This sober app is your personal sober companion. It goes where you go and keeps your clean time counter close to heart.

Our community
Sober Time has a dedicated community page where you can read or discuss anything related to sobriety. Read through the stories of others, ask questions, share your sobriety counter or simply discuss life in recovery. Thousands of members offer valuable advice on how to stop drinking.
Besides the clean time counter, sober recovery is the key and core motivation behind the community. Anyone can join and contribute. See what others have said about topics like drinking and alcoholism, substance abuse or drug abuse. Add your own story and spread the sobriety.
Discuss things like alcohol, substance abuse or simply share your sober day counter.

Make progress and keep it
✔ Keep track of each addiction by setting up an individual sobriety clock
✔ Work towards the built-in clean time goals or set your own
✔ Track statistics, spending habits and savings of addictions you are trying to quit
✔ Full-featured sobriety counter with a sobriety tracker clock
✔ Summarize the time you have been sober down to the second
✔ See how much money you've saved

Stay motivated and inspired
✔ Motivational messages and quotes
✔ Interact with an active community
✔ Daily notifications keep you on the path of sober recovery
✔ Notifications when you reach a clean time counter goal
✔ Share your progress with friends and family
✔ Talk about your alcohol addiction or drug abuse in a safe community environment and stop drinking
✔ Use the progress on your sobriety clock as motivation when things get difficult

Manage your addictions
✔ Track each of your addiction's clean time separately
✔ Customize each addiction with a different sobriety counter, backgrounds, icons and headings
✔ Track any addiction in the sobriety clock: drugs, alcohol, substance abuse, cigarettes (less serious ones like fast food or TV too)

With Sober Time you can track your sobriety and stay motivated wherever you are. Quit drinking alcohol(if you suffer from alcoholism), smoking or any other addiction. It has multiple display options, a powerful sobriety clock and counters, customizable messages and the ability to phone your sponsor or contact at the push of a button.
You can use it to quit smoking or quit drinking alcohol. Stop smoking by tracking how long you have been clean from cigarettes.
The primary goal of Sober Time is to help recovering anonymous addicts and alcoholics recover from their addictions or stop drinking. Most often it's used to track how long addicts have quit drinking, been clean from narcotics, drugs, smoking cigarettes or other addictions.

Get Sober Time now to take control of your addictions, recover and hold on to your sobriety!

recentChanges:
Fixed a major stability bug
Fixed some display bugs
Prepared for launch of new features (coming soon!)
comments: I've had this off and on for a few year's now. I like that this App is easy to use, you only pay not even $3 for full access to the App. I love the Widget showing your sober time. It's an easy reminder of my sobriety and the daily quotes are nice. 🙌💚✌

Seeing progress in a statistical format gives it a bit more foundation to my mind. Numbers can be viewed as 12345 and there is no way to reinterpret "1" or "2" or "3", no matter what what our experience has conditioned us to BELIEVE or what varied cultures teach us, in any language "1" means "1". SO, I progress "1" day at a time!

Most of the time I feel the app has everything as I need. It would be better if the graph in stats be improved. Currently I have mesrly 200+ entries and it is impossible to track my progress with it as the data points are too cramped to conclude any meaning ful information from it. Further, there is scope to add some more insightful representation under this section. Thanks you.

I really love this app! The daily quotes are AMAZING and the fact you can track your sobriety from multiple addictions is exactly what i was looking for. I also really like the goals that you can attain/keep track of since each step feels like an accomplishment. Pay the 2.99 to unlock the entire app as well! You won't regret it!

I thing being able to see the hours and minutes pass was therapeutic, especially the first week which is huge. Just having the reminders and the pats on the back. We don't get enough of that. I guess only reason it's not a 5 is there's not a whole lot to do, but it's free so...

title: Minibar Delivery: Get Alcohol
description:
Minibar Delivery brings the wine & liquor store to the palm of your hands. Order your favorite alcoholic beverages in just a few taps and we’ll magically deliver it to your door, fast! Feel confident shopping the largest selection of wine, beer, liquor, ice, mixers and more at the best prices. Guaranteed.

> Huge Selection: Shop Wine, Beer, Liquor, Mixers, and More!

comments: Am I blind or crazy? Or does this app really not give the option to search by store? There's a store minimum, but you can't search for items from a specific store, so you just have to poke around and hope you find something from the same store. It's absolutely ridiculous. Unless it's just me being stupid and missing it. I'll update if that turns out to be true, but a basic feature like that should be available and be hard to miss.

There always late but at least they come also u should have a reorder option or button instead of always having to add the same things into my cart from previoius order. Lastly we should be able to search the stores and see what they have instead of guessing
Waist of time. This app doesn't deliver in 30 minutes or less. Try 3-5 business days

Looks simple enough, but not only is beer unavailable for delivery to my address, I can't tell where the items will come from. Definitely some liquor stores in my area that I'm avoiding by using this app.

I use minibar on occasion. Mostly for when I'm getting ready to host friends or family and have things to do before they arrive, one being topping off beverage supplies. Minibar let's me get my other chores done while they handle getting any bar supplies. In a larger city this works just fine and the app is fairly straight forward. Would be 5 stars if there was a more intuitive way to tip the delivery staff.

title: Alcohol Factory Simulator
description:
- BUILD THE REAL PLANT -

recentChanges: Bug fixed
comments: The idea is cool but the app itself would need some improvement. UI looks fine but the gameplay is quite boring. First steps need to be repeated for at least a thousand times to get somewhere (e.g. buy improvements). New machines can be purchased via in-app shopping options - at least at the beginning of the game. So after a while, I've lost my interest in spending more time playing with this app. 😥
Paint drying simulator Takes forever to progress, tutorial is poorly done and the game practically forces you into microtransactions unless you want to spend forever doing anything

After playing the game for a while, it becomes extremely repetitive. All I do is to keep on buying ingredients andpass them through the workshop. Also, the graphics aren't good. The animation also too slow that it look like the gaming is lagging.
This game has potential but the way it money making system is backwards we supposed to buy cheep and sell for 3 times as more and why are lives in the game (purple lighting bolts) that's a scam
I love this game but I paid to unlock all the distillerys and it froze....iv had to reinstall the game...i hope it hasnt restarted the distillerys or iv lost money....im not very happy at this moment

title: Daybreak - Alcohol Support
description:
Daybreak helps you change your relationship with alcohol. Whether your goal is to reduce your drinking, or complete abstinence, Daybreak is here to support you and your choice. 

Changing behaviour around alcohol use can be challenging, but you don't have to do it alone. Daybreak is a supportive and non-judgemental space where you can get the information and support you need to help achieve your goal. 

People who use Daybreak say they love waking up without hangovers, feel healthier & have more time to do the things they love. 


------------------------
What this Alcohol Support App Offers:


▌Peer community: a non-judgemental community of people just like you, where you can exchange information and support to help yourself and others with their alcohol behaviour change goals. 

▌Personal Improvement: over 100 suggested activities for you to try, to help with your alcohol behaviour change goal.

▌Anonymous, safe, secure environment: get the support you need anonymously, in a safe and secure environment.

▌Technical and functionality support via our dedicated email address: support@daybreakprogram.org  
 
------------------------
Reasons to Download Daybreak:
 
* Choose from being sober/alcohol-free, reducing your drinking, or maintaining the amount you’re currently drinking. There’s no pressure to stop drinking altogether.

* Learn about the personal triggers that lead to your drinking – Such as work or social pressures, family, relationships, stress, or other mental health challenges and get support with managing them.

* Be Inspired – We often hear members talk about the positive impact that changing their relationship with alcohol has had on their personal relationships, finances, and their emotional and physical wellbeing.

* Professionally informed - App developed in conjunction with mental health professionals.

* Daybreak is designed and developed by Hello Sunday Morning. We are a not-for-profit organisation with over 10 years’ experience using technology to help reduce stigma around alcohol & support people to make the changes they want to make.

---------
Subscription Pricing & Terms:
 
Daybreak is free for all Australians and is funded by the Australian Government, Department of Health.
 
International members will receive the first 21 days for free. After this, they can choose from two auto-renewing subscription options:
Daybreak Short Term Commitment: $12.99 AUD per month 
Daybreak Full Commitment: $119.99 AUD per year

Payment will be charged to your Google Play account at the confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless it is canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. You can manage and cancel your subscriptions by going to your account settings on Google Play after purchase.

For more information about subscriptions and cancelations please see our terms and conditions https://www.hellosundaymorning.org/daybreak-terms-and-conditions/

Daybreak helps you change your relationship with alcohol. Whether your goal is to reduce your drinking, or complete abstinence, Daybreak is here to support you and your choice.

Changing behaviour around alcohol use can be challenging, but you don't have to do it alone. Daybreak is a supportive and non-judgemental space where you can get the information and support you need to help achieve your goal.

People who use Daybreak say they love waking up without hangovers, feel healthier & have more time to do the things they love.


------------------------
What this Alcohol Support App Offers:


▌Peer community: a non-judgemental community of people just like you, where you can exchange information and support to help yourself and others with their alcohol behaviour change goals.

▌Personal Improvement: over 100 suggested activities for you to try, to help with your alcohol behaviour change goal.

▌Anonymous, safe, secure environment: get the support you need anonymously, in a safe and secure environment.

▌Technical and functionality support via our dedicated email address: support@daybreakprogram.org

------------------------
Reasons to Download Daybreak:

* Choose from being sober/alcohol-free, reducing your drinking, or maintaining the amount you’re currently drinking. There’s no pressure to stop drinking altogether.

* Learn about the personal triggers that lead to your drinking – Such as work or social pressures, family, relationships, stress, or other mental health challenges and get support with managing them.

* Be Inspired – We often hear members talk about the positive impact that changing their relationship with alcohol has had on their personal relationships, finances, and their emotional and physical wellbeing.

* Professionally informed - App developed in conjunction with mental health professionals.

* Daybreak is designed and developed by Hello Sunday Morning. We are a not-for-profit organisation with over 10 years’ experience using technology to help reduce stigma around alcohol & support people to make the changes they want to make.

---------
Subscription Pricing & Terms:

Daybreak is free for all Australians and is funded by the Australian Government, Department of Health.

International members will receive the first 21 days for free. After this, they can choose from two auto-renewing subscription options:
Daybreak Short Term Commitment: $12.99 AUD per month
Daybreak Full Commitment: $119.99 AUD per year

Payment will be charged to your Google Play account at the confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless it is canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. You can manage and cancel your subscriptions by going to your account settings on Google Play after purchase.

For more information about subscriptions and cancelations please see our terms and conditions https://www.hellosundaymorning.org/daybreak-terms-and-conditions/
summary: Change your relationship with alcohol - with professional & community support.
developerAddress: Level 3, 487 Elizabeth St, Surry Hills NSW 2010
recentChanges: - New integrations for attribution
comments: I used to utilise HSM alot. I do prefer how that was set out with goals and the ability to check in weekly on how you felt, why and how you dealt with it etc. Was good to track that and have somewhere to state it. Now it seems to be just comments and threads and moat comments back seem to be very generic comments. Don't find it too helpful anymore which is a shame!
UX needs to be enhanced. But this is still an amazing app filled with amazing people
Keep getting invalid email address after I just signed in AND reset my password. Too annoying! Uninstalling. I need this app, please, please fix it.
Great experience with a supportive community aiming to change its relationship with alcohol!
Really helpful! I've learned a lot and am excited now to kick the drinking habit.

title: 7NOW: Food & Alcohol Delivery
description:
Get alcohol, food, candy, snacks, drinks, ice cream, grocery, health needs and more delivered anywhere you are in about 30 minutes. 7NOW delivers over 3000+ items including Slurpee® and Big Gulp®, pizza and sandwiches, and even beer, wine, and liquor (where available, 21 years or older of course) across 43 major metro areas.

$7 OFF YOUR FIRST ORDER + FREE DELIVERY
Use Promo code 711TREAT
Offer valid through 3/31/21. Get a $7 off promo code on your first delivery purchase made through the 7NOW App with minimum purchase of $7. Consumer pays all applicable sales taxes and fees.$1.99 small basket fee may apply if $15 minimum purchase requirement is not met.Cannot be combined with any other offer or discount. No cash value. Non-transferable. Limited delivery area. Void where prohibited. 7-Eleven, Inc. reserves the right to modify, change or cancel this offer at any time.

GET WHAT YOU WANT DELIVERED
Choose from a selection of over 3000+ items and counting. We have Beer, Wine, Liquor, Snacks, Food, Candy, Ice Cream, Baked Goods, Frozen Foods, Grocery, Household, Health, Personal Care, Mobile Gadgets and School & Office Supplies.

DELIVERY ANYTIME.
Don’t want to leave your home or office? Having a party, or friends are over, and need some last minute items? Have a late night craving? No worries! Get your order delivered to your door 24/7.

SUPER FAST DELIVERY
Stay in the moment and don’t worry, we got your back and will deliver your food, drinks, and more in about 30 minutes. Now that’s super fast!

ACTIVE IN MOST MAJOR US CITIES
7NOW is currently available in over 200 cities across 43 metro areas including Austin, Baltimore, Boston, Charlotte, Charlottesville Chicago, Colorado Springs, Dallas, Daytona, Denver, Detroit, Elkhart, Fort Collins, Fort Lauderdale, Fort Worth, Fresno, Hartford, Jacksonville, Kansas City, Lansing, Las Vegas, Los Angeles, Miami, Milwaukee, New Haven, New York, Norfolk, Orlando ,Philadelphia, Phoenix, Pittsburgh, Portland, Portsmouth, Providence, Sacramento, Salt Lake City, San Antonio, San Diego, San Francisco, Santa Barbara, Seattle, South Bend, St. Louis, Tacoma, Tampa, Tucson, Virginia Beach, Visalia and Washington DC. We are adding new cities and locations frequently so continue checking in with us.

7NOW PINS
Beach day cravings on the sand—you got it. Last minute tailgating supplies at the stadium—done. For moments that deserve delivery, we’ll bring your items wherever you need them. Introducing 1000s of 7NOW Pins where we can deliver right to you, including parks, beaches, venues and more.

FLAT DELIVERY FEE
We charge a flat, low delivery fee to make things easy and simple for you.

NO MINIMUMS
Order as little or as much as you want. A nominal small basket fee may apply on your order.

PAYMENTS MADE EASY
Apple Pay, Credit Card, Debit Card. Major Credit Cards: Visa, American Express, MasterCard, Discover. All transactions are 100% digital, no need for cash.

REAL TIME ORDER TRACKING
Want to know where your order is? Track your order and receive notifications.

PROVIDE FEEDBACK
Have a favorite 7-Eleven item that you can’t live without? Located in a city that we haven’t expanded to yet? Let us know! We are listening and want to give you everything your heart and stomach desire. You are our number one priority! Yes, you there.

recentChanges: Bug fixes and enhancements to improve your 7NOW experience.
comments: App frequently forgets the apartment number, even after having saved it multiple times, forcing me to either double check with each order or risk having to hunt down a lost driver. Document scanning is next to worthless, and either can't process images or simply won't scan them at all. App loads slowly--it can take minutes even on decent hardware. The app also does not retain information from the website version, even on the same account, despite being able to do so through the app across multiple devices. Other than that, this is a decent app--far better than some others I've found on the Google Play store. It just needs some polishing to work more consistently (and to work better with lower-end tablets and phones).

The app was working fine until several weeks ago, when I began receiving a B10000 error, unable to authorize payment. It's never been fixed, so I guess it's a permanent issue and I won't be able to use 7now on my phone anymore. It's a shame because I liked the convenience, but it seems they got to it and blocked my ability to purchase. Scumbag gangstalkers that are in every city now, harassing millions of people for no reason. If you're being gangstalked ahead of this election, may you have the power to kill your stalkers! Kill these demon gangstalkers! Their families too! Kill them all!

Don't ask for the customer to go through the motions of entering their payment information and then automatically default to a card number associated with their device. It's creepy and irritating. The most important part of an app like this is the payment portion. It said the card didn't work but charged it twice. Now I have to wait for said charges to fall off in the next 7 days. So stupid for that much stress.

Needs a lot of work. Can' accurately rate this; I never ordered anything after 90 minutes of frustration. It took forever to load, and 3 tries to enter my address. The location button didn't work, and then manually entering spat out a random address across town. Finally, success... Only to find nothing I get from 1 or 2 local stores besides the awful pizza that is $2 more than Little Caesars. While waiting the eternity for it to load, I checked the PC version. "Check app for cigarettes". No info

Can't scan DL and order buttons for beer not highlighted making it impossible to order. Also, can't change your mind once you click on something even BEFORE you check out. Prices online are different than on app and store itself. Deals offered on app are on items that can't be ordered. Free delivery code on app is false.

title: Alcohol Factory
description:
In Alcohol Factory Sim game you can make a variety of drinks and sell to colorful customers. Build your alcohol empire and become an "alcoholic" tycoon; try to stay sober in the process. :)

Boys and gals get ready for hootenanny; moonshine and booze is in the still, and the 100 proof alcohol is in the factory. 

Beer, vodka, tequila, cider, vermouth, absinthe, schnapps, liqueurs, schnapps, pepper vodka, absinthe and more.

title: Saucey: Alcohol Delivery
description:
Alcohol delivery in minutes. No delivery fees or order minimums. Just the beer, wine, spirits, mixers, snacks, ice, and party supplies you need, delivered to your front door posthaste. Because instant gratification is underrated 😜 
 
How it works
We’re easy & proud of it. Simply download the Saucey app, create an account, add drinks and snacks to your cart, and your courrier will be there shortly. 
In the meantime, tell your sweatpants you’ve got something special planned for the two of you 😍
 
Free delivery & no minimums
Because we’re not a regular booze delivery app, we’re a cool booze delivery app 💅 
 
Good occasions to use Saucey

Work was the worst. Or the best. Either way, you did work today & you deserve a drink 🎉
There’s a sports game on the TV, and oh boy do you love sports! 🏈
It’s date night and firing up the liquor delivery app is your love language 🥃
Unslumping Hump Day is only achievable via a wine delivery app 🍷
Your party guests are drinking like gosh dang fish and you need to re-up 🐠
You’d get off the couch and go on a beer run if you could, but you literally cannot 🍻
You need to send someone a gift, and liquor delivery is universally coveted 🎁
Right now, because those are the rules 🤷🏻‍♀️


Everything you want
Saucey is a beer delivery app. A liquor delivery app. A wine delivery app. An ice cream delivery app. A chips-and-cookies delivery app. An ice delivery app. An ibuprofen delivery app. Saucey’s whatever you want it to be, smartypants. The world is your oyster shooter 🌎
 
All your favorite brands
Tito’s Handmade Vodka. White Claw. Stella Artois. Golden Road. Hennessy. Bulleit. Budweiser. Patrón. Goose Island. Stone Brewing. Grey Goose. Magic Hat. Johnnie Walker. Fireball. Corona. Dark Horse. Casamigos. Blue Moon. All the good stuff 🍷🥃🍾🍹🍻
 

Where we deliver:

New York City
Washington DC
Chicago
Los Angeles
Orange County
South Bay LA
San Diego
San Francisco
East Bay
San Jose
Silicon Valley
Sacramento
Dallas

 
Track your delivery in real-time
The internet.com is simply wild these days. Pull up the app at any time for an update on where you order is. Oh, and heads up: You’ll courrier will need to digitally verify that you’re over the age of 21 with your driver’s license or another form of government-issued ID before they give you custody of any alcohol. 
 
Effortless payment
Enter your credit card info on the app and voilà: we’ll deliver alcohol to wherever you are. Best magic trick ever. Android Pay, Visa, American Express, MasterCard, Discover, and debit cards—it’s all good. And all transactions are 100% digital, because all of our pockets have holes in them 😔
 
Talk to us
How can we help? Our customer support team is aces and ready to help at any time. Text or call us at (213) 204-9608, email us at support@saucey.com, or visit our help center over at help.sauceyapp.com.
 
Let’s do this
Seriously, the magic of alcohol delivery by way of a few taps on your smartphone is so much easier than trying to make friends with an actual magician. We’re the liquor delivery app you’ve been dreaming of 🤩 Let’s take her out for a spin, shall we?

comments: Love the app and the service, deliveries always quick and friendly. Great way to send a bottle to friends or to save a search for a liquor store to stop at on the way to a friend's house. Sometimes app is a bit glitchy to send a gift, constantly erasing phone or address info, only reason not giving it five stars. Also, wish was allowed in more areas for gifting nationwide, but that's a larger problem.

Does not recognize my account but says my phone number is in use. EDIT: Customer service contacted me and solved my problem. I was able to use the app and it works great! Kudos to Customer Service department. *****
After signing up I was unable to log in. Clicked for a password reset, in case I fat-fingered it, which led to a site unavailable page making this app essentially worthless.

Love how fast the orders come. The prices are several dollars higher than what you find in the store. I guess you're paying for the convenience of not having to leave your home. That hasn't stopped me yet. I will keep using this app.

edit: don't download this app. it doesn't work. it would be cool if it did, but it is unlikely that you will receive your order. if your order gets canceled, they will not tell you unless you ask. like, they'll just let you watch a still map, wondering if your order is close. if they completely fail to deliver an order, they'll offer $15 in credit. this would be cool, but since it is so unlikely that your order will actually arrive, the credit is largely ornamental. don't download this app.

title: How much alcohol to drink?
description:
Do you like alcohol? Then this app is for you!
The app can help to measure how much you should drink and the degree of intoxication and the time of withdrawal of alcohol from the body.
The app is made in the Material design style.

The app has the following modes:

1. How much alcohol to drink?

Calculate your individual dose of alcohol before a visit or a party.
Give answers to all questions and you will get a dose which is calculated specially for you!
Enjoy a party without a headache.

2. Calculator of alcohol withdrawal time

- Calculation up to 10 drunk drinks
- Degree of intoxication
- The amount of alcohol in the blood and in exhaled air
- Time of full alcohol withdrawal or up to 0.3 ppm
- Minimum, average and maximum alcohol withdrawal time
- The Widmark formula and others are used for calculation

PAY ATTENTION:
The results of the calculation may be different from the indications of a breathalyzer.
Developers are not responsible for the results of calculations and their consequences.
Don’t drink and drive!

title: Simple Alcohol Unit Tracker
description:
A simple and easy to use alcohol tracker to track drinking and alcohol consumption via alcohol units. This app can help you become more sober which will help you to avoid any long term health issues. 

A alcohol unit is a type of measurement to help someone understand their alcohol consumption/drinking habits. A unit is calculated by the size of the drink, as well as its alcohol strength.
  
This app is suitable for people who:
❖ Become sober overtime
❖ Binge drink on a regular basis
❖ Want to lose weight by drinking less
❖ Live longer by avoiding the long term effects of drinking alcohol
❖ Understand how many UK units they drink over time


UnitTrack: a simple alcohol tracker to track how many they are drinking calculated via units.

recentChanges: - hold  a past day to delete
comments: Does what it says, simple, tracks your alcohol consumption in units, however all drinks and measures set, you cannot include different measures which would be a help, another review says you can add custom drinks, if this is true it needs to be clearer how to do this as I cant see this option, if you have a different size of beer or different alcohol percentage you just have to pick closest, so not as accurate as it could be.

Really useful, makes you realise how much you are actually drinking. Easy to use, and tailor to your own fav drinks. I would like it even more if it gave a top 5 drinks in order rather than just fav only. Also if it had an average analysis of drinks per day as it does so for units. The analysis side is rather lacking, which is odd for a tool that's meant to help the person analyse and realise their true drinking habits.

Great app, would love if you could order the custom drinks yourself so you could put your most used/favourite drinks at the top. Would also be nice if there was a reminder for if you forgot to press submit and we're about to move close the app.

3 weeks experience so far. Used on Lenovo tablet using android. Wanted an app that would easily add up my units pw so l can compare with UK government rec'd amount. Drinks vary so much in strength and this app allows you to enter it as it is! This it did very well ....but it has lost all my data twice. Thank you very much for reply, l don't know any other app that does the job l want.
It's good. Except it has a circle round your average weekly units total which means you can't read the number!

title: Alcofy - Alcohol Tracker and BAC Drink Calculator
description:
You can add drinks to this application in real time to see how drunk you are and how drunk you will be the next hours until you become sober. The app calculates your estimated BAC (blood alcohol concentration) based on a formula that has been studied and praised in scientific papers.

You can set a limit on how drunk you want to become, and the app will warn you if you are about to cross that limit.

In order for the app to be as precise as possible, you will be given a choice to enter information such as your gender and more. Please note that the BAC given in this app is just an assumption and it might not be relevant to you since many factors can play a part in how drunk you actually are, such as how much you have eaten before drinking. However, there is a parameter supplied within the app where you can tweak the formula slightly.

summary: Track alcohol consumption - Get BAC - See when you'll become sober - History
recentChanges: Supports relative BAC measurements for the whole world (including Europe, America and Asia) You can set a limit on how drunk you want to be and the app will help you stay below that limit. The app uses a professional formula where you will be able to track your BAC (blood alcohol content) in real time. You will get information based on your BAC and you can add your custom information.

Very useful app!! Helps you check if you are sober enough to drive. 5 stars from me 👍

No option to edit preset, no calnedar to view or edit past alcohol consumption
This is an amazing app and easy to use!!!! I love it!

title: Distiller - Your Personal Liquor Expert
description:
Learn about spirits before you ever spend a cent, so you know you’re making the right purchase.

With a panel of alcohol industry experts writing reviews, and a growing community of spirits fans sharing their own ratings and tasting notes, you’ll never have to guess which whiskey to buy, which mezcal to try, which rum would be good for your cocktail, what bottle of gin to pick up, or which brandy you should give as a gift.

- Thousands of expert reviews of all types of liquor, with new reviews added daily
- Scan barcodes on bottles to quickly get information about the spirit inside
- The Distiller flavor profile on every reviewed spirit shows you what tastes to expect
- Keep track of what you’ve tried by creating Tastes
- Track what you've paid and where you've purchased something
- Get recommendations for what to try next
- Find information on everything from rare bottles to every day staples
- Build your collection and wishlist to keep track of what you’ve tried, and what to try next
- Create your own custom lists of spirits, like playlists of what you love, or what you want to try next
- Easily search, sort, and filter through thousands of original reviews
- Discuss your favorite spirits with other Distiller users, and follow them to see what they’re saying
- Share your tasting notes, recommendations, lists, and favorite spirits to your social networks

With thousands of reviews or whiskey, bourbon, scotch, rye, mezcal, tequila, rum, cachaça, brandy, cognac, pisco, gin, vodka, and everything in between, Distiller is the best app for liquor consumers!

"With expert ratings and thousands of data points, it's like a well-curated music feed, but for booze.” -- Gizmodo.com

"It’s like having one of those snooty liquor connoisseurs on call, in your pocket. Except no annoying mustache. " -- Yahoo! Tech

OK that last one wasn’t real. Lincoln couldn’t be reached for comment so we made it up. The rest are 100% real though!

Say hi or get support at hello@distiller.com!

Learn about spirits before you ever spend a cent, so you know you’re making the right purchase.

With a panel of alcohol industry experts writing reviews, and a growing community of spirits fans sharing their own ratings and tasting notes, you’ll never have to guess which whiskey to buy, which mezcal to try, which rum would be good for your cocktail, what bottle of gin to pick up, or which brandy you should give as a gift.

- Thousands of expert reviews of all types of liquor, with new reviews added daily
- Scan barcodes on bottles to quickly get information about the spirit inside
- The Distiller flavor profile on every reviewed spirit shows you what tastes to expect
- Keep track of what you’ve tried by creating Tastes
- Track what you've paid and where you've purchased something
- Get recommendations for what to try next
- Find information on everything from rare bottles to every day staples
- Build your collection and wishlist to keep track of what you’ve tried, and what to try next
- Create your own custom lists of spirits, like playlists of what you love, or what you want to try next

comments: Great app idea. Nearly everything is listed with loads of informative reviews, with an easy to navigate interface. However, the problems are too prominent to ignore. The app is very laggy, sometimes freezing or crashing upon trying to click on a type of spirit. The search option is also very slow and glitchy, half the time I have to close and re-open the app if I want to search something, since half the time it doesn't work. Great app but definitely needs much more work.

Great way to keep track of your tasting notes and see how your thoughts compare to others. They also have good articles that are very relevant. They need to add to the inventory on some occasions although most things are present.

i last reviewd this app in 2018, gave it 4 stars. im dropping it to 1. ever since theyve incorporated the "premium" where you have to pay, nothing loads. distiller as a whole is very useful, but the app is now trash. stick to the web version.

Great for saving your tastes/faves in one place! Love how it can (for the most part) find different liquors though the beta scanner. Debating on getting the pro version. I'm not anywhere near the connissuers in terms of tasting different flavors of whiskey, but trying to get there.
Good feedback from the community, substantive content, only complaint is the search could be a little more precise. Still my go-to app for booze.

title: SoberTool - Alcoholism, Addiction, Sobriety Help
description:
SOBERTOOL TEACHES YOU HOW TO THINK AND ACT LIKE A SOBER PERSON. AND YOU ARE NEVER ALONE WHEN YOU NEED HELP BECAUSE SOBERTOOL IS RIGHT IN YOUR POCKET! WORKS WITH ANY ADDICTION OR BAD HABIT. Developed by a 30 year sober Harvard educated Licensed Chemical Dependency Counselor and a team from The Ohio State University, this app is based on proven techniques to help you stay clean, sober, and happy. 
Relapse Prevention Support for any addiction at your fingertips. You also get:

* SOBRIETY COUNTER calculates days clean and sober and MONEY saved! 
* REWARDS for the time you have stayed clean and sober! 
* Daily MESSAGES and NOTIFICATIONS to remind you to read them.
* SEARCH ENGINE. Choose one word to describe how you currently feel and it will lead you to answers to deal with those feelings so that you feel better and don't relapse!
* A PROVEN PROCESS TO AVOID RELAPSING! If you have a craving, just answer a few simple questions and you will get an answer TO WHAT YOU ARE CURRENTLY EXPERIENCING. SoberTool changes relapse thinking to recovery thinking. No other recovery book or app is designed to do this. All you have to do is follow its simple prompts to get a reading relevant to where you are right now!  
* COMMUNITY FORUM where you can anonymously share your personal messages, comments and get support from others.
* FUN GAME TO AVOID RELAPSING.
* JOURNALING to allow you to vent feelings and to reflect on your recovery journey.

It doesn't matter whether it's alcohol, food, sex, cocaine, marijuana, gambling, spending, heroin, the internet, or anything else, SoberTool gives you free, immediate help. It actually trains coping skills.There is also confidentiality regarding information you enter because it is stored only on your device.    

THIS APP IS FOR YOU IF YOU:                         
- Are new to sobriety and need an easy tool to beat cravings and triggering thoughts 
  related to alcoholism and addiction.
- Have been clean and sober for awhile but still feel stress.
- Just completed alcoholism and addiction inpatient or outpatient treatment and want a tool to help you with continuing care.
- Want to stay sober for your family, friends or YOURSELF.
- Have struggled staying clean and sober before.
- Want help when you can't reach a Sponsor, support person, therapist, or get to a 12 Step meeting.
- Have had legal or any kind of trouble as a result of alcohol, drugs, or addictive behaviors.
- Must stay sober per an Employee Assistance Program, court system, 
  professional assistance program, employer, school, licensing bureau, etc. 
- Feel stuck in your recovery and want to have fun while staying sober.
- Need help making wise decisions that won't jeopardize your sobriety.
         
This App has also been useful for treatment centers, alcoholism and addiction counselors, psychiatrists, and 12 Step Sponsors for the alcoholic or addict who need a resource for finding answers to common issues experienced by the alcoholic and addict.
Some of the materials contain theories related to cognitive behavioral therapy and 12 Step practice. It also contains slogans commonly heard at 12 Step meetings. Please note this App is not a substitute for alcoholism and addiction treatment and 12 Step meetings!           
	
SoberTool respects your privacy by not requiring you to give any personal information, and having minimal app permissions! SoberTool will not invade your contact list. 
        	
SoberTool helps with alcoholism treatment, addiction treatment, relapse prevention, and alcohol and drug recovery.
           
DISCLAIMER:  None of the information in this App creates a counselor patient relationship or should substitute for any other forms of therapy. The User waives the right to make any claims against  Author for any misinterpretations or any harm claimed from the use of this App. This App is not therapy or treatment.

recentChanges:
Improved accuracy for REWARDS and progress tracking! More pleasing Rewards Page!
JOURNAL to vent feelings and reflect about your recovery!

Intuitive and easy navigation!
comments: I really like this app. The features of being able to express yourself and get feedback from fellow addicts on the road to recovery is great! However, I can't access this feature. It tells me to log in and when I try it kicks me back to the main menu! I know I have an account. It is saved within my Google account! If I am able to login I will change my review!
The daily messages and sheer variety of stories is really helpful to me,as is the stepped categorisation to find a message that works for what you need!
I really enjoy using this app, it's very helpful and inspirational.
Good way to track your length of sobriety and how much money you potentially saved. I'd recommend it.
Sobertool is such a great app it has helped me a great deal. I read the message daily when I wake up. Check out how much I have saved. This is my help through recovery. Thanks

title: Alcohol Check - BAC Calculator
description:
After you enter gender, age, weight and consumed beverages the Alcohol Check app calculates blood alcohol content - BAC and an estimate of how long it will take you to reach zero level of alcohol in blood again. 

The alcoholic beverages can by chosen from the growing database or you can simply create and enter your own drink. 

Disclaimer: 
Blood alcohol concentration calculated by Alc Check is approximate. Alc Check cannot substitute the real alcohol tester. Developer of Alc Check is not be liable for the difference between the calculated and actual BAC.

The app is for entertainment purposes only and the calculation should not be used to determine whether person is able to drive.

comments: Finally a calculator that takes time into consideration. However a beer can contain 2%-20%, which is not considered. Useless.
Very inspirational app. Shows zero for after 1L of beer in 2hrs!?!
Easy to use and accurate.
Good if your on probation and cant get over the .2 limit
sadly unreliable. 5 Busch lights later & my BAC is still at 0.00

title: Sobriety Counter – Bad Habits
description:
Overcoming addiction is extremely hard. With Quitzilla - Habit Breaker you can follow all of your bad habits and addictions and use the app as help to analyze them and beat them. Besides the counting of days, it also features a sobriety clock letting you know the exact hour when you break the habit. Use it for overcoming drugs, gambling, junk food, and sugar addictions.

BAD HABITS TRACKER.
Commit to quit "cold turkey"! Enter your bad habit or addiction at a glance. You can add the exact day of the last time you did it, the money you spend usually on that bad habit or addiction and let it serve as your starting point. From then on you can get tons of interesting statistics about it. The abstinence time and money saved are the leading statistics. 

REWARDS.
The rewards feature is actually a calculation of the money saved. For example, if you’ve spent $100 on gambling weekly, and you haven’t gambled for a week, then those $100 are your weekly reward. Users can also manually add rewards for themselves. This serves as great motivation to quit alcohol, cigarettes, junk food or anything similar that costs us money and is bad for our body and health.

MOTIVATION.
Sobriety Counter also features a motivation tab in which you can add your own reasons to quit your addiction and bad habits. Simply list all of the benefits of quitting and let them serve you as a motivation for you to continue your journey of overcoming addictions. 

USEFUL STATISTICS.
The app keeps relevant statistics about each of your bad habits. From entering the day you quit and maximum abstinence period, to keep a record of the money, time spent on addiction and average abstinence period. Sobriety Counter will show detailed statistics about your bad habits. 

TROPHY ROOM.
For each of your successes, you will earn a trophy. These trophies are earned for the number of hours and days of your abstinence. The longer you are abstinent, the more important the trophy.

QUOTE OF THE DAY.
To keep you motivated and focused in your quest to get rid of the addictions, Sobriety Counter will display you “Quote of the Day” from various famous authors.

SOBRIETY COUNTER FEATURES:
- easy and simple entering of bad habits and addictions
- help in quitting alcohol, drug, caffeine, food, sugar addictions
- customize your bad habits
- set update and weekly average expenses for a particular addiction
- sobriety counter in hours, days and money
- rewards system
- motivation with reasons why to quit a certain habit
- detailed statistics about each addiction
- trophies for achievements
- quote of the day for motivation and keeping focus
- pin code to prevent other people to enter the app 
- Google Drive support for data backup
- ability to change the color theme
- Progress and daily quotes notifications

Don’t ask how to quit drinking alcohol, taking drugs or eating sugar, just download our habit breaker app and you will have an amazing help in overcoming your most scary addictions.
