recentChanges:
Fixed Google Drive backup, and other minor bugs.
If you enjoy using this app, please take a moment to rate it, and tell us what changes you'd like to see, or bugs you've discovered.
comments: I like the simplicity of the app; and though some customization and home screen widgets are locked behind the pro version, I think this is a great app with a very simplistic UI. As a Programmer myself, I would have to say that this has been built very well and so far I haven't experienced any hiccups or software issues with the app. My only gripe, and this is just because I'm frugal, is the pricing of the Premium version. 4.99 just seems a lot to me to unlock basic customization options.

This is the best of the quitting habit trackers I've tried. Nice simple yet classy UI, & adding motivational cards helps remember why I'm doing this. I have used it for ages so upgraded to premium for extra goals. I also like the dark theme. The only thing I would have liked in premium was maybe an added diary or notes, though I still think it was well worth my money.

I expected a bit more features and options, but it's rather good. Good and easy UI, everything is clear and easy, cold figure out fast how it works. Edit: although it was logged in with Google Play, it did not back up my progress, lost everything.

Awesome app!! Put off paying for the upgrade for a while but was worth it. What I like most is the calculation of time and money spent or saved...keeps me recording my slip ups and makes it so much more than just a clock. The calendar view is also really cool

Really helps. In the past I've tried to quit smoking and bought a little $1 cigar to 'tide me over'... I always ended up returning to smoking. But I didn't this time because I didn't want to reset my progress. It really helps to see it. One week, no smokes for me!

title: Alcokeep: alcohol consumption tracking
description:
Alcokeep wants to be the easiest way to track your alcohol consumption and expenses. Thanks to a simple user interface in Material Design you can choose from different alcohol types and record your alcohol activity. 

Different alcohols
The application supports different alcohol types: Absinthe, Beer, Brandy, Champagne, Gin, Martini, Rum, Sangria, Vodka, Whiskey and Wine. If the alcohol you are looking for is not already present, you can add a custom one. You only need a few clicks to add your alcohol consumption to history.

History
Your alcohol consumption is summed up in a simple view. There is a list of each alcohol you added with valuable information like quantity, cost, time of adding and notes.

Custom currency
In settings, you can choose your custom currency in order to track your alcohol consumption using your local currency.

Editable history
You can edit all records in history by tapping on a single item. You can change the date, the time, the cost, the quantity and add additional information like notes and alcohol percentage (soon we will support Units). If you want to delete an item from the history, long tap on it.

Statistics
Alcokeep permits to display statistics of your alcohol consumption. Thanks to different charts and tables you can track and change your habits. We know that people love statics. This is the reason why more statistics are coming soon!

Continuously in development
Alcokeep is continuously in development and new features will be available as soon as possible. We have a lot of work to do but you can support us proposing new ideas and rating us on Play Store. We are trying to do our best to create an amazing app with great user experience.

Credits:
Icons and logo by flaticon.com

comments: Simple alcohol consumption tracker, I definitely know few people who could benefit from it. I would recommend minor tweaks on usability, like automatic population of mls based on most common measures. I would like to see kalories spent and maybe comparison to how much I would need to exercise to lose them or how many hours I would lose on hangover:-)
Not much use, only records volumes and costs, not very convenient to enter data either
Working well, I really enjoy design and big choice of alcool to store

title: How To Stop Drinking(Quitting Alcohol)
description:
For some people, kicking back with a glass or two of wine is just that. You’re out with friends, you pour, you sip, you get that warm, relaxed feeling, and that’s it.

For others, one glass becomes many, one night out becomes every night, and drinking starts taking up major mental space that becomes a focal point of your life.  

If you’re addicted to something, it doesn’t mean you’re weak or bad at willpower. Addiction lives in your brain circuitry — it’s not a personal shortcoming.

Addictive substances like alcohol activate pleasure receptors in your brain. The more often you switch on your pleasure pathways, the less pleasure you feel over time. So, your brain will crave stronger and stronger stimuli to get those happy chemicals. Your brain grows accustomed to the stimulus after so much repetition, and over time you’re so used to it that you have to have your fix to function.

Whether you’re starting a new habit or breaking an old one, success hinges upon three things:

Changing your behavior – either starting a new behavior or stopping one
Willpower – being physically and mentally resilient against weak moments and temptation
Often you must change the way you see yourself in the world
Alcohol addiction recovery is a whole different animal, but there is some overlap. Quitting drinking, specifically, has three distinct phases:

Detox – get all of the nasty stuff that built up from years of drinking out of your system
Become abstinent
Start the path of holistic recovery
With the understanding that you need all of these to work together, you can put together your plan to drop the bottle.

Most people with alcohol problems do not decide to make a big change out of the blue or transform their drinking habits overnight. Recovery is usually a more gradual process. In the early stages of change, denial is a huge obstacle. Even after admitting you have a drinking problem, you may make excuses and drag your feet. It’s important to acknowledge your ambivalence about stopping drinking. If you’re not sure if you’re ready to change or you’re struggling with the decision, it can help to think about the costs and benefits of each choice.

Avoid using the word ‘alcoholic’ due to the negative connections associated with this word. Instead, show you concerns by stressing the fact alcoholism is a disease that requires treatment.

If you feel you lack the ability to communicate your concerns in the manner, then another option is to stage a professional intervention. For a moderate fee, a professional interventionist will travel to your home in order to conduct this intervention.

This application feature are :-

You can bookmark Favorite articles(post)

This application helps you to read the article(post) - Once click 'Read Article' button, automatically read the page content(Text to Speech).

You can share the article(post) to your friends,family and social networks.

You can copy the text from any post.

You can enable notification

You can adjust font size(small, medium, big) of articles

For some people, kicking back with a glass or two of wine is just that. You’re out with friends, you pour, you sip, you get that warm, relaxed feeling, and that’s it.

For others, one glass becomes many, one night out becomes every night, and drinking starts taking up major mental space that becomes a focal point of your life.

If you’re addicted to something, it doesn’t mean you’re weak or bad at willpower. Addiction lives in your brain circuitry — it’s not a personal shortcoming.

Addictive substances like alcohol activate pleasure receptors in your brain. The more often you switch on your pleasure pathways, the less pleasure you feel over time. So, your brain will crave stronger and stronger stimuli to get those happy chemicals. Your brain grows accustomed to the stimulus after so much repetition, and over time you’re so used to it that you have to have your fix to function.

Whether you’re starting a new habit or breaking an old one, success hinges upon three things:

Changing your behavior – either starting a new behavior or stopping one
Willpower – being physically and mentally resilient against weak moments and temptation
Often you must change the way you see yourself in the world
Alcohol addiction recovery is a whole different animal, but there is some overlap. Quitting drinking, specifically, has three distinct phases:

Detox – get all of the nasty stuff that built up from years of drinking out of your system
Become abstinent
Start the path of holistic recovery
With the understanding that you need all of these to work together, you can put together your plan to drop the bottle.

Most people with alcohol problems do not decide to make a big change out of the blue or transform their drinking habits overnight. Recovery is usually a more gradual process. In the early stages of change, denial is a huge obstacle. Even after admitting you have a drinking problem, you may make excuses and drag your feet. It’s important to acknowledge your ambivalence about stopping drinking. If you’re not sure if you’re ready to change or you’re struggling with the decision, it can help to think about the costs and benefits of each choice.

Avoid using the word ‘alcoholic’ due to the negative connections associated with this word. Instead, show you concerns by stressing the fact alcoholism is a disease that requires treatment.

If you feel you lack the ability to communicate your concerns in the manner, then another option is to stage a professional intervention. For a moderate fee, a professional interventionist will travel to your home in order to conduct this intervention.

title: Blood Alcohol Calculator
description:
With Blood Alcohol Calculator you can quickly and easily calculate your blood alcohol content (BAC) by entering a few basic pieces of information. First, create user profiles for you and your friends by entering your name, weight, and gender. Once you've created a user you can add drinks to that user by selecting one of hundreds of built-in drinks or by creating your own custom drinks by adding that awesome cocktail you made at home or that tasty microbrew you just discovered. Lastly, enter how long you've been drinking and calculate the blood alcohol content of you and your friends. This includes a decimal representation of your blood alcohol content (BAC) (Such as 0.08), some possible side effects related to that blood alcohol range, as well as a detailed graph letting you know what your blood alcohol content (BAC) will be over time.

Feel free to comment or email with drink and feature suggestions!

Disclaimer: Blood Alcohol Calculator is intended only as an estimate of blood alcohol content and should not be used to determine whether or not it is safe to drive or for any official form of blood alcohol measurement. Blood Alcohol Calculator is not a replacement for an official breathalyzer test and should not be used as one.

Beer Buddy is an app to let your friends know when you hang out, so they can join you. Simply choose any drink or any other activity in the app to notify your friends! Open the map and find friends already on the move. 

Notify your friends when you

• drink a beer (or any other alcoholic beverage)

title: Jhoom - Alcohol Home Delivery Service
description:
Jhoom is an online platform for delivery of alcoholic as well as non alcoholic beverages at your doorstep.

You can order your favourite drinks from this app and pay on delivery. You are required to be above the minimum legal drinking age in your region. 

All deliveries are conducted by the authorised & licensed vendors. 

How the app works?

Step 1-

Simply choose the required alcoholic products and place an order (you don’t need to make payment while placing orders on our website & mobile app).

Step 2-

Your order is delivered by an authorised delivery person from a licensed and regulated alcohol store. The delivery person  will check your age and govt issued alcohol permit for consumption.

Once satisfied, the delivery person hands you the order. Please check all the items you have ordered

Step 3-

When you have checked your order and happy with it, please pay the amount to the delivery person by cash or by UPI. Only pay for the items you have received and applicable delivery charges (if any). Do NOT pay any amount before receiving the items.

title: Beer Simulator - iBeer
description:
This cool app changes your phone into drinking beer simulator. Thanks to it you can pretend that you drink a beer from your phone. Alcoholic beverage simulation looks and behaves in a very realistic way. It has naturally looking bubble effect, fluent foam animation and liquid that moves according to physics rules. Just tilt your phone and watch how lager is moving in a glass. When glass is empty you can pour yourself another free carbonated drink. Just shake your phone!

How to use virtual beer:
1. Stand sideways to your friends.
2. Hold your phone as if you were holding a real mug of your favorite alcohol. Keep the phone directed at your viewers.
3. Put the phone to your mouth and tilt it slowly up - as if you were tilting a glass trying to drink everything. The virtual beer will start disappearing and finally a glass will be totally empty.
4. Pure Magic! Your friends will be impressed.

Main features of simulator:
🍺 realistic beer behaviour
🍻 naturally looking foam and bubble animation

- document your alcohol consumption
- document alcohol-free days
- define personal goals
- receive feedback on your input
- receive rewards
- graphically display your input as personal statistics (day / week / month)
- calculate your alcohol consumption in calories
- calculate the financial cost of your alcohol consumption
- motivate yourself to be healthy
- access information about advice services

… at any time, even offline.

This app was developed by Berner Gesundheit in collaboration with Fachstellen Sucht Kanton Zürich (FSKZ). It is provided free of charge and contains no adverts.

Berner Gesundheit endeavors to keep the app up-to-date but accepts no liability for the information provided being up-to-date, complete or correct. The app is no substitute for professional diagnosis, advice, and treatment from a doctor or specialist.
summary: Want to track your alcohol consumption? Then you're in the right place.
comments: Doesn't have a settings menu to change currency and measure (everything is in Dl and chf). A widget to quickly add a small beer would be a nice addition.

The app tends to delete all the data that has been captured over a year. Restart of the phone and clearing cache does not help to recover the data. This behaviour happened already twice to me. Die App löscht irgendwann alle Daten die man über ein Jahr lang eingegeben hat. Restart des Handies oder löschen des Cache helfen nicht um wieder an die Daten zu kommen. Das ist mir nun bereits zum zweiten Mal passiert.

title: Drink Roulette 🍻 Drinking Games app
description:
So, you’re drinking with your buddies at your soiree, maybe pre-gaming, maybe after-gaming. Maybe right in the middle of the game…
You love roulettes but you haven’t got the cash to splash at a casino. Those places are expensive.
 
Don’t worry - we got you covered 🍻
 
We have JUST what you need to step your night on the booze up a notch. Not just a simple drink game like hundreds of others: a drinking game that is off. the. hook.

▪️ A sweet ‘n slick design
▪️ Totally original booze fuelled rules for your soiree
▪️ Battles where the winner takes all and the loser… CHUGS.
▪️ Dirty “ never have I ever ” drink games
▪️ Hilarious “ most likely to …” votes
▪️ Wild “ would you rather ” games
▪️ Speed and reflex house party games
 
So, that’s what awaits in Drink Roulette with its 9 drinking game modes, each designed around the mood of your soiree, from “I can't get drunk, I gotta work tomorrow, dudes” to “let’s drink ‘til we can’t feel feelings anymore!”

And, since we’re cool guys and since you’ve already invested in sixers and your favorite bottles of booze, the first drunk mode is absolutely FREE 🤑🤑💸💸, with no pop-up ads.
 
By the way, we are Ultimate Party Apps. If you take a look at what we do, you’ll see we like livening up your nights drinking with friends and just making fun happen by whatever means necessary. If you want to support a team of young guys, passionate about the perfect drinking games to fire up when the sun goes down, play Drink Roulette and let us know what you think of it by leaving us a comment. We are always updating our drink games based on what we hear from all of you out there. So, thanks!
 
________________________________________

- Please drink responsibly
- Never EVER drink and drive

summary: Best challenges for drinking games! An app for 2 or more guzzlers to party hard
developerAddress: 305 moo 1, The Resort 101, T. Chang Puak, Muang Chiang Mai 50300
recentChanges: Limited edition! A Halloween special is waiting for you in this version. The Drink Roulette is getting dressed up too and bringing you a new special occasion pack so you can kick off your Halloween partying. No candy is on the menu, however chugging and freaky challenges are 👻 Do you dare to play in the dark?
comments: The game is fun, but the free version is a tease for the game. I decided to pay the weekly charge and paid for a few weeks. When I wanted to cancel by subscription there is no place to stop the subscription and the game developers are no help when I tried to email them about my issue. Would recommend the game, just do not pay for the extended version.

Cool content, but it's silly to pay a weekly subscription. Boxed games cost the same as a full month. $260 a year is outrageous. The free content is cool, but it's really just a teaser. Super repetitive, only fun for a few rounds. I feel like if you offered an unlock cost per pack, sayat most $8 and that pack is yours, you'd probably keep alot of users. I'd say make more, but from the looks of these reviews you gotta be raking it in from all the people who cant/forget to cancel their sub.

So when I first bought the app it was $11.99 for full access and it was great. However recently they started charging $5.99 a week! Which I got charged. When I complained they refunded me my original $11.99 purchase and said I wouldn't be charged again. Just recently when I tried to play the game I was locked out of all the packs and it wouldn't let me play unless I resubscribed and I got charged $5.99 again...I will be unsubscribing and deleting this app as it is not worth $5.99 a week.

Predatory monetisation system. They rely on users getting too drunk and forgetting they entered a 3 day trial, where they pay £4.99 every WEEK (not month!) thereafter. Disgusting recurring business model. Why not give 3 days access without this shady subscription strategy? Also, stop silently deleting this review. It's honest and fair. Thanks.

Probably the most fun drinking app me and my friends have encountered! However, the price of 4.99 a month for premium is a bit too steep :( I wouldn't mind paying 1$ a week or even 5$ a month. Great app with a disappointing price tag

title: Dry Days by AlcoChange
description:
#2020 - Change Your Drinking with Dry Days
Ready to revamp your relationship with alcohol or are you interested in taking a break from booze for a month? 

If your goal is to stay dry completely or cut down or moderate, join the challenge with Dry Days & Change Your Drinking.

Receive personalised motivational messages to help you achieve your goals and reap the benefits of staying dry.
Invite your friends to Dry Days, you can also join our Facebook support group from the app.

Dry Days app powered by AlcoChange behaviour change platform is a great companion for you to cut down or moderate or cut out. It’s a free tool to keep track of your drink-free days and drinking habits throughout the year while seeing the impact it has on your overall health and wallet.

Each of us are different in this journey and the app is non-judgemental and is carefully designed by experts and continuous feedback from Dry Days users to help people with different goals through a variety of features.

You can connect with your friends and family in the app to seek help and support each other in your journey. You can draw inspiration from the leaderboard with your friends and family.

Daily reminders are your accountability partner and help you record your activity in the app. 

Visual representation of your progress helps you stay on track through positive reinforcement.

Differentiate between drinking within limits and drinking above the limit in the progress page with colourful visual cues.

Features:

-Staying Sober or having a quick drink, Record and keep track of your progress quick and easy.

-Interactive dashboard to check your Dry Days for a Week, Month, Year and Total

-Know how much you've saved by staying dry and the number of units you've cut down

-Know your current streak and the best streak of Dry Days in the dashboard

-Tips and Tricks from experts and inspiring stories from our community members to help you out

-Keep track of the drinks you've had and get a summary of calories, units consumed and the money you've spent

-Track your sleep and mood and reflect on your journey

-Personalised daily motivational messages to keep you on track

-Customisable Report card to get information about your dry days and drink days 



The app also allows you to share your progress and journey with your friends & family via Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Whatsapp and much more.


Allow Dry Days to access your location while adding a drink to set the preferred location and provide location-based services. Your "Area" information is collected during signup to provide information about locally available alcohol-related help in the UK.

recentChanges:
Current Streak Issue fixed (due to Day Light Savings change)

Please write to us at drydays@cyberliver.com if you need any help with the app
comments: Not registering my streak properly. I'm 366 days on 31st August but today, 24th August it's saying 368. My streak is 359 days but only saying 24. Had this issue for weeks now. I have dutifully ticked off my all alcohol free days since 1st September. I've messaged regarding the issues but no reply. This app is not fit for purpose.

I like the accountability and the way it keeps track of your year, month, week...and goals. I really like the "how did you sleep last night" question every morning. Lol. It may seem like a small thing but it keeps me aware of how I'm feeling and how I can do things so change.
Downloader several times but cannot use app as unable to register as get error message saying servers are down. Useless.
An interesting app with a great interface. When you feel distraught & are reaching out, maybe Android's Apps are important for the detox time. It WILL get better, just breathe!
It is really helpful to see supportive messages for each day and a count of my dry days. It is not invasive and does not have pop up ads and is just a nice, quiet tracker which I appreciate.

title: Alcoholic strength calculator
description:
How to measure or determine the power-made tincture? Alcoholic strength calculator will help you in this task, you will calculate the proportions of alcohol, water, juice, spirits that have to be mixed to achieve a certain power of tincture or her desired destination number.

Anyone who has ever had the pleasure doing his own tincture met the problem to determine its power - dilution or strengthening on the "taste" also has some advantages, but wanting to be more precise, you would use a meter.

Alcoholometers can not indicate alcohol in mixtures containing sugar, which of course can not be missing in the tincture. Alcoholic strength calculator uses tested in practice designs - see for yourself by creating the appropriate mixture for each other.

comments: Yes it helped me somehow but i am dealing with contents of <=3% alcohol margin which is below the range of your calculator

title: delivery.com: Food, Alcohol, Laundry & Grocery
description:
Delivery App: Food, Liquor, Groceries, Laundry and Alcohol delivered

We deliver Food, Alcohol,Grocery & Laundry!
delivery.com is your one-stop app for fast, local delivery and pickup of food 🍔🍕 , alcohol or liquor🍷🍻,  laundry and groceries🛒 ! Order from the best local stores in your neighborhood. Download the only one-stop app that delivers food, drinks and more with the tap of a button! 

How our delivery service works
Just plug in your address and delivery.com finds all the local restaurants and stores that deliver food, alcohol, groceries or laundry to you. You can browse thousands of menus and order food from your favorite restaurants. Find beer, wine and spirits fast. Get groceries to your door on demand.  Even schedule pickup and drop-off for your laundry and dry cleaning. One app for everything you need in the neighborhood. Delivered.

Search by cuisine (Chinese! Pizza!), dish (spicy tuna roll!), drink (anything from "white wine" or "whiskey" to hard-to-find craft beer)... or whatever you’re craving. Order from over 15,000+ local merchants.

Features of our delivery app
DELIVER TO ANYWHERE 
Order from your favorite restaurant or let us suggest popular places near you. We’ll bring to your home, office, anywhere! 
 
DELIVERY POINTS
Earn Delivery Points with every order. Redeem for free food, donations to charitable organizations (and other great prizes).

PICKUP OR DELIVERY
Order for pickup and skip the line, or get delivery and have it brought to your door.

SCHEDULE & REORDER
Create scheduled orders for future meals, or use our reorder carousel to bring back trusty favorites.

GROUP ORDERING
Use our Group Ordering feature to order with friends, coworkers, neighbors and roommates.
 
OFFICE ORDERING
Ordering at the office has never been easier with Group Ordering, corporate discounts, catering, and paying with credits.

DEALS AND PROMOS
Check out our promo page for access to exclusive promos on your order.

CUSTOMER SERVICE
 Any questions? We’ve got award-winning customer support via phone or live chat.

AVAILABLE NEAR YOU 
Order in NYC, Chicago, Los Angeles, San Francisco, Boston, Washington DC, Philadelphia, Burlington, Madison, Lansing, and hundreds more cities and towns across the US.

WAYS TO PAY
Pay with all major credit cards, Apple Pay, Google Pay, Visa Checkout, Masterpass, and PayPal. After your first order, cash payment is accepted. 

GET $10 OFF YOUR FIRST ORDER
Get $10 off your first order with a minimum subtotal of $15 (excluding tax, tip, delivery fee). Just use code APPETITE

You must be 21+ to order or consume alcohol. Please eat and drink responsibly.

title: Drugs and Alcohol: a Guide
description:
This App provides an overview of the theories which underpin substance misuse, the relevant policy and legislation, the up-to-date drug and alcohol statistics for NI, the principles and values in working with substance misuse and a regularly updated directory of services via an easy to access regional map. The App has been created to ensure ease of access for service users, people who use alcohol and / or drugs and who require updated information and also workers who are involved at all levels of drug and alcohol service provision.

You can register with our email update service to get reminders when we have updated the App content or there have been important changes to legislation, policy etc. 

People who misuse / abuse drugs, alcohol or other substances may experience varying levels of distress at personal, familial, community / and societal levels. At the individual level, this may include damage to their physical and mental health and well-being, and possibly to their ability to support themselves. There may also be problems associated with their families’ lives via negative impacts on the health and well-being of their children and in some cases place a burden of care on other relatives (including their children). There may also be negative impact on the communities in which they live through the crime and anti-social behaviour sometimes associated with substance misuse. 

Recognition of the complex nature of issues related to substance misuse is crucial in order to gain an understanding of the problems faced by many people who misuse alcohol and drugs. Poverty, multiple adversities, poor housing, long term unemployment, family breakdown, poor mental health and emotional well-being and financial instability may be precipitating factors in substance misuse or may be consequential factors of the misuse trajectory.

title: Alcohol Test App
description:
Alcohol diminishes our reaction time.
Driving in these conditions can lead to risk.
This app contains a simple test in which you must touch a white dot in the shortest time possible.
Rated your reaction time the app will show you a traffic light indicative of your physical condition of the moment.
This app does not replace the tests used by law enforcement.

title: Bottle Rover: Alcohol Delivery
description:
Bottle Rover is your go-to alcohol delivery app, making it easier than ever before to search for on-demand liquor, beer, or wine based on your location.

With this liquor, wine, and beer delivery app, you can find a store near you, reserve a bottle, schedule pickup or delivery, get back to the party, and earn rewards for ordering through the app. Make your favorite drinks for your favorite friends, anytime, anywhere.

Bottle Rover Features

·         Powerful search and filters: We make it easy for you to find the perfect wine, beer, or liquor selection based on your requirements. Play around with our features until you’re satisfied with the results.

·         Detailed descriptions: You don’t have to wonder about the wine you are ordering. You can read all about it right through our on-demand alcohol app.

·         Largest selection: Sift through thousands of beers, wines, and liquors by checking out multiple participating stores at once. Reserve a bottle in just seconds.

·         Price comparison: We make it easy for you to compare prices relevant to your ordering location.

·         Alcohol delivery: Do you need your purchase now? No problem! We offer pickup and delivery options.

·         Easy payment: Simply pay with your credit card each time you place an order directly through the app.

·         Rewards: Earn rewards each time you reserve a bottle through Bottle Rover.


A Liquor Store in Your Pocket

At Bottle Rover, we are constantly adding new participating stores to our app, so you can find one that is most closely located to you. Order now to find the closest liquor store so you don’t have to worry about picking it up yourself.
 

How Does Bottle Rover Work?

Step 1: FIND a store near you.

Step 2: ORDER the selection.

Step 3: SCHEDULE pickup or delivery directly from your mobile device.

Step 4: READ about cocktail recipes, wine recommendations, and flash deal offers.

 

Liquor Recipes

Bottle Rover also provides weekly cocktail recipes that make it easy for you to whip up the drink of your dreams. Learn more about wine recommendations and use our tools to locate hard-to-find products and games.


Best of all: we include liquor deals and flash sales. That’s right – affordable wine is just around the corner.

 
This liquor delivery tool is perfect for:

·         Stocking your bar before or after a gathering

·         Sending gifts

·         Hosting dinner parties

·         Hosting office events

·         Hosting tailgates

·         Planning pre-games

·         Planning after-parties

·         Crafting post-work drinks for yourself

 
Bottle Rover is your liquor delivery one-stop shop. Why wait?! THE PARTY STARTS HERE.

title: Blood Alcohol Calculator
description:
Interactive BAC calculator. See when you can drive again. 

Features: 

* Cool graphics
* Intuitive (drag & drop) user interface 
* Interactive graph with results 

Over 50 predefined beverages with cool icons: 

* Beers 
* Stouts 
* Wines 
* Rums 
* Shots 
* Brandy 
* A-Bomb 
* Bloody Mary 
* Blue Lagoon 
* Cosmopolitan 
* Flaming Lamborghini 
* Margarita 
* Mojito 
* Piña Colada 
* Sex on the Beach 
* Tequila Sunrise 
* Woo Woo 

... and more 

The BAC Alcohol Calculator allows you to edit your favorite beverages, so you can customize it to meet your own particular consumption. Do you like beer, distilled beverages or mixed drinks? Are you male or female? Calculate the current blood alcohol content and the time when you reach zero. 

Residual alcohol is often underestimated. Why take the risk? 

DISCLAIMER: 

The app is designed for entertainment purposes only and the calculation should not be used to determine whether person is able to drive. Do not rely entirely on the outcome of the calculation. 

Drink responsibly!

title: Drink Guard – virtual breathalyzer
description:
Drink Guard app is a virtual breathalyzer, thanks to which you can quickly and conveniently add alcoholic beverages and conduct an hour-long simulation of blood alcohol content.

The main functions of this application are:
⭐monitoring the estimated blood alcohol content for the current hour
⭐possibility of adding to the calculation of alcoholic beverages with future consumption time. This enables to plan the maximum amount of alcohol consumed in order to achieve sobriety at the desired time
⭐estimating the hours of sobriety

Adding beverage in two ways:
⭐after selection of its type, adjustment of parameters (i.e. percentage and strength) and determination of consumption time
⭐based on the history of added beverages. It will be added for the current time

The application contains a set of information on the influence of alcohol on the body, as well as principles of the application functions, e.g.:
⭐information on current symptoms
⭐what affects the absorption of alcohol
⭐methods for improving well-being on the “next day”

On the summary screen you will find an hourly estimation of alcohol content, which enables tracking the progress of alcohol metabolism.
It is also possible to count the added beverages. They are grouped by alcoholic strength, and their volume and quantity is added in total.

The algorithm used in Drink Guard is based on a document: “Computing a BAC Estimate” (BAC – blood alcohol concentration) created by the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration. In order to calculate the estimated blood alcoholic strength, it shall take into account the following factors:
• weight
• sex
• metabolism
• quantity of beverages consumed
• volume of beverages consumed
• alcoholic strength of the beverages consumed
• drinking time of the beverages

An important factor influencing the calculation of alcohol level is the individual speed of alcohol metabolism. Drink Guard enables modification of the averaged value adopted in the above document.

Please note that Drink Guard is a virtual breathalyzer and the alcohol level calculation may differ from the professional breathalyzer test or blood test results.

Contact:
Use the form available in the application or write to mindstorm1024@gmail.com.

title: DrinkCounter - Monitor your drinking
description:
DrinkCounter lets you monitor the amount of alcoholic drinks you consume. 
Simply select the type of drink and your current party-location, then press +1 to add a drink. If you consume the same drink twice, it's as easy as one click!

The app shows you not only how much alcohol you drank today, but a full list of today's drinks. You can also add drinks on past days in case you forgot to type them in.

Based on your typed-in drinks, the app generates interesting statistics of your alcohol consumption, including total counts, week and month progress, most popular drinks and locations, and much more!

It does not only work with beer or standard drinks, as you can freely add new types of drinks and locations. Everything is completely customizable for your exact needs!


Features:
- Add drinks when you consume them
- Add new types of drinks
- Add new locations
- See a list of all drinks consumed today
- See the total amount of alcohol consumed today
- Display a full history of all consumed drinks
- Display interesting statistics, including total/monthly/weekly amounts of drinks and alcohol
- Display average consume on each weekday and month
- Display your most favorite drinks and locations
- Completely free of charge, no ads
- No data is sent anywhere, everything is exclusively stored on your device
- Modern app design

comments: Not cool. I downloaded this app cos the indicated app permissions were minimal (only reading of the SD card and network access). After installing, I discovered that the privacy policy listed amongst "Types of processed data" my personal contacts and a load of other personal data! So misleading as to be illegal in the EU.

Seems to be efficient on many levels. Here in the UK we count in 'units' and it would be useful to see that reflected in the stats numerically rather than as a percentage (percentage of what?). I have asked the developer what m/A means but still don't know. Anyone?

Great, I wish if "Delete all records" have an option to not delete the "List of Location" and the "List of Beers". I wish if it's more simple, just tap. And saves the Date, hour, approximated location GPS and the counter.
I was looking for an app that already has standard USA shot measurements pre-established. I don't want to do the ml math on every drink I order. It's not this app, uninstalling.

title: Alientoooh - APP responsible alcohol consumption
description:
Alientoooh, the first global APP that allows the detection in voice and speech of the changes produced by excessive alcohol consumption.

At any time you can find out if you have drunk too much by simply using your voice and your mobile device or tablet

After years of research and different tests, a fully functional model is obtained that detects the changes produced in phonation and speech, produced by excessive alcohol consumption, due to the effect it produces on the affectation of consciousness and reaction time . It has been shown that high intakes> 0.5 gr / l affect intellectual functioning, reaction time, coordination, reflexes and nerve transmission. High alcohol consumption is also linked to changes in speech production and phonation. It is these changes that allow the use of acoustic-phonetic and pronunciation indicators to detect the effects related to alcohol intoxication.

The system is based on the temporal and frequency analysis performed on a person in a normal and drunk state. It is necessary to calibrate the system with 3 samples at 0.0 corresponding to three time slots. As is known, the voice and speech are not the same at different times of the day. Once calibrated the system will detect the changes produced at the time of making a test, simply saying a phoneme, and a word.

The system is ideal if you want to monitor together with professionals in case of addictions since all the data of the samples can be stored for later consultation.

WARNINGS

-This software does not provide blood alcohol measurements of any kind.
-When analyzing differences in the voice pattern, if in the test phase, the voice is altered intentionally, obviously the system will detect that the samples are very different, and will establish that the user has drunk. Therefore, when the test is performed, it must be carried out consciously and in the most similar conditions of ambient noise, to the reference sample.

IMPORTANT NOTE
The APP is not fully compatible with Android 10 or higher.
We will solve the problem shortly.
Thank you very much for your patience and trust.
Development team.

title: Alcohol Calculator
description:
You need to dilute the alcohol? You do not know how to calculate the proportions of water and alcohol?

Use the Alco calculator to determine the required amount of water. The program has a few calculations. Simply enter the fortress of the starting alcohol in a percentage (e.g., 98), the amount of the starting alcohol and the desired strength of alcohol to be obtained in total (for example, 40 - this corresponds to the strength of vodka, or 70, this corresponds to fort an alcohol-containing solution required for the preparation of some sort of fruit liqueurs). There is no need to press the calculation (it is not!), Maybe the calculation is done automatically when you change any given initial parameters. Download the program to your tablet or smartphone, and it will always be at hand. There is no need to go online and look for online calculator.

Capabilities:
1) Calculation of the content of alcohol in volume when diluted with water (diluted alcohol-containing solution with water to the desired alcohol content in volume)

2) The calculation of the volume of alcohol when mixed alcohol-containing solutions (Calculation of the final alcohol content in volume when mixing alcohol solutions of different alcohol content and different volume of liquid)

3) Calculation based on the alcohol content of the final volume (Knowing the volume of the solution of alcohol that you want to receive, count the number of alcohol-containing solution, and water)

title: Breastfeeding alcohol - LD4M
description:
Help mommy reconcile a glass of alcohol from time to time and breastfeeding without danger for your baby.

Calculations are based on Mothersick's study of the Hospital for Sick Children in Toronto. The application is not a substitute for medical advice and does not establish a patient-doctor relationship.

The application makes it easy for you to start calculating a time counter for each consumption you make.
It's up to you to choose the type of alcohol (5%, 11%, 40%) and the quantity. The application does the rest.

title: goPuff: Drink & Food Delivery
description:
goPuff delivers thousands of daily essentials in just minutes. From cleaning supplies & over-the-counter meds to food, drinks, electronics and essentials for baby and pet, goPuff brings you what you need for a flat $1.95 delivery fee.

ORDER IN SECONDS, DELIVERED IN MINUTES

Download the goPuff app and enter your address. We deliver to 190+ markets and counting, including most major cities. And we’re quickly expanding!

Add your favorite items to your cart and continue to checkout. We pack your order in our local facility and deliver it straight to you. No middlemen means we’ll get there fast!

THOUSANDS OF CONVENIENT ITEMS

Order food delivery, from fresh essentials— eggs, milk, bread & cheeses—to favorite snacks, like chips, ice cream & candy. Looking for drink delivery? Order from our collection of flat and fancy water, energy drinks & juices. We have alcohol delivery, too–delivering beer, wine & spirits*. Need home essentials delivered? Shop our paper towels, toilet paper, cleaning products & so much more.

Some of our partners include Ben & Jerry’s, Coca-Cola, Gatorade, Flamin’ Hot Cheetos, M&Ms, Reese’s, Gushers, Tide, DayQuil, Takis, Dove, Colgate toothpaste & much more.

$1.95 FLAT DELIVERY

Some food delivery services charge you more when they’re busy. Not goPuff. Our fast delivery is always just $1.95—all day, every day. We never surge or hike delivery.

Want free delivery? Join Fam, our membership program that offers free delivery on every order for a low monthly subscription.

NON-CONTACT DELIVERY

Our customers can always request specific delivery instructions upon ordering. To ensure the safety of drivers and customers, customers can check a box for “Non-Contact Delivery.” The driver partner will leave your order at your requested location and call you upon arrival.

WAYS TO PAY

goPuff accepts credit cards (Visa, American Express, MasterCard and Discover) and debit cards, as well as Apple Pay and Google Pay.

EARN POINTS TO REDEEM REWARDS

We love a good deal. Honestly, who doesn’t? That’s why we created Puff Points, a rewards program that gives discounts the more you order goPuff. Earn Points with every order & redeem them to unlock different rewards, like daily & weekly discounts. All new users earn 6,000 Puff Points with their first order!

AWESOME CUSTOMER SERVICE

Sometimes things go wrong. We’re only human. And so are the goPuff Customer Service representatives on the other line. We hope we got your order just right, but in case we didn’t, give the team a call.

DELIVERED 24/7 IN MOST MARKETS

We own and operate our facilities, which service 190+ delivery zones across the country, and stock them with thousands of items from your favorite brands. goPuff delivers to many major cities and college campuses: Atlanta, Austin, Baltimore, Boston, Charlottesville, Chicago, Cincinnati, Cleveland, College Park, Dallas, Denver, Des Moines, Flagstaff, Houston, Indianapolis, Jacksonville, Louisville, Minneapolis, Newark, Oklahoma City, Orlando, Philadelphia, Phoenix, Pittsburgh, Portland, Raleigh, Richmond, San Antonio, Seattle, State College/Penn State University, St. Louis, Syracuse, Tampa, Towson, Tuscson, Washington, D.C. and more.

We deliver 24/7 in most markets, and until 4:30 am in newly launched areas.

*Beer delivery, wine delivery and liquor delivery is available only in select regions. ID verification required for alcohol delivery. Please drink responsibly.

WANT TO BECOME A GOPUFF DRIVER PARTNER?

goDrive, goPuff’s driver partner app, connects driver partners with goPuff customers to deliver everyday essentials. Drive when you want and earn big. Download the goDrive app to get started.

***goPuff is not available in all markets...yet. Want us where you are? Find us on social media @goPuff or visit goPuff.com for more.

- fixed minor issue with a splash page appearance after tapping on search.
comments: Honestly? This is the best. I've been able to get feminine products when I've needed them and everywhere else is closed or I'm hurting too much to want to get up and go get them. Being able to get snacks or a drink or a little something I'm craving and it's at my door, at the MOST, in about 15 minutes? Amazing. Also, they're very good about paying attention to your requests. I asked one night for my driver to knock lightly, as my roommates were asleep and they absolutely did. Great company.

Great service, however, the app is kind of bad. Like everything takes forever to load, especially when trying to search something. Sometimes you have to press one of the buttons multiple times for it to actually recognize that you are. It isn't deal breaking, but it is a slight announce

Fantastic service with minimal fees and reasonable prices compared to other delivery services. Unfortunately my app has been unusable for awhile now. Will only show the puffer fish loading icon. Have uninstalled the app and reinstalled multiple times to no effect. It's a shame because I did enjoy using this while it worked.

I really enjoyed the driver contact button and help chat button you used to have. My order is 30 min late, and I have no way except the help number to cancel my order or find out where my driver is. It feels much more impersonal, and more like another run-of-the-mill mechanical delivery service :(

This app is absolutely terrible. The user experience is clunky and slow. The wait times are never consistently updated, but will always be at least 20 minutes longer than originally estimated. The prices are jacked up. Just find another way.

title: Be Your Own Bartender: Cocktails & Mixed Drinks
description:
Be Your Own Bartender finds amazing mixed drinks you can make (right now!), with the ingredients you already have at home.

Main Features:

Mixed Drinks🍹- Over 100+ carefully selected drinks from bartenders around the world exactly how they make them behind the bar. Routinely updated to add more drinks to the collection to expand drink variety. So if you don't see your favorite drinks here, tell us!

Ingredients🍾 - Having over 75+ different ingredients to choose from, this will expand the number of mixed drinks you can make.

Glassware🥂 - List of different cocktail glasses and how they relate to the style of the drink. Simplified for at home use as to not require a multitude different glasses.

Creation Zone🥃 - Ability to create and edit your own unique recipes. Allowing complete customization over your drinks.

Drink Recipes📖 - Detailed step by step instructions on how to make the drink. This includes the exact measurement each ingredient requires, in their proper order, and the method on how it's made. Notes have also been added to each drink for recommended substitutes and certain detailed notes about the drink.

Favorites⭐ - Manage your favorite and most frequented cocktails by easily filtering in only the drinks that you have starred.

Advanced Searching🔍 - Practical drink and ingredient search options. Allows for the ability to search for a specific common ingredient in a cocktail such as Tequila or Lime Juice.

Sort and Filter🛆 - Manage your drinks by sorting them in the way that best fits you. Filter even further by selecting a drink type, useful for narrowing down a drink when unsure.

Contact📇 - Feel free to contact us at ContactBeYourOwnBartender@gmail.com

title: HIPBAR: The Drinks App | Home Delivery of Drinks!
description:
HipBar is India's first legal Alcohol Home Delivery service provider to help India drink wiser. Services available in KOLKATA, CUTTACK, BHUBANESWAR & ROURKELA! More cities to follow!

With HipBar, get your favourite drinks (Beer, Whisky, Tequila, Rum, Brandy, Gin, Wine, Vodka, etc.) delivered home.


How to get your drinks?

Pick a preferred store: The app shows a list of nearby retail stores for you to order from. Pick a store based on the available delivery slots. 

Pick your drinks: Browse the store's catalog and add the drinks of your choice to the cart. 

Pay Online: Go cashless and pay in a fast, convenient & secure manner through UPI (Google Pay, PhonePe, Paytm, etc.), Credit/Debit cards, and Netbanking.

Get Delivery: Once the delivery executive arrives at your doorstep, submit your OTP, show a valid ID, and receive your drink. 


What’s your occasion(al) excuse for a drink? 
Whether you're taxed working from home? or planning a house party? Remote celebration for boss’ retirement? A remote family get-together? An indoor tryst? Birthday Party? Or a quiet drink at home? HipBar, your one-stop solution for ordering alcoholic beverages home, is all you need. Pick your store/search your drink, pay, and get your drinks delivered. 

A drink for your mood: 
In a mood for single malt? Maybe a strong cocktail to forget the breakup? A wine to complement your reward? Or just beer & an in-house party? Now, you can get your drinks delivered home from HipBar!

Tease your taste buds: 
Maybe it’s time you try a new flavour? Irish Cream? Jagermeister? Hard liquor? or fine wine? Explore a list of liquor genres coupled with detailed brands’ list and try out new drinks to spice up stuff. 

What’s more:
We make the segment exciting for you by bringing the hottest updates, news, DIYs for in-house plans, and more. It’s time to know more about the world’s favourite vice!

Access leading premium liquor brands such as Johnnie Walker, Smirnoff, The Singleton, Ketel One Vodka, Baileys, Ciroc, Captain Morgan, Glenkinchie, Black Dog, Talisker, Tanqueray, Bira, Corona, Budweiser, Dewar’s, Glenmorangie, Ardberg, BACARDÍ and many more! 

If we're not in your city yet, don't worry. We're expanding rapidly & hope to serve you real soon!

About HipBar:
Founded with a vision to create a safe, transparent and responsible digital ecosystem, HipBar is here to help India drink wiser, one drink at a time. HipBar operates an RBI-authorised, semi-closed wallet regulated under the Payments & Settlements Systems Act, 2007. 

Permissions:
SMS - To read the OTP and verify the phone number at the time of login and sign-up
Location - To identify your location, nearby stores and facilitate delivery
Phone contacts - For the user to select the recipient's phone number and name while sending gift cards
Camera - To use the Scan & Pay feature

We hope you continue to have a great time with us. Feedback is what drives us to do better, so feel free to tell us what you think.

title: Liquoroo
description:
Want liquor delivered on demand? Now you can! with Liquoroo
Alcohol delivered to your door in 30 minutes.
Thirsty? Get the drinks you love, delivered on demand and late at night. 

Drink what you like, where you like, when you like. Find your favourite alcohol beverages, all at the tap of a button. Impress your friends and families, spend your valuable time with them and let us do the hard work.

Features:
1.	Fast delivery
Alcohol delivered on-demand to your door, in an average of 30 minutes.

2.	Available 7 nights a week
Available all 7 nights of a week when you need your favourite drinks the most. 

3.	Live order tracking
Track your order in real time as it heads your way.
 
4.	Alcohol for every taste
Essential selection of tipple and booze at your fingertips, from beer to cider, wine to cocktails, Vodka to Whisky.

5.	You are covered
The most loved liquor delivery app with the widest coverage in Australia.

We are servicing many suburbs of the Sydney, Melbourne, Adelaide, Newcastle and rapidly expanding.

Liquoroo is currently available in the following areas and surrounding suburbs:
NSW: Zetland, Waterloo, Mascot, Sydney, Parramatta, Burwood, Rhodes, Wentworth Point, Aurburn, Eastwood, Ryde, Marsfield, North Ryde, Epping, Carlingford, Strathfield, Campsie, Surry Hills and Macquarie Park. 

Vicotria: Melbourne, Southbank, Carlton, Clayton, Burwood, Boxhill, Chadstone, Collingwood, St Kilda and surrounding suburbs.

South Australia: Adelaide, North Adelaide, Prospect, St Peters, Goodwood, Norwood, Thebarton, Brompton, Klemzig, Walkerville, Greenacres, Payneham and surrounding suburbs.

QLD: Brisbane, West End, Yeronga, Annerley, Indooroopilly, Greenslopes, Sunnybank, Mount Gravatt, Algester and surrounding suburbs.

ACT: Canberra CBD and surrounding suburbs. 

If your area was not currently covered by us, watch this space and you will be surprised on how soon Liquoroo will come to you.

title: KOL - Alcohol delivery
description:
Kol provides a selective range of wines & spirits ready for delivery direct to the customer’s doorstep in less than 30 minutes, day and night, at tasting temperature. 
Our company is technology driven: the interaction between Kol and its customers is achieved through a user friendly IOS application, Android and e-commerce website, with a fully automated delivery process. Note that all payments are automated (no cash accepted).

Kol’s aim is to shake-up the alcohol distribution market by establishing a new way of selling and delivering wines & spirits in a sector which lacks imagination, service efficiency and price effectiveness. Kol acts as a new distribution channel by interacting directly between alcohol producers and consumers. Kol offers 6 to 8 brands for each category (each brand within a different price range) and changes these brands on a weekly basis.

Kol is available in Paris and London, we are expanding quickly, please register your email address on our website www.kol-app.com and we will let you know as soon as we come to your area!
 
NB: GPS usage may affect battery consumption.
* Please drink responsibly. Kol can only sell and deliver alcoholic beverages to persons aged 18 or over. Kol operates the Challenge 25 age verification policy.

title: Alcohol meter
description:
Alcohol meter is the first mobile application that allows you to track your daily alcohol consumption. Simple and ergonomic, add your consumption by specifying the type of alcohol and the date. You can then find statistics on your consumption such as your favorite alcohols or your total consumption.

You hesitate to drive? Indicate some personal information (age, weight, ...) and discover the estimation of your blood alcohol content in real time. You will be able to know when you will be under the legal limit of alcohol.

This app aims to educate and inform the public about the dangers of drinking and driving.

Important information: the app only gives an estimate of your blood alcohol level, this estimate has no legal value and does not replace the use of a real blood alcohol tester (Breathalyzer). The application is intended solely for information and entertainment purposes. The results of this test are given for information only.

title: Be Your Own Bartender: Cocktails & Mixed Drinks
description:
Be Your Own Bartender finds amazing mixed drinks you can make (right now!), with the ingredients you already have at home.

Main Features:

Mixed Drinks🍹- Over 100+ carefully selected drinks from bartenders around the world exactly how they make them behind the bar. Routinely updated to add more drinks to the collection to expand drink variety. So if you don't see your favorite drinks here, tell us!

Ingredients🍾 - Having over 75+ different ingredients to choose from, this will expand the number of mixed drinks you can make.

Glassware🥂 - List of different cocktail glasses and how they relate to the style of the drink. Simplified for at home use as to not require a multitude different glasses.

Creation Zone🥃 - Ability to create and edit your own unique recipes. Allowing complete customization over your drinks.

Drink Recipes📖 - Detailed step by step instructions on how to make the drink. This includes the exact measurement each ingredient requires, in their proper order, and the method on how it's made. Notes have also been added to each drink for recommended substitutes and certain detailed notes about the drink.

Favorites⭐ - Manage your favorite and most frequented cocktails by easily filtering in only the drinks that you have starred.

Advanced Searching🔍 - Practical drink and ingredient search options. Allows for the ability to search for a specific common ingredient in a cocktail such as Tequila or Lime Juice.

Sort and Filter🛆 - Manage your drinks by sorting them in the way that best fits you. Filter even further by selecting a drink type, useful for narrowing down a drink when unsure.

Contact📇 - Feel free to contact us at ContactBeYourOwnBartender@gmail.com

title: Drynk Alcohol Tracker & Insights
description:
Drynk is a simple alcohol consumption insights tracker, drinks diary, and blood alcohol content calculator to help you understand and control alcohol consumption in the click of a button.

View charts and statistics that make it plain and clean to know know when you are going to be drunk, when you're going to be sober, and how drunk you're going to be. It also warns you when you're going overboard so that you can think twice before having another drink. Using an alcohol tracker is a great way to know when enough is enough and to understand how alcohol affects humans.

Drynk provides an estimate of your blood alcohol content (BAC) based on the drinks you log, creates an estimated graph and indicates when you're going to be sober. The smart background services update in real-time with a live feed of updates when you drink.

Features
⏰ estimate time until sober
🥴 estimate impairment & feeling
#️⃣ keep track of your drinks
🚨 warns you if you're getting too drunk
👍 add, remove, edit, and review your drinks from your logbook
📌 pin most frequently drunk drinks
🤔 understand how much time alcohol absorption takes
✋ recognize and stop bad habits
😁 create new habits
📈 chart your habits and understand statistics about your drinking
🍹 understand how strong cocktails can be
🎆 and much more!

Disclaimer: Please enjoy responsibly, always have a plan, and do NOT drink & drive. The responsibility falls solely on the user, driving at any level intoxication is illegal. Follow all local laws. For entertainment purposes only. The most accurate ways to calculate BAC is a blood test, second being a breathalyzer.

title: Calco - Alcohol calculator
description:
The Swiss Alcohol Board's "Calco" app enables you to determine the alcohol strength of spirits, as expressed in per cent by volume. You will also need an alcoholometer, which will provide you with the required input information.
With "Calco" you have two functions at your disposal: "Verification" and "Reduction" of spirits.
With the "Verification" function you can calculate in per cent by volume just how much alcohol is contained in the spirit, at the reference temperature of 20°C. 
With the "Reduction" function you can calculate how much water you need to add to a spirit in order to obtain the desired consumption strength.

title: How to Quit Drinking
description:
How to Quit Drinking app for help and educated people for stop drinking, If you have been having any kind of consequences from your drinking - legal, interpersonal, financial, professional, etc. - you might be wondering how to quit drinking alcohol successfully. There are many approaches one may take when it comes to giving up drinking and some may be more appropriate than others. This app will highlight how to quit drinking alcohol if you are a problem drinker but not an alcoholic. If you are an alcoholic you should seek help with an addictions counselor or through a recovery fellowship such as Alcoholics Anonymous.

Features of the app:

Can Use For Offline App
Updated regularly
You can ask questions from our experts
Simple app book Knowledge like pocket on your phone
You can also send us your suggestions and we will add them inside the app For more updates.

Simple explain why someone hard to how to quit drinking:

Quite commonly an individual will start drinking in college or in their late teens or early twenties and get a great deal of enjoyment from their drinking activities. As one gets older and begins to desire a career or family alcohol typically becomes an obstacle to achieving these goals. Therefore, one is faced with a choice: Should I continue drinking and lose out on some of things that I have always wanted in life or is it time to give up alcohol or severely moderate my drinking?

The problem arises when the person makes that first attempt to quit drinking. They usually simply attempt to stop on their will power without having a strategy or plan beyond, "I'm not going to drink anymore." This is a recipe for disaster. If you do not take steps to ensure that you will be successful in your attempt to stop drinking then you will almost surely fail.

After a failed attempt or two, a person who is serious about quitting drinking will take a look at their behavior and begin to implement changes. The old behaviors are going to produce the old results. So, if you want to make progress and are determined, you will have to examine your behavior.

For instance, after deciding that you want to quit drinking, are you still keeping alcohol in the house? If so you have to consider why you have made this choice. Because, though simply removing the alcohol from your home does not ensure that you will successful in you attempt to quit, doing so significantly improves your chances of success.

This is but an example of looking at some of your old habits and evaluating them to see if they will be effective if your desire is to stop drinking. The simple fact is that you will increase your chances of success drastically if you are willing to make significant changes in your habits and lifestyle. If you want to know how to quit drinking, take a look at the things that you have been doing while drinking!

More tips about how to quit drinking will reveal on our app, you can download it now for get good value information.

title: AlcoTrack+ 🍻📈・BAC Calculator & Alcohol Tracker
description:
No breathalyzer at hand, but you need to know your current blood alcohol level (BAC)? Or do you want to track your alcohol consumption? Get motivated to stay sober? Or to improve your drinking habits and overall health? Try AlcoTrack - BAC Calculator & Alcohol Tracking App rolled into one.

🏆 Featured on xda-developers.com as the perfect Alcohol Tracker for New Year’s Eve.

⭐ PRO+ VERSION: FULL FEATURES & NO ADS
Please note that you can test the free version before buying AlcoTrack PLUS: BAC Calculator & Alcohol Tracker.

Are you out with friends and want to know your current blood alcohol level? Do you need a rough estimation of when you are going to be sober again? Do you aim to stop drinking, stay sober, and get a more overall impression of your drinking habit? Do you search another app to add to your "quantified self" or "lifelogging" software stack?

AlcoTrack gives you all of that. The blood alcohol content (BAC) calculator approximately substitutes the breathalyzer/alcohol test. It uses the well-established and scientific Watson formula, taking many individual factors like age, gender, height, and weight into account. Our alcohol calculator app respects drinking times and nutrition and visualizes the BAC metabolism in a line chart. Go get a grip on your alcohol consumption habit! 

FEATURES
★ Presets 🍺🍷🍸: Quick access to your favorite drinks like certain beers, cocktails or wine varieties
★ Intuitive, Slick Interface: Follows Material Design guidelines and provides two themes (including an AMOLED-friendly dark mode)
★ Line Chart 📈: Understand your blood alcohol content metabolism 
★ Detailed Stats: Analyze your alcohol consumption and expenses looking at different time frames (weeks, months, years)
★ Achievements 🏆: Motivate yourself to limit your drinking behavior by completing the next challenge
★ Notification Widget: All information at one glance & quick access to the alcohol calculator
★ Drinking Diary 📒: Look at previous sessions from the past
★ International Units: All relevant units for size, weight, fluids, etc.
★ Reminders 🔔: Never forget to keep track of your drinking
★ Fun Features: Random alcohol facts, beer trivia, etc.
★ Scientific 🔬: Takes many individual factors like age, gender, height, and weight into account

DISCLAIMER
AlcoTrack: BAC Calculator & Alcohol Tracker is a drinking diary app to track your alcohol consumption, analyze your drinking behavior, and, ultimately, to estimate your blood alcohol content (BAC). Please note that since your BAC is depending on many individual factors, this app can only give you a rough orientation. AlcoTrack cannot replace a breathalyzer. In case of doubt, you should never drink and drive. I do not assume any liability for the correctness of the results.

Formerly known as AlcDroid.

title: Alcohol Calculator
description:
The purpose of this app is to calculate the blood alcohol content (BAC). To do this the formula of the Swedish chemist Erik Widmark was used. For the calculation you just have to enter the volume of the drink and the alcohol content. Furthermore, the app provides two different modes: a detailed and a fast mode. At the latter one the data input is limited to a minimum and precast drinks can be selected. However, because of this there may some inaccuracies. To calculate the exact blood alcohol content the detailed mode is recommended where even a graphical evaluation is provided.
You can find further information in the options menu.

Keywords: alcohol calculator, alcohol, alcohol level, alcohol tracker, bac, drink tracker, drunk, sober, beer, wine

title: Quit Drinking Alcohol
description:
Quit Drinking – Stay Sober encourages you to Quit Drinking Alcohol. It contains numerous moving highlights that encourages you to avoid alcohol and remain calm.

You simply need to give Quit Drinking Alcohol date and time, cash spent week after week, and beverages every week and you will get calm measurements. You will get day by day warnings about how much time you have been calm.

Quit Drinking Alcohol – Stay Sober App Features:

✓ Statistics : App shows calm measurements like time you have been calm, cash you have spared from not drinking alcohol, life recovered, and number of beverages not alcoholic.

✓ Diary Note : You can add journal note to record your number of desires for drink and your state of mind during the day, and short portrayal/note about entire day.

✓ Quit Drinking Alcohol reasons : You can include explanations behind quitting alcohol. In this way, at whatever point you have inclination to drink alcohol, read these reasons and feel solid toward your quitting alcohol choice.

✓ Treats : You can include treats, and can buy from cash you have spared from Quit Drinking Alcohol.

title: Alcohol Test (for fun)
description:
Alcohol Test (for fun) calculates the approximate blood alcohol concentration level.

If you like to relax with a drink in the evening, but need to drive in the morning, you better check out the application Alcohol Test! It calculates the approximate blood alcohol concentration level based on the information about you and consumed alcohols. It contains several modes that allow to check your alcohol intoxication level and predict when you will be sober enough to safely drive the car.

Alcohol Test (for fun) has several options:
• CALCULATE – by choosing the type and amount of the alcohol you drank, you can find out how much intoxicated you are, and when theoretically you’ll be sober enough to drive according to law in chosen country. Set your gender, weight, height and at which hour did you start and stop drinking. It will calculate like breathalyser your maximum intoxication state and inform at which hour you will be theoretically sober.

• REFLEX TEST – a simple trial in which you might check your actual reaction time. Ingestion of even small amounts of alcohol may result in a significant prolongation of the reaction time. Your average time reaction should be less than 0.4 second, if it’s longer than you’re probably still not sober enough to drive a vehicle. Tap the screen in the right moment to stop the virtual car, and prevent the road accident!

• ALCOHOL TYPES – you can add new types of alcohol by typing in the proper box its title, capacity in milliliters and alcohol content in percentage (vodka, wine, beer, drinks and cocktails).
• LEGAL LIMITS – you can also add by yourself another national limits on the acceptable level of blood alcohol concentration, allowing legally to drive a car.

Please remember, that Alcohol Test (for fun)t is an application that only provides entertainment and the results are not scientific of evidential value. It’s based only on a mathematical algorithm and its results may differ from the actual! To get an accurate result of the blood alcohol concentration, you should use a real device.

title: Sobriety Counter -EasyQuit pro
description:
This is the paid version of the stop drinking app "Easy Quit" which does not show you any ads and the same features as the free version.


Motivational Health Section
★ Countdown timer to watch many aspects of your health improve as a result of your great decision to stop this bad habit.

★ See how much money you saved by not drinking and set a custom treat to buy from your savings.

★ Play a game of memory to distract yourself from the urge to have a drink.

★ "Quit Slowly" Mode with a customised plan and reminders to ease your body into quitting drinking.

★ Write your own personal motivations of why you want to stop drinking alcohol and let the app remind you of them daily.

★ 64 Beautiful Badges for your sobriety time and drinks passed; with congratulation reminders and sharing functionality.

★ 28 beautiful themes to personalise your experience.

★ High level of Privacy. No log in, no collection or selling of your sensitive data like email, password or contacts. Your data is saved locally on your phone.

★ Two awesome widgets to put on your home screen and always see the money you saved by quitting drinking and your time as an alcohol free person.


I hope my sobriety counter app helps you break this habit and stop drinking for good to become a sober healthy person for ever :)

comments: DL'ed this cuz of the amazing reviews - and I'm so glad! I'm getting so much more use out of it than I thought. There are SO many ways it keeps you motivated, so you never forget what you're working towards. It helps you see how much $ you're saving, how much health you're gaining day by day, and a place to enter your triggers or personal motivators. Plus like 20 other functions lol I just cannot say enough good things about this app! I paid for Pro cuz I want to support what u guys are doing ✊

Excellent app. Sadly when I upgraded to the paid version I stopped getting notifications. This feature is very important to me. I'm happy to report that Mario, the developer, has been very responsive. I'm confident that he will make it work properly! I'll update this review when we get it fixed.

This app really is helping me more than group sessions ever did. I find the money saved function from not drinking to be especially motivating. I'm 33 and have been drinking dangerous levels of spirits daily since my early 20s but it's time to go clean. Recommended.

First app that actually shows rewards for not drinking. Shows the benefits and helps keep focus on what your goals may be. I especially like the journal. Been off booze for four days after a very stressful time in my life. You need to be personally motivated as this is just a tool for focus and reflection.
It helps to have a physical view of my progress. I like that when you relapse it gives you the option to start over or keep going. I always pick start over. But it makes it easier.

title: TOZ - Drinking Game
description:
TOZ the new drinking game to kick your party with friends!
TOZ is pub-free and includes many free drink games to save you from boring party and never run out of drinking games again!

The list of drinking games :

- For How Much?
- Truth or Drink ?
- Déjà vu
- Never I have ever
- Would you prefer?
- Who could?
- Purple
- PMU

How to play?

TOZ offers drinking games for 2 or more, we don't have a limit so all your friends are welcome, but you will have to enter all the names ;)
Make sure you have enough alcohol to play all the games, Vodka / Wisky / Gin / Tequila or even Ricard ....
Choose the game then the game mode according to the type of party, Soft, Hot, Bar, Silly and Hardcore 😜.
And enjoy the party without moderation!

The application is also available in French, Spanish and German so don't worry if you go abroad ✈️.

The game is in constant development and we are listening to you on social networks for any additional questions, categories and even ideas for new drinking games to develop! 😇.

title: TRY DRY: The app for Dry January and beyond
description:
Try Dry is the perfect companion to help you drink more healthily, whether you’re taking on Dry January and want to track your units, calories and money saved, or cutting down longer-term. 

Why should I download the app?
•	Track your units, calories and money saved
•	Set goals and earn badges
•	Keep track of your current and best ever dry streaks
•	Progress charts
•	Use the drinking risk quiz to check up on your drinking
•	Works for a month off, moderation or year-round drink tracking
•	Receive regular support emails if you want them 

Why cut down your drinking?
•	People report better sleep, more energy and looking great!
•	More money in your pocket (the average person spends £50,000 on booze in their lifetime!)
•	Get healthier - through giving up alcohol for a month you do your insides a lot of good, including reducing diabetes risk and blood pressure
•	Amazing sense of achievement!

comments: I entered all the information, sadly when I open the calendar, I can only see half of the month and I am unable to move the calendar on to the second half of the month. Update 1st September 2020, still unable to see full month, if the 31st of the month is not visible, I am unable to record a dry day and this then wipes out my day streaks. Using a Sony Ericsson Xperia. Now sorted, if you have the phone display settings on anything above default, ie Large, the bottom line will not display. Change
Was s good app initially but now it won't let me enter anything!! I just keep getting a message saying 'it looks like somethings gone wrong', so will have to uninstall

Good, but too January focused. I can't track a four week period beginning in the middle of a month. Or say I want to do a dry February for example, can't do that. This reinforces harmful beliefs that taking care of your health is a periodic thing you do then stop and can only be done as part of groupthink. There are some other goals, but they are not that useful. Like 20 or 50 non consecutive dry days, what's the point of that? Edit: logged out like everyone else says. Can't log back in. Deleted

I love this app, it is motivating, BUT it keeps crashing when I open it from the notification or shortcut. I have to keep going into Play Store and opening from there 😡 Update 14/1/20. So now the app has lost my login, I've had to create a new account and lost all my data - uninstalling, can't be bothered! I'll keep a check in my diary now. Rather annoyed as it has always been good in the past! 😡

Every time the app receives an update you have to enter your details again and ironically since the start of January it takes ages to do anything and keeps crashing. Not what you need if you're already tense trying not to have a drink. UPDATE : now the app is failing to log me in even after a password reset. Utterly useless and extremely frustrating. (I'm actually a software developer myself and if our company released a bug laden product like this we'd be out of business)

title: Sobriety Clock
description:
According to the US National Institute on Drug Abuse, the rate of relapse for drug and alcohol abuse as almost 66% within the first twelve months of sobriety. However the longer one stays clean and sober, the more likely one is to remain clean and sober. By the time someone has been sober for 3 years, the rate of relapse drops to 33%. By five years, rate of relapse falls to less than 15%. Source: (http://www.drugabuse.gov/publications/addiction-science/relapse/extended-abstinence-predictive-sustained-recovery)

Anyone who has struggled with drug or alcohol abuse knows that sobriety is hard-won. Even though some moments are easier than others, every second, minute, hour, day, week, month, and year is a victory, and you ought to remind yourself of that accomplishment every now and then; just how long you've been sober, and just how much every second of that time is worth. None of it should be taken for granted.

And sometimes, no matter how much or how little time you've been sober, some moments are harder than others to get through, (a surprise urge to go out can happen to anyone), and this simple little clock can remind you of how far you've come, and how far you can yet go, if only you just hang on to each second of sobriety, if necessary.

Only you can do the work, this is just one tool.
