title: Cocktail recipes
description:
Enjoy Valentine season sipping the best cocktail drinks using our cocktail recipe app.

Our cocktail and mocktail recipes app has the best and tasty cocktail drinks from all around the world.

Most popular romantic cocktail and mocktail drinks are
> White Christmas Martini 
> Mulled Wine 
> Cranberry Old Fashioned

Cocktail recipes app offers you many easy and quick recipes. These include liqueur, fruit liqueur, cocktails with cachaça, beverage, wines, cocktails with brandy, nut-flavored liqueur and cocktails with sake. 

Popular cocktail recipes of the month 

Cocktail recipes like the branch, whiskey smash, the oracle, violet femme, war of the roses, barrel age boulevardier, the golden one and hudson sour are popular in February.

Simple cocktail recipe instructions with picture
Every mix alcoholic drink recipe has easy step by step instructions with a photo.

Collect favourite cocktail recipes
Add your favourite beverages recipe to the app's favourites section. You can use the saved cocktail recipes offline. You can also create alcoholic mixed drink recipe collections on the basis of vodka rum whisky cocktail drink recipe, blended cocktails, bloody marys, bourbon drinks, champagne drinks, cosmopolitans, daiquiris, hurricanes, gin drinks, margaritas, martinis, mojito recipe, rum drinks, tequila drinks, vodka drinks, whiskey drinks, drink flavoring & simple syrups etc. 

Grocery list or Shopping list for cocktail ingredients 
You can add ingredients from a mocktail or cocktail recipe into the shopping list. All beverages recipes come with a recipe converter to help you change recipe servings. Cocktail recipes app automatically changes ingredient quantities based on your serving size. Cocktail recipes free app helps to make grocery shopping easy. We have a built-in shopping list maker with an ingredients converter. It lets you scale ingredient quantity based on serving size. 

Mocktails / Cocktails Recipe search 
Let the cocktails flow with our perfect drink finder. Find recipes by simple search with the name of a recipe or by ingredients used. You can search for beverages recipe with the ingredients you have, based on special occasions like Thanksgiving, Christmas, Halloween etc. 

We offer lots of cocktail recipe: 
Prepare tasty alcoholic mixed drink recipes at home using sugar, honey, milk, herbs, soda, fruit juice, cream, sauce, lemon juice & liqueur. Recipes for classic beverages dishes like pineapple milk, liberty punch, apple crisp, the prairie buzz and the ginger baker are available in the app. 

Our favourite alcoholic mixed drink recipes include mother of exiles, stars in my eyes, old rough and ready, and fifth gear. Our beverages recipe app gives you lots of free making recipes for drinks, beer cocktails, liqueur etc. Now that you've our alcoholic mixed drink recipes app, you no longer need to carry around bulky recipe books. 

Start cooking with our free recipes app today this is a perfect drink maker app.

title: Alcohol Unit Calculator: Track Your Drinking
description:
An easy to use app, great for calculating and tracking the amount of alcohol you are drinking in a day and week. You can set a weekly target for alcohol consumption, making it very easy to see how you are doing. 

Has a range of 0 - 100% alcohol content for the 3 main styles of drink - beer, wine and spirits, and the most common quantities of drink to help calculate and track the number of alcoholic units in your drink. If the pre-selected sizes don't apply, it is possible to enter any quantity of drink, using the 'other' feature in the glass size drop down menu. 

Now lets you easily calculate and track how much you are spending on alcohol each day and week. Just go to the settings menu and turn money on.

The totals will automatically reset: daily total resets at midnight each day, and the weekly total at midnight on a night of your choosing, but by default it will be Sunday night. If you want to change the reset day, just go to the settings page and select a different day. 

If you have any features you would like to see included with the app, send us a message and we will see what we can do.
descriptionHTML:
An easy to use app, great for calculating and tracking the amount of alcohol you are drinking in a day and week. You can set a weekly target for alcohol consumption, making it very easy to see how you are doing.

Has a range of 0 - 100% alcohol content for the 3 main styles of drink - beer, wine and spirits, and the most common quantities of drink to help calculate and track the number of alcoholic units in your drink. If the pre-selected sizes don't apply, it is possible to enter any quantity of drink, using the 'other' feature in the glass size drop down menu.

Now lets you easily calculate and track how much you are spending on alcohol each day and week. Just go to the settings menu and turn money on.

The totals will automatically reset: daily total resets at midnight each day, and the weekly total at midnight on a night of your choosing, but by default it will be Sunday night. If you want to change the reset day, just go to the settings page and select a different day.

If you have any features you would like to see included with the app, send us a message and we will see what we can do.
summary: Easily calculate, track and record your alcohol consumption
recentChanges: Bug fixes.
comments: Very easy to use and good to keep track. Suggestion would be to include "rolling" as an option for start day, to track units over a rolling 7 days.

Nice and simple but wish it said ounces or mls for calculating wine instead of small, medium or large glass. Too variable, a pinot noir glass can hold a whole bottle for example and that could be considered a large glass. Every one has different sizes of wine glasses. Please fix for an almost perfect app. would also be nice if you save the info for a week at a time to gauge your intake if your goal is 14 units a week for example. Just upgraded my rating to five stars as the creator has added mls!
I really like this app. Easy to use and easy to track - measures and percentages easy to work out. Edited my review as the app now allows you to choose your starting day. Thanks!
Really easy to use and helpful to track how much I drink in a week
Easy to use. very simple. no ads.

title: Не пью!
descriptionHTML:
Не знаете как бросить пить? Значит, это приложение то, что вам нужно!
Приложение позволяет контролировать время, прошедшее с момента последнего употребления алкоголя.

Также, в приложении:
– есть возможность устанавливать цели и следить за их достижением;
– наблюдение за улучшением вашего здоровья;
– описание более 80 заболеваний, на возникновение которых влияет алкоголь;
– мифы об алкоголе;
– факты о вреде алкоголя;
– преимущества отказа от алкоголя;
– советы бросающим пить;
– цитаты об алкоголе;
– отношение религий к алкоголю;
– калькулятор алкоголя в крови;
– тесты на алкоголизм;
– картинки, демотиваторы и видео о вреде алкоголя.

В приложении имеется стильный и легко настраиваемый виджет для рабочего стола, позволяющий иметь быстрый доступ к интересующей вас информации.

Приложение будет полезно участвующим в программах анонимных алкоголиков, поставивших цель больше не пить.

Знайте, что бросить пить может каждый!
Скажите стоп алкоголю!

title: Drug and Alcohol Review (mobile only)
description:
Drug and Alcohol Review is the Asia-Pacific’s leading multidisciplinary journal addressing issues related to alcohol and drug-related problems. As the official journal of the Australasian Professional Society on Alcohol and other Drugs (APSAD), Drug and Alcohol Review is an international meeting ground for the views, expertise and experience of all those involved in studying alcohol, tobacco and drug problems. The Journal examines and reports on alcohol and other drug use from a wide range of perspectives including clinical, biomedical, epidemiological, psychological and sociological.

Drug and Alcohol Review particularly encourages the submission of papers which have a harm reduction perspective. However, all philosophies will find a place in the Journal: the principal criterion for publication of papers is their quality.

title: Alcohol-Tester
description:
The alcohol tester is an app to determine the blood alcohol content in an easy way. This is ermöglichst by a scientifically proven method, by your reaction time in the drunken state is determined and set in relation to your reaction time in the fasted state. Here is a prior calibration is necessary so that the app knows how your reaction time is usually (in the fasting state). 

This method is of course not as accurate as a real alcohol tester, however, is the result, the real one unit, very close and thus gives you a good indication. 

The app offers an optional a login with Facebook. That way you can share with your friends and compare your test result. 

Features: 
- Alcohol Test (scientifically proven!) By reaction time 
- Calibration in the fasting state 
- Weekly, monthly and annual statistics of your test results 
- Share your results on Facebook with your friends (optional) 
- Vibration feedback (optional) 


Note: 
The mentioned parts per thousand value has no legal significance!

title: Home Moonshine
descriptionHTML:
The calculator calculates:
1. Grain brags with saccharification of congestion by microbiological enzymes;
2. Automatically corrects the correction of the atmospheric pressure coefficient at the current moment;
3. Weighed enzymes depending on the given activity.
4. Correction of distillate strength by temperature;
5. Current alcohol content in the cube and outlet of the distiller, as well as the current alcohol content in the cube, corrected for atmospheric pressure;
6. Content of absolute alcohol (AC) in fractions;
7. The number of selected "heads";
8. Mixing water of different temperatures;
9. Brags of fruits and molasses;
10. Mixing and diluting alcohol solutions with regard to contraction, with the possibility of calculating both volume and mass;
11. Sugars for a given number of ingredients, volume and spirituoznosti, as well as hydromodule;
12. The minimum amount of fertilizing, inverting sugar and a sample of fractional sugar;
13. Wort Measurement: Calculation of residual sugar content, alcohol content and percent digestion in °Brix, SG, %Sugar;
14. Conducts a laboratory log of fractional distillation with the calculation of the necessary parameters and the possibility of saving the results to a file.

Please note - the application uses special permissions in its work:

1. Geolocation - required to automatically determine the atmospheric pressure of your area (used in calculations with boiling point);
2. Memory access - required to save log files and backups.

All information requested by the application is located on your device and is not collected for any purpose in accordance with the Privacy Policy:
https://homesamogon.ru/policy-moonshine-calc-en/
summary: Calculator for making alcoholic beverages at home.
recentChanges:
- Fixed error displaying automation "true";

- Calculation of the replacement of sugar with glucose;

- Added support for the built-in barometer;

- Updated menu in Ukrainian and English localizations;

- Added support for the Ukrainian language;
- Fixed error receiving weather data;

- API level raised to 28;
- Localization;
- Fixed startup errors;

- Updated display of drop-down menus;

- Fixed "Application Stop" bug;

- Added support for the Czech language;

- Fixed Android 8 bug;
comments: The app works exceptionally well and the info in it is legit. Made a sugar wash following their instructions to the T and only added 4 of the dressings (vitamin b, citric acid, Epson salts and salt) cos it's all I had. It fermented within 5 days and yielded +10% ABV with brewers yeast. Also, translation from Russian to English is good. No dodgy trying to figure out what it says scenarios. Well done. This one is a keeper.
Just started looking at it. We use Fahrenheit, haven't found a option to change from Celsius. Can convert, a lot quicker if it was already here. I'll change rating if I find it.
Very good app, anxious to test.
Why should it always ask permission for location and files? Malicious imho.

title: Alcoholism
description:
How to Quit Drinking Alcohol!
You're looking at this page, which means you want to quit. That's the good news. The not-so-good news is that quitting is hard. It's a truth that is painful, and one shouldn't sugar-coat it. The great news is that medical technology, integrated communities, and effective psychological counseling have made it easier than ever to quit. If you feel that you drink too much, there are many benefits of sobriety: preventing strokes, losing weight, avoiding hangovers, and reducing the likelihood of liver disease are only a few beside a general uptick in overall health.

     *** Support Us By Rating Us 5 Stars***
**** Please contact us if you have any question! ****

title: Mashrobi: Alcohol Delivery
description:
Get the door. It's the liquor store.™

Shop multiple local stores all at once for the biggest selection of beer, wine and liquor online. Compare prices instead of being locked into one non-negotiable cost. Snag exactly what you want and get your drinks delivered or skip the line with in-store pickup.

You can have everything else in your life at the touch of a button (Live-chat), so why walk into the store to shop for beer, wine and liquor? And then settle for whatever they have and pay whatever they say? Mashrobi gives you options. 🍺🍷🍸

🌟 KEY FEATURES
• Largest Selection: See thousands of beers, wines and liquors by shopping multiple stores at once.
• Price Comparison: Finally know exactly which stores in your area have the best prices. 
• 1-Hour Delivery: Need it now? No problem. Where available, the store will deliver the goods within an hour.
• Top Shelf Service: Our outstanding customer support team is always ready to help out if you run into any issues.

📱 THE LARGEST LIQUOR STORE IS NOW IN YOUR POCKET

At Mashrobi, we work with local stores around the country to make shopping for alcohol way easier. Go ahead. Shop for your favorite bourbon, vodka or IPA. Heck, you can even get ice. We work directly with the local stores you already know and trust and they deliver your beer, wine and liquor where and when you want it. 

🏪 WHEN SHOULD YOU USE MASHROBI

When it comes to the best way to shop for alcohol, Mashrobi has you covered. Order your drinks online and the store brings them to your door ASAP. When might that come in handy? We can think of a few scenarios.

• Drinks running low at your dinner party or office happy hour? The party doesn’t have to end early anymore. 
• Missed a friend’s birthday? Send a bottle. Who says no to a champagne delivery? 🍾
• Need beer for poker night or the big game? Save yourself from running yet another errand. 🍻
• Traveling for work? Never sink to the lows of the hotel minibar again. 
• Trying to locate that hard-to-find item? Check multiple stores without taking a step.
• Now? Sure, why not. 


If you don’t see your city, sign up to be notified when we come to your area. More cities are constantly being added so, fingers crossed, hopefully it’ll be soon.

Must be of legal drinking age to order from Mashrobi.



We appreciate your feedback and we're working hard to make the experience better for you. Your feedback helps us to keep improving

title: Stop Drinking with Andrew Johnson
description:
Are you finding that one drink is turning into a few or too many? Are you finding that you are using alcohol to relax?

 Stop Drinking is designed to help listeners relax and overcome the emotional and physical cravings for alcohol.

Drinking can quickly turn into a habit that many people find hard to break. These habits soon become an accepted part of your life and many people hold themselves back with the thoughts they can't stop.

This relaxing, positive, motivational app will give you the tools to:
 
  • Stop drinking altogether or regain control and cut down.
  • Break those negative habits that lead to reaching for a drink.
  • Build positive resources to achieve your goals, and so lead a happier, healthier, more 
    fulfilling life.
  • Change your thinking and access the incredible power of your unconscious mind. 
  • Easily break unwanted habits.
  • Regain control of your clarity of thought, well-being, money, health and much more.

Destress, improve your mindset, sleep better, grow your confidence and be healthier with guided meditations, mindfulness sessions and positive messages – and much more.

Mindfulness expert, coach and therapist Andrew Johnson has been helping people deal with life’s challenges with guided relaxations, meditations, self-care tools and breathing exercises for many years. 

His best-selling range of mindfulness apps have a variety of content to help you, whether you are looking for ways to reduce stress and anxiety, lose weight, improve your health & confidence, learn relaxation techniques, etc.

Key features:

  • Short meditations you can do anywhere: at work, commuting, at home, walking.

  •Inspirational sessions to help you tackle life’s challenges, to be calm and find clarity.

  •Mindfulness stories and talks to help you build better, healthy habits.

  •Meditations to help you feel inspired and find motivated to eat well, workout and stay

Start your day mindfully, keep feeling positive and be inspired throughout the day with a range of guided meditations to help during tough or stressful moments. Boost your energy with a Power Nap, stay focussed to Beat Procrastination, and then drift off using a Deep Sleep meditation for a restful night.

Think of Andrew as your personal mindfulness coach, always there to help when you need him most.

descriptionHTML:
Are you finding that one drink is turning into a few or too many? Are you finding that you are using alcohol to relax?

 Stop Drinking is designed to help listeners relax and overcome the emotional and physical cravings for alcohol.

Drinking can quickly turn into a habit that many people find hard to break. These habits soon become an accepted part of your life and many people hold themselves back with the thoughts they can't stop.

This relaxing, positive, motivational app will give you the tools to:

• Stop drinking altogether or regain control and cut down.
• Break those negative habits that lead to reaching for a drink.
• Build positive resources to achieve your goals, and so lead a happier, healthier, more
fulfilling life.
• Change your thinking and access the incredible power of your unconscious mind.
• Easily break unwanted habits.
• Regain control of your clarity of thought, well-being, money, health and much more.

Destress, improve your mindset, sleep better, grow your confidence and be healthier with guided meditations, mindfulness sessions and positive messages – and much more.

Mindfulness expert, coach and therapist Andrew Johnson has been helping people deal with life’s challenges with guided relaxations, meditations, self-care tools and breathing exercises for many years.

His best-selling range of mindfulness apps have a variety of content to help you, whether you are looking for ways to reduce stress and anxiety, lose weight, improve your health & confidence, learn relaxation techniques, etc.

Key features:

• Short meditations you can do anywhere: at work, commuting, at home, walking.

•Inspirational sessions to help you tackle life’s challenges, to be calm and find clarity.

•Mindfulness stories and talks to help you build better, healthy habits.

•Meditations to help you feel inspired and find motivated to eat well, workout and stay
healthy both in body and mind.

•Relaxation techniques and tools to help you sleep better every night, to wake feeling
energised and refreshed.

•Breathing exercises and calming meditations for anxiety, panic attacks and stress relief.

•Meditation sessions to stop anxiety in its tracks and release stress.

How do I get more?

Start your day mindfully, keep feeling positive and be inspired throughout the day with a range of guided meditations to help during tough or stressful moments. Boost your energy with a Power Nap, stay focussed to Beat Procrastination, and then drift off using a Deep Sleep meditation for a restful night.

Think of Andrew as your personal mindfulness coach, always there to help when you need him most.

Search for Andrew Johnson to unlock more daily mindfulness and guided meditation sessions.

After listening once, I've had virtually no desire for alcohol. ☺️ It's been 8 days with no problems passing up alcohol and I look forward to listening each day. I feel both relaxed and refreshed afterwards. And the money I'm saving is great!! I highly recommend this App. Thank you Andrew Johnson!

title: iPuke: Drinking game
description:
We spent thousands of dollars worth of booze to come up with the best drinking game concept on the planet. If you're after an epic night, all you need is the app, your insane friends and no sense of self respect!

On every turn you'll draw a card with 2 challenges: a dare and an amount of shots to drink. You must do at least one to proceed, and they're both worth points. The first brave player to reach the points target wins the game.

Wondering what kinds of dares you'll be facing? There are over 300 of them, but here are a few:

* Fill your mouth with ice and wait until it melts
* Blindfold yourself until the next turn
* Do the samba
* Lay on the ground like a starfish for 30 seconds
* Walk up to a stranger and ask for a photo

That and much, much more!! (trust me..)

Well, are you ready?

Very good game, all packs are super fun and will make an awesome night. It's also not a subscription service so you're not paying 5$ a week (like other games). You just pay for what you want, I love it.

Not only have I been enjoying this game since the trail came out in 2015 and has it been one of the best experiences of my life each time me and my friends play, I recently encountered my first problem when the gane updated and I couldn't access previously bought decks, I emailed the support team and a screenshot of my google play account and looking for my receipts, but the service was so amazing friendly and fast and in a moment all my problems were sorted. title: Alcohol Calculator
description:
Alcohol Calculator, aka breathalyzer, for calculating the degree of intoxication.
The Alcohol Calculator application, aka breathalyzer, was created taking into account the reverse development from third-party sources, taking into account the features of human physiology.
Alcohol Calculator will help to determine the degree of alcoholic intoxication based on the drinks already drunk. It will also indicate the degree of alcohol intoxication and the time of withdrawal of alcohol from the body.
The breathalyzer calculates the concentration of alcohol in the blood, and displays the value in ppm. Alcohol withdrawal time is approximate.
This Alcohol Calculator will help in such situations when you need to drive. The alcometer also allows you to calculate the degree of intoxication if you drank more than one drink, but several.
The breathalyzer also has a time calculation function, i.e. if you are behind the wheel in 5 hours and you want to drink, our application will help you calculate the rates and proportions.
Also in the Alcohol Calculator application there are useful tips for sobering up.
Attention! The calculations are performed by you, at your own peril and risk. The calculation results cannot serve as evidence in court, be the basis for lawsuits and other claims, be used as any evidence, as well as to challenge the results of laboratory determination of the concentration of ethanol in blood and urine.
Convenient and simple program,Alcohol Calculator, which has useful functions for the user, such as calculating two, three drinks and calculating the time (after how much behind the wheel).
Remember the main thing, the medicine for the poison differs only in the dosage. Take care of yourself and be healthy. Best regards, TQM Games.

title: Abolish Alcohol Hypnosis
descriptionHTML:
Most addiction avoidance programs focus on the "how-to" aspect but really misses on building a strong mental foundation to ensure a tough and mature mentality to withstand all the onslaught of addiction forces.


That is where this app is different from the rest. It helps to strengthen your mental mind set with positive thoughts to ensure a strong and lasting addiction repulsion. It uses hypnotherapy, a modern proven methodology even used by competitive sports men to ensure they have a strong and tough mental strength to move them forward by leaps and bounce.


What you are getting with the app:-
a) builds a tough mental mindset with a hypnotherapy audio;
b) journal your positive experience worth remembering;
c) capture picture of beautiful moments;
d) a kick the alcohol addiction mindset from a different perspective;
e) "Alcohol-No-More" ebook.


Hypnotherapy is a traditional art used by professional hypnotist to help its client cure from various type of psychology problem. It is a perfect mindset conditioning technique and this is exactly what you are getting with this application. It is a popular choice used by many people to improve many aspect of their life from overcoming phobia to breaking out of limiting beliefs and is also the perfect choice to manage your mindset to abolish alcohol. This app will be your perfect choice to use hypnotherapy to condition your mental faculties.



This is a self-improvement hypnotherapy program that you can use on yourself to induce 'self-hypnosis' and bring you to a state of peace, tranquility and calmness.


'Self-hypnosis' hypnotherapy, is a safe and convenient method you use to bring yourself to the desired state. While in this 'self-hypnosis' state, you are still in control of yourself and have the choice to follow the suggested scenario or to reject. You never loose this choice even while under hypnosis.


Go ahead and use this program to manage your mindset to abolish alcohol. This program does not guarantee that you will kick you alcohol addiction but that does not mean it will not.


If you find this app useful, please rate in Google Play Store so other people with the same need can find this app easily.
summary: A hypnosis audio to strengthen the mindset to stop alcohol / liquor addiction.

title: Drinkerrs: Local Liquor Delivery
description:
Local Liquor Stores in Your Phone.


Get liquor delivered on demand from your favorite local liquor stores today evening. Compare different store prices and find the cheapest one. Shop for all your booze needs online with the Drinkerrs app. Download the app and enter your address to see if we're in your city. New liquor stores and delivery locations added daily. Spend more time with your family and friends and let us handle rest of it.


SET A DELIVERY ADDRESS

Let us know your whereabouts and we'll enable you to choose from our best selection. Entirety of our purpose, at Drinkerrs, stands on the notion of the ability to cop your booze whilst enjoying the comfort of your home. Browse nearby liquor stores and search for booze by style, abv, brand, region. Choose from a variety of booze to order: Beer. Red Wine. Tequila, and much more. Vodka. Whateva type of Beer, Wine, Liquor. Skip the line and save the store trips. Order your local liquor store with Drinkerrs. Schedule your liquor delivery in advance for a later delivery time. Up to you!


HUGE SELECTION

Choose from a huge variety of liquor available in your locality. Our collection involves the best of beer, wine and liquor. Numerous reviews about variety of products will enable you to gain a different perspective about your selections along with choosing other good stuff. Our reviews stay novel.


SCHEDULED DELIVERIES

Place an order in advance before your party so you’ll have more to enjoy with your people than making trips to the local liquor stores. Advance ordering allows you to get your liquor when it’s most convenient to you.


ORDER TRACKING

Moment our driver picks up your good stuff, you’ll get a text. At this point, get your age proof ready and hang tight for there will be someone soon calling you that your booze is ready and waiting for you at your door. You can always track the status of your goods from the orders section in the Drinkerrs app. Happy drinking!


PAYMENT

Conveniently pay with a credit/debit card.

Tip the Drinkerrs driver in the app. No cash needed for tipping.


NEVER PAY MORE THAN THE CHEAPEST

You’ll get access to the cheapest particular booze in your locality. Compare the prices and choose what you feel like it.


ORDER FROM MULTIPLE LIQUOR STORES

Not just one liquor store, you can order from multiple liquor stores in the same order to fulfill all your needs in one go!


ABOUT Drinkerrs

Drinkerrs is a technology company. We just want you to enjoy your quality time rather than making unnecessary trips here and there.


MUST BE AT LEAST 21 YEARS OLD TO ORDER THE GOOD STUFF. OF COURSE!

Visit drinkerrs.com to learn more.

Place an order in advance before your party so you’ll have more to enjoy with your people than making trips to the local liquor stores. Advance ordering allows you to get your liquor when it’s most convenient to you.


ORDER TRACKING

Moment our driver picks up your good stuff, you’ll get a text. At this point, get your age proof ready and hang tight for there will be someone soon calling you that your booze is ready and waiting for you at your door. You can always track the status of your goods from the orders section in the Drinkerrs app. Happy drinking!


PAYMENT

Conveniently pay with a credit/debit card.

Tip the Drinkerrs driver in the app. No cash needed for tipping.


NEVER PAY MORE THAN THE CHEAPEST

You’ll get access to the cheapest particular booze in your locality. Compare the prices and choose what you feel like it.


ORDER FROM MULTIPLE LIQUOR STORES

Not just one liquor store, you can order from multiple liquor stores in the same order to fulfill all your needs in one go!


ABOUT Drinkerrs

Drinkerrs is a technology company. We just want you to enjoy your quality time rather than making unnecessary trips here and there.


MUST BE AT LEAST 21 YEARS OLD TO ORDER THE GOOD STUFF. OF COURSE!

Visit drinkerrs.com to learn more.

title: ABV Calculator
description: A Simple ABV Calculator for Home Brewers and Wine Makers. Has Temperature Correction for any hydrometer calibration.  Calculates Alcohol by Volume based on the formula (OG-FG)*132.715 after temperature correction. Free. No Ads.

title: AlcoTest - Blood Alcohol Content (BAC) Calculator
description:
Blood Alcohol Concentration (BAC) refers to the percent of alcohol (ethyl alcohol or ethanol) in a person's blood stream and can be measured within 30-70 minutes after drinking. A BAC of .10% means that an individual's blood supply contains one part alcohol for every 1000 parts blood.

AlcoTest app provides  a quick way to calculate your Blood Alcohol Concentration as well as time needed to fully sober up (BAC of 0%).

Blood Alcohol Concentration (BAC) refers to the percent of alcohol (ethyl alcohol or ethanol) in a person's blood stream and can be measured within 30-70 minutes after drinking. A BAC of .10% means that an individual's blood supply contains one part alcohol for every 1000 parts blood.

AlcoTest app provides a quick way to calculate your Blood Alcohol Concentration as well as time needed to fully sober up (BAC of 0%).
summary: Find out your Blood Alcohol Content and time needed to sober up.

title: Brew Tracker
description:
Improve your home brew beer with Brew Tracker.

Simple, free and easy to use. Made for tracking all the important information about your home brew beer.

If your like me and can barely remember which day you put your last home brew on, let alone the ingredients that were used. Well Brew Tracker is for you. Simply fill in information on each of your brewing days. Then success or failure you will all ways have all the key information on hand.

Whether you're a meticulous home brewer looking to record every detail of your home brews or a casual home brewer looking to record merely your brew dates. Brew Tracker enables you to record as much or as little brew info as you please. 


For each of your home brewing days the following fields are available:

Start Brew:
Fields: Home Brew Number, Name, Start Date, Type, Size, Recipe, Brewer Comments/Notes, Original Gravity.
Days brew has spent fermenting will be automatically calculated for you.

Bottle Brew:
Fields: Bottle Date, Bottle Count, Brewer Comments/Notes, Final Gravity.
Days brew has spent aging in bottles or kegs also auto calculated.

Sample Brew:
Fields: Sample Notes, Ready Status.
Record your thoughts on your home brew as you drink it.

Review Brew:
Fields: Rating, Review
Archive brews by giving them a rating and review.


Additional Features:

ABV% Calculator:
Calculate the alcohol content (ABV - Alcohol by volume) for each of your home brews.

Calendar:
Save brew dates to your calendar.

Second Ferment:
Save second ferment date, any additives and comments.
As this is an optional step in the home brewing process by default it is not enabled, but if you would like to see this step available simply enable it in preferences.

Back up:
Export your brew list into a CSV file. In case you need to move devices take your brews with you. 

A home brewing app made by a home brewer for people who like to keep it simple.

recentChanges:
Gallery for each brew. You can now add images on start brew and via brew details.

Cant remember or be bothered writing down what ingredients you used? Take a photo that will be linked to your brew.
comments: Good app, helps me keep track when I have multiple batches going. I like the ability to attach photos. Would like the option to have imperial/US calendar though, this UK/ Canadian calendar that lists day/month/year can be confusing at times. GUI could also use some updating, it's pretty plain and basic but it gets the job done.

Great app. IMO needs some tweaking. I would like to have a more precise bottle size option instead of 'long neck', 'stubbie', or 'keg'. Being able to input my own bottle sizes would be good. I.e. 1 litre, 750ml, 1 pint, etc.

For the brewer who doesn't need to take that much detail, this is a very good app. However if you want a more detailed app like mashing, amd and fermenting detail, check brewfather but for the novice or just hobbyist to brewing this a better solution.
Useful app! The workflow takes a few minutes to get your head around buy it actually fits well with multiple brews on the go. Very cool.
Great app and easy to use. However the export/import function doesn't seem to be working. It won't recognise the .csv file to import.

title: Search Vegan Wine/Beer - BevVeg
description:
Are you passionate about veganism?
Are you a long-time vegan, or have you just started eating and drinking plant-based foods and drinks?
Well, in your down-time you probably want to have a drink, and BevVeg💚 is your vegan guide to alcohol. Our simple vegan alcohol search app lets you search for vegan wine, vegan liquor, vegan beer. Simply check if a certain brand or product you are drinking is vegan, or find vegan alcohol options.

🔎SIMPLE SEARCH
Search for your next vegan wine, vegan beer, spirit, or liquor using the free BevVeg app. BeVeg is the ultimate alcohol guide for researching your next vegan drink. Be sure your alcoholic beverage does not contain any animal parts. Enter the wine, beer, liquor name or search by brand. See if a vegan drink is vegan certified, vegan but not certified by BevVeg or not vegan. 

🍸LARGEST DATABASE OF VEGAN DRINKS
More than 1 million beverages listed in the BevVeg vegan alcohol guide. Users can assist BeVeg in growing the database by adding info on their BevVeg. Whether you are a vegetarian or vegan, using our vegan wine scanner & vegan beer database you can be safe that you are drinking a completely vegan drink. Always.

🌿LOOK FOR THE CERTIFIED VEGAN SYMBOL
For truly vegan products, look for the BevVeg certified vegan symbol, a global trademark. The only law firm issued vegan logo. Be Veg!

💚 WHY THE BEVVEG APP?
▪️ free vegan app to search for vegan wine, beer, and other liquor 
▪️ detailed vegan liquor pages for each drink
▪️ database with over 1 million vegan drinks and growing
▪️ contact wineries and breweries from app, help us certify them vegan
▪️ comment and give feedback if a drink is vegan or not vegan and rate the taste

The BevVeg app is one of the core veganism apps for beginners and long-time vegans. 
Be Veg with BevVeg!

Download the vegan alcohol guide vegan app for free!

title: Instacart: Shop groceries & get same-day delivery
description:
Shop groceries online & get fresh food delivered directly to your door in as little as 2 hours with same-day delivery. This is food shopping made easy—plus, your first grocery delivery is free!

When you buy food with Instacart, you can get fresh produce, drinks, including alcohol, and other products with same-day delivery or pick up all across the US. Just download the app to see what local grocery stores are available for safe, contactless pickup or same-day delivery in your zip code.

Prefer pickup? Order groceries online for contactless pickup at your local store. Your grocery order will be eagerly waiting for you when you arrive.

Grocery delivery and pickup made easy

1. Enter your zip code & select your favorite local grocery stores
2. Shop food, produce & alcohol and choose from our large selection of products
3. Add your items to your cart & buy food quickly
4. Chat with your shopper and select replacements if an item is not available
5. Relax as you wait for your alcohol or groceries delivery to arrive
6. Enjoy your food while you save time & money 

Contactless delivery & pickup

Shop groceries from the safety of your home and get your groceries quickly with same-day delivery. Our contactless delivery and pickup will ensure you and your shopper safety.

Find your favorite products from our wide selection of items
Buy food and order fresh produce, late-night snacks, and even alcohol —all delivered straight to your door with Instacart’s easy grocery delivery. Order your essentials like toilet paper and other household items the same day!

And your shopper will work hard to select even fragile items like eggs and glass bottles with care.

With Instacart, you can:
• Find exclusive deals & coupons
•Create a shopping list
- Get same-day, contactless delivery. Or, a shopper will prepare your order for  contactless pickup.
•Reorder your favorite items from our wide selection of available products
•Buy food, fresh produce, drinks, and alcohol —all in 1 order
•View nutritional information & filter by your diet type.
•Use Group Carts to easily shop together with friends, family & neighbors

Grocery delivery made easy, where to shop with Instacart

Shop groceries from your favorite local grocery stores: Aldi, Publix, Costco, Safeway, Wegmans and 20,000 other retail locations in North America—for same-day pickup and delivery. And we are always adding more retail & grocery stores to our selection.

Download to shop groceries & see what stores are available in your zip code for contactless pickup and same-day delivery.

recentChanges: Delivering fresh groceries on your schedule means our app is always evolving. With this update, we've fixed a few underlying issues to give you the most seamless experience possible. Happy shopping!
comments: This app is awesome.......when it works! There have been many times it will not load an let me see adjustments being made with my groceries. Luckily for me the store contacts me personally to go over changes. However, I wouldn't expect them to need to do that with every customer. ^ Last week Today same thing...I was unable to approve changes to my groceries bc instacart was not working. My store was texting me pictures of changes being made. When I click the link it pop up a sad milk jug🤦‍♀️

Great app! Easy to navigate through and they offer lots of promotions that help offset the cost of any delivery fees. Our grocery store choices are limited, so this really helps being able to pick up at places that do not offer those options in store. Also, the communication while your order is being picked is by far the best compared to any others I have used!

I love Instacart, but recently the item photos do not always match with the product description. For instance, a photo will show a candy bar yet the description will say "cat food", and when you click the photo of the candy bar it indeed takes you to cat food instead. Very frustrating. Also, products do not always line up with the category being searched for. If I type "ibuprofen", I get results showing protein bars and toilet paper among the ibuprofen. My app is up to date.

Unfortunately I have to drop my rating of the app from 5 stars to 3. 🥺 Since the new update 10/22/20 I don't see where you can add "special requests" if you don't see the item you're looking for. That option especially comes in handy when you know the store sells a specific item at the store that not be very popular. Very frustrating Please fix. Thank you.

Love this! No more running to the store! I love that the shoppers keep in touch with you during shopping for replacement or to add a forgotten item. Refunds are quick and easy if there is an error, damaged item, or something is just not right...but i haven't had to use this feature much.. I also love that I get to choose my own substitutions, unlike ×××Mart, I no longer allow substitutions on most of my orders with them due to too many messed up items.

title: Alcohol Price Comparator
description:
This app allows you to compare two different alcoholic beverages to find out which one is cheaper by alcoholic content.

This is done by using three inputs from each beverage:
- Alcohol percentage 
- Volume in liters
- Price

So if you've ever wondered what gets you the most alcohol for the price, this app is for you.

title: Drink & Smiles: Drinking games
description:
PLAY THE MOST POPULAR DRlNKlNG GAMES IN YOUR SMARTPHONE!

• Challenge Accepted: Accept the challenges you're given, earn points and defeat the other players!
• Never have I ever / I never: More than 500 statements to drink and find out your friends' darkest secrets!
• Create your cards: Use your photos in your phone to create cards and design your own card games!
• Hot potato: Quick! Say something related to the topic and pass the potato before it explodes!
• Drinking Roulette: Do you feel lucky today? Let the Roulette decide what will happen to you! 
• FUBAR: Each card from the deck has a test to do. Will you get wasted before no more cards are left?
• High or low/Higher or lower: Make your guess about the next card, accumulate sips and make your friends drink!
• Naughty Slot Machine: Do you want to kiss (or something else) one of your friends? That might be your chance!
• Mime time! (Charades): Explain some words using mimic, earn points and make your rival team drink!
• Hangman: Try to guess your rival's phrase, but remember that you only have a few (and expensive) attempts!

...And many more like Lord of 3, Bastard dice and Custom FUBAR!


RULES FOR MORE THAN 90 CLASSIC DRINKING GAMES!

Use the search engine included in the app to find the game that better suits your needs. From dice and card games everyone knows to others that will impress you and your friends!


TRY THE APPLICATION EXTRAS!

✓ Deck of cards and dice included
✓ Create your own dice and card games
✓ Add, remove or edit as many tests as you want


Get some beer, shots, cocktails or any type of alcohol and enjoy the best games with cards, dice and many more with this app full of ideas to play!

title: Bottles: Grocery and liquor
description:

We’ve partnered with Pick n Pay to deliver all your grocery and liquor essentials: 
Same Day Delivery: Most areas of Johannesburg, Cape Town, Pretoria, Durban, Bloemfontein and Port Elizabeth.

recentChanges:
We update the app as often as possible to make it better, faster and easier to shop.
New updates include:
- We have added an Estimated Delivery Time during and after an order is placed
- You can now order anytime it suits you! Shop within our operating hours and get SAME DAY delivery. Shop when we close and get NEXT DAY delivery.
comments: Our second time using the app, and the second time it's been a mess. Order not 100% correct, and some items received unusable.

Disappointed, I've been placing orders with bottle app religiously with no issues, except 6days ago. My order was delivered with 5 items to be exact missing, I contacted the app's support team and the person assisting me said the driver will be back with the remaining stuff. I driver came back with only 2 items and said the rest was out of stock. However the invoice was not amended to show that there are items missing from the order. When I called again to ask for the refund was not helped

Have used the app a few times in the past month and I'm happy with it. Easy to use, refunds done as promised, delivery very fast. Have had a few "App has encountered an error" glitches but restores fairly quickly. It would be great if some of the product specials on the PnP site did pull through on the App and if we had the opportunity to still earn Smart Shopper points, but the daily Promos the App runs do sort of make up for it :-)

Check your delivery items shown on the invoice are not always delivered, again i have just had a short delivery. (Uodate)- Much improved and no more short deliveries, best thing about this is the service from bottles when they recieve a complaint they act without hesitation and rectify the problem, great app service.

Not the most customer centric app I've ever seen. Items in wrong categories. Items that are unavailable are allowed to be added to carts and paid for. Then someone calls you to tell you the product is unavailable and the transaction is reversed. The support function is copy and paste, and they couldn't care less about resolving the issues at hand. Sixty60 a much better bet.

title: Alcohol Units Calculator
description:
Ever wondered how many units there are in a drink? Ever sat in a pub and argued about that very point?  I have.  Many people just do not know how many units they are in the drink they are having.  Without this knowledge you are at a disadvantage when trying to decide when is enough.

A weak 3.6% pint of beer has 2 units in it. In the UK to remain within the drink drive limit you can have between 1-2 pints except that many pints are not 3.6%, many pints are 5.0%. So what difference does that make? Well a 5% beer has 2.84 units in it. Now the 1-2 pints is much closer to 1 than 2. This App can can be used to calculate the number of units in a drink

This App is not restricted in the amounts that can be entered unlike other similar Apps. You are not restricted by the values specified on picker wheels. You can enter ANY amounts using US fl Ozs, millilitres, centilitres, litres, UK pints.

Set the percentage alcohol, the volume and the number of drinks. The volume for the drink can be expressed in US fl Ozs, millilitres, centilitres, litres, UK pints using the switches above the drink amount.

As you enter value the calculated units change based on the current setting.  Change all the values that need to be changed and the calculated units will tell you the amounts of units of alcohol there are in a drink.

Most alcohol percentages are ABV but, especially in the US, ABW is used. There is a significant difference in the resulting units so it is important to get this selection correct.

Legal Disclaimer: Do not use this App as a guide to whether you can drive a car or not. This App is just for calculating the number of units consumed.

title: Alcounter - BAC Calculator
description:
Alcounter counts amount of alcohol in your blood based on gender, weight and amount and type of consumed alcohol. It then shows you the time remaing to soberity.
All values are approximate!

Alcounter is different than most of other blood alcohol content calculators available, because you use it while drinking and not after.

While drinking, the user enters the type of alcohol they drink, and immediately sees the approximate blood alcohol content and time to sober up. There are several (most common) types of alcohol to choose from and the option to enter your own. There will be more types available later.

The app will show notification after the selected time since last added alcohol to remind user, that he should not forget to enter another alcohol.


Features:
 - Option to show time remaining to soberity, or time when you will be sober.
 - Ability to add new types of alcohol
 - Notifications which remind you to add another alcohol.
 - Statistics about number of consumed alcohol today, and total.
 - Easy to use and intuitive UI

title: Alcohol Calculator
description: With this app you can calculate the mixing ratio to reduce alcohol. If, for example, 95% alcohol is available, but 40% is required, this app can calculate the mixing ratio of water and alcohol. You enter the percentage of the alcohol present, the percentage of the desired alcohol and the desired amount. As a result, you'll get the amount of alcohol present and the amount of water, which together result in the desired amount.

title: DeAlco - Daily Alcohol Intake Tracker
description:
DeAlco - Daily Alcohol Intake Tracker is a lightweight, simple app made to regulate your personal daily and weekly alcohol intake.

The app calculates and tracks alcohol units - a simple way of expressing the quantity of pure alcohol in a drink.

One unit is the amount of alcohol the average adult can process in an hour. The number of units in a drink is based on the size of the drink, as well as its alcohol strength.

Knowing your units will help you stay in control of your drinking.

title: Water Drinking Reminder - Water Tracker
description:
Do you drink enough water every day?
Do you always forget to drink water?

This Water Drinking Reminder is definitely what you need! 100% FREE!

Water Drinking Reminder - Water Tracker smartly reminds you to drink water every day. It helps you stay hydrated, and develop good habits of water drinking with a healthier body.

You only need to fill in information of your gender, weight, input your local weather and exercise frequency, then Water Drinking Reminder will calculate how much water you need to drink every day.

This drink water reminder app not only reminds you when it's time to replenish water, but also track your daily water intake. You can also reach your daily goal to get motivated achievements.

# Benefits of Drinking Water #
- Keep fit and lose weight
- Give you healthy skin
- Help muscle growth and recovery
- Help your body detoxify
- Promote digestion

Smart Reminder
- No disturbance. Won’t get reminders when you nap and sleep
- Customize your reminders, continue or stop receiving reminders after reaching your daily goal

Different Reminder Types
- Timed reminder: remind you at the set time
- Interval reminder: remind you according to the time interval you set

Intuitive Graph
- Record your daily water drinking
- Analyze your water drinking over day, week, month, and year
- Track your drinking water history

Daily Water Tracker
- Simple and intuitive interface, easy to use
- Diverse drinking menu, about 20 drinks to choose from
- Customize your daily goal
- Change the cup look and capacity
- Get motivated by unlocking achievement badges
- Calculate how much water you need to replenish every day based on your weight and gender
- Sync your health data with Google fit
- Backup and restore data by signing in with your Google account or Facebook account

In order to replenish water in time, a smart reminder is very necessary and helpful to our life. Download this wonderful Water Tracker for free now and share it with your family and friends! Let them join you and develop good drinking habits! We welcome your valuable feedback, your suggestions and requests are our sources of progress!

LifeFuels is a smart nutrition bottle that turns ordinary water into a drink packed with flavor, essential vitamins and nutrients. Use the LifeFuels app to unlock the full power of the LifeFuels Bottle.

DISPENSE YOUR WAY: Dispense your FuelPods from within the LifeFuels app. The LifeFuels app lets you control the strength of your beverage.

title: Alcord - Alcohol Tracker
description:
Alcord is an easy to use alcohol tracker, blood alcohol content calculator and drinks diary.
Alcord estimates your blood alcohol content and displays your status in real-time based on the drinks you have logged. Alcord maintains a timeline and logbook of your alcohol usage.

Alcord is easy to use while having fun for example in restaurants, bars, and pubs.

Alcord – Alcohol Tracker will be constantly improved and new features added after release.  You can send feedback with the in-app Send Feedback functionality.

AMAZING FEATURES: 
- all relevant information can view at a glance.
- adding drinks is made quick and easy.  
- create your own drinks – choose alcoholic and non-alcoholic ingredients and Alcord 
  calculates the alcohol content. 
- includes drink recipe book for most common drinks and cocktails.
- share your drinking status. 
- choose the type of drink and your drinking speed.
- log a drink later if you forgot to do it right away. 
- tailor personalized notifications for yourself.  
- the BAC-chart indicates your past, current, projected BAC and when you get to sobriety.   
- add food and other incidents influencing your BAC. 
- choose a brighter Theme and display for restaurants, bars, and pubs with dim light conditions.
- browse the logbook and see the details of any saved drinking session.
- view the BAC-chart and details of your past drinking sessions.
- view extensive statistics such as maximums, totals, and averages.
- track your progress and unlock in-app badges.	
- choose units that you are familiar with. 
- choose most common options for displaying BAC-values.
- give a name for your drinking session.
- set it to take into account your size, age, gender and metabolism.

PROFILE & SETTINGS
Alcord has very versatile settings. You can set it to take into account your size, age, gender and metabolism. Settings offer alternatives for you to adjust Alcord to units that you are familiar with. Alcord supports US, imperial and metric units, and offers many unit options for displaying BAC-values.

DISPLAY&VIEWS:
You can see at a glance all the information about your on-going drinking session on all views. You can change the view by swiping the display of your device.

ADDING DRINKS:
Adding drinks is also made quick and easy.  You may choose the name, volume and alcohol content of your drink freely. Add drinks to your Favorites for a quick access later. Select a drink from a list of the most recent drinks, or choose a drink from the Recipes book.  You may also create their drinks by using Alcord's Drink Mixer.

TIMELINE AND LOGBOOK 
By logging your drinks you will see it all on your timeline and maintain a logbook of your drinking and drinking habits. You can browse the timeline and logbook and see the details of any drinking session.  Alternatively you can view monthly or all-time statistics.

DISCLAIMER & WAIVER:
Alcord – Alcohol Trackers blood alcohol content estimations and projections are for entertainment purposes only.  Alcord does not substitute any real blood alcohol testing such as breathalyzers or blood tests.  Alcord is not to be used to estimate whether user’s blood alcohol content levels are acceptable for operating machinery or motor vehicles.

title: Stop Alcohol Addiction With Hypnosis
description:
John Carberry has developed this app to take control of alcohol & stop binge drinking, to provide you with the support to reduce alcohol in the privacy of your own home.


If you do not want to stop drinking altogether but would instead like to reduce down alcohol to a safe limit as they may be concerned about health issues, are tired of feeling sluggish or alcohol is impacting on work performance and career this is still the app for you.


The thing with addiction is that, often, there are a number of underlying issues that have led to the problem. Whether it be a traumatic event, a past experience or a number of stressors, if you have turned to alcohol or another substance as a way of self-medicating, the issue hasn’t been dealt with. Somewhere deep down, the effects are still there, quietly fuelling your addiction.


Alcohol Addiction Hypnosis looks to change the way you think and behave in certain situations. Hypnosis for drinking aims to access your unconscious (the part of your mind that runs without you knowing), and using suggestion techniques, help you change the negative thoughts and behaviours associated with the addiction.

title: Alcohol. Breathalyzer test
description:
Virtual breathalyzer

Application on your mobile on the basis of these data will determine the status of alcohol in the blood. The results are given in the form of a diagram. This makes it easier to specify the time of sobriety. All the data you enter with a touch screen. Weight, time to start drinking, drinking duration and amount of alcohol consumed is saved by the program.

Application results are for guidance only! Remember, this application gives only approximate values do not take into account many individual factors that influence the metabolism of the human body.

title: Tasty Cocktails
description:
Very simple and useful application for searching cocktail recipes. All cocktails have description and recipe with a list of ingredients. A random cocktail feature can bring a lot of fun for you. You can mark liked drinks as favorite and watch them in the favorites section

The main section provides full cocktails list with easy search and filtering functionality.
Top 30 represents 30 most favorite app community cocktails.

If you lost an interesting drink you can find it in drinks history, which shows a list of already seen cocktails. 
Cocktails you like you can mark as favorite and it became available in the favorites section

Random drink feature it small game witch always shows random drink. This feature has filters by ingredient, allows to return random cocktail with a specified ingredient.

All cocktails have a description with the detailed recipe and list of ingredients. 
You can mark liked drinks as favorite and watch them in the favorites section

Features:
- 574 available drinks 
- Search cocktail recipes in library
- Filter by category, ingredient, glass or alcoholic/non-alcoholic
- Top 30 the most popular recipes
- Fun feature random cocktail
- Favorite drinks.  Each liked drink will be stored in the favorites section
- Watched drinks history

title: Alcohols Phenols and Ethers
description:
From this App you can learn :

Define, classify and name the alcohols, phenols and ethers. 
Discuss the structure and physical properties of alcohols, phenols and ethers.
Describe the significance, preparation methods, physical, chemical properties and uses of important alcohols, methanol and ethanol.
Explain the acidic behavior of phenol.
Give effect of substituents on acidity of phenol.
Describe the importance, structure, physical properties, preparation methods, chemical reactions and uses of ethers. 
Compare the properties of alcohols and phenols.
Compare the properties of isomeric alcohols and ethers.

More details please visit http://www.wonderwhizkids.com/


"Wonderwhizkids.com" hosts concept oriented content in Maths & Sciences
specially designed for K-8 to K-12 grades. "Wonderwhizkids (WWK) enables
students to enjoy learning with application oriented, visually rich
content which is simple and easy to understand. The content is aligned to
best practices of learning and teaching.

Students can develop strong basics, critical thinking and problem
solving skills to do well in school and beyond. Teachers can use WWK as a
reference material to be more creative in designing engaging learning
experiences. Parents also can actively participate in their child's
development through WWK".

This topic covers under Chemistry subject as a part of the Organic Chemistry topic
and this topic contains following sub topics
Alcohols,Phenols and Ethers
Preparation of Methyl alcohol
Phenols
Ethers

title: SoberApp  - Alcohol Calculator
description:
SoberApp is much more than your ordinary breathalyzer app - We're here to take care of all your drinking needs.

The app was features in the Top 10 Hottest Apps list by AppBrain.com.

"SoberApp is an easy way to monitor the number of drinks you’ve had and estimate your BAC, all to increase safety and awareness when you’re out for a good time." By bestandroidappsreview.com.

Simply enter some basic information(weight, gender), what you've been drinking and when, and the app will tell you if you can drive now and how long will it be until you could, in case you crossed the BAC limit in your country.

Features – 

* Browse over 3100 drinks – SoberApp is the only app that contains a large database of drinks and brands(over 3100!) with high-quality photos instead of general picks, so you could pick exactly what you've been drinking.

* New feature! Introducing the Reaction Test! Compare between your reaction time when sober to your reaction time after drinking using a simple reaction game.

* The app can recognize your general location and adjust itself to the local law in your country for more accurate calculations.

* Find a taxi - We can help you find a nearby taxi to take you back home(or to the next pub) so you'll never get left behind.

* Scan drinks & voice recognition - Experience new ways to search your drinks. Scan their barcodes or use voice recognition to find your drinks easily and efficiently.

* Share drinks - Share what you've been drinking and ask for a ride. How else would the world be familiar with your drinking habits?

* Find nearby pubs – Find nearby bars around you so you could keep on drinking(without driving of course).

* Found a drink we don't have? Made a cool cocktail? Just add it to the program! You may take pictures of your drinks, and the app can calculate your cocktail's ABV.

* The app supports both US and Metric units, and allows tons of customization.

* Statistics - the app offers a statistics pages with many fun facts.


We bring you SoberApp free of charge and without any ads!

We strongly encourage you send us emails with new drinks, so we could create an even larger database of drinks.
Our email is- 
info@sober-app.com

You can visit our website at – 
www.sober-app.com

Or follow us on Facebook - 
http://www.facebook.com/soberapp

Or follow us on Twitter - 
http://twitter.com/SoberApp

Permissions explained - 
Internet - For Facebook integration and for finding nearby taxis and bars.
Camera - To take pictures of your custom drinks and to allow barcode scans.
Access Coarse(Network-Based) Location –  For finding nearby taxis and bars.

Enjoy - and remember, don't drink and drive!

recentChanges:
Version 1.1.1-
=========
* Graphical improvements.

* Bug fixes

* Added more drinks and sizes to choose from.

Version 1.1-
==========
* New feature! Introducing the Reaction Test! Compare between your reaction time when sober to your reaction time after drinking using a simple reaction game.

* Several graphical improvements and tweaks.

* Improved the 'Find a Taxi' feature - it can now find many more taxis around you.

comments: Needs to work past midnight 12am 24:00. After midnight it thinks your drinks before midnight haven't even happened till 23:00 post day. (future).        Thank you for fixing this bug. This has been taken care of.

The app is just Ok. Many beers have incorrect alcohol content. Custom quantity input doesn't allow decimals to accommodate brewers movement to 11.2 ounce bottles. Input of drink time is ambiguos. Does it expect the time you got the drink, or finished it? Huge difference in BAC calculations.  The app needs some work.

Guys... if you "ADD" a drink and then remove it... it does not remove it from your BAC!  Also if you edit drink it does not update the BAC correctly.  I had to reset my night and re enter all my drinks :(   PLEASE FIX! love this app!

The biggest flaw is that you log the drink time once.  When should you add the drink?.  When i start or finish? For example I took my first sip, and the app said I was almost at the limit.  This is completely incorrect.  Alcohol is absorbed over time at a rate which differs by gender.  Alcohol is metabolized at a consistent rate.  For this app to be even remotely useful you need to enter a start time and end time.  All this simulates is me injecting 2 oz of alcohol into a vein.  Useless...
Very wild calculations especially after midnight.  .33 after four beers in 5 hours and 17 hours until I can drive is way off a good estimate. I do get what you are doing though so get it right.

description: By the method of Subliminal Suggestion, this app attempts to reduce the user's cravings for alcohol.  The user is presented with a video to watch to achieve this goal.  It is necessary for the user to watch the video for 2 to 3 minutes, twice a day to achieve reduced alcohol dependency.  With time the user should achieve the results he or she desires.  The user should be able to read English to use this app.

title: Drinkies
description:
"Drinkies is the number 1 drinks delivery service in Malaysia. We deliver chilled drinks right to your doorstep! 🍺

Carrying drinks home is ancient history with Drinkies: choose from a wide selection of premium beers, wines, spirits and ciders and get it delivered chilled to your door within a few taps. Whether you’re hosting a party or just want to order drinks for a cozy night in; with our same day and scheduled delivery options you’re always assured of chilled drinks at the moment you want. 

Here’s how it works:
1.	Open the app and select your delivery location
2.	Pick your favorite drinks
3.	Choose your preferred delivery time
4.	Pay with debit or credit card, PayPal or online banking and more directly from the app
5.	Track your delivery
6.	Enjoy your chilled drinks!

Why ordering from Drinkies:
-	Save time: with Drinkies, you always have a wide selection of premium brands right at your fingertips
-	Save money: keep an eye out for our latest promotions to save on chilled drinks at home
-	Be the star host: have your drinks delivered the same day or whenever works best for you

Please reach out to us via support@drinkies.my if you have any questions.

Enjoy responsibly. This app is allowed for non-Muslims 21+ only. Delivery coverage is currently only available in Ipoh, Johor Bahru, Kuala Lumpur, Kuantan, Melaka, Penang, Selangor and Seremban.

Cheers,

Drinkies"

title: dilute Whisky / Alcohol
description:
Alcohol and water contract during mixing, so there is no formula for diluting alcohol, only tables for reference.
This app has an internal table and considers the contraction of alcohol and water in the calculations.
The calculations are possible in all directions. You can set the desired drinking strength as well as the amount of water or the desired amount of the diluted mixture.

title: Drinks Meter
description:
Drinks Meter offers anonymous, objective feedback on your alcohol use and comparison to thousands of people’s drinking habits worldwide.

It’s not just about the drinks — it’s about who you are, how you drink and the impact it has on your life.

So, if you want to see what your drinking equates to in cheeseburgers, your score on a medical alcohol screener or just how it all adds up, Drinks Meter shows how you compare.

Your drinking in cost, calories and units
• Weekly drink calculator with drink types, strengths and bottle/glass sizes from around the world
• Weekly total in units and standard sized drinks
• Weekly financial spend
• Calorie counter — measure your drinks in cheeseburgers, chocolate bars and potato chips

Measure and compare to the anonymous database
• Comparison to over 6,000 other people’s anonymous drinking habits worldwide
• World Health Organisation alcohol AUDIT screener used by doctors worldwide
• Adjusted alcohol consumption based on your medical and family history
• Comparison to national alcohol guidelines

Get objective, personalised advice
• Why risks matter — from heart medication to mental health
• Tips for the future and cutting down
• Alcohol laws, driving and safer sex advice
• Links to NHS services (UK only)

Save and track your drinking
• Potential health, alcoholic unit, calorie and financial savings if potentially unnecessary drinks are removed
• Drinks tracker
• On-screen and email results summary

Notes

All information you submit to Drinks Meter is unidentifiable and untraceable.

Drinks Meter stores the anonymous data from all submissions and compiles an ever-growing database which future results are then compared to, to build a picture of how people are drinking around the world.

Drinks Meter isn’t funded by any government, political party or industry body and is committed to giving honest, accurate information by working with medical experts from around the world.

Drinks Meter was developed by Dr. Adam R. Winstock MBBS, BSc, MSc, MD, MRCP, MRCPsych, FAChAM — a Consultant Psychiatrist and Addiction Medicine Specialist from the UK and Australia.

comments: Sign up is poorly thought out. Recording ok but no where to OK. Have had to record the same three times. Why????????? Back arrows is FAR FAR FAR FAR too small. There is also TINY 'x' but no OK or next or accept or anything. No way to go back to menu. No simple overview of alcohol types. Eg gin is very different to whiskey. Spirit is wide so should have options. Needs LOTS more work to be used friendly.
Almost exactly what I was looking for! Good design. But you can't track your daily intake or keep a history. Bit buggy at times.

First time using this app, alcohol consum of the last 7 days is asked. When clicking on the "+" the page where you can choose a drink also recognises this click and a drink is choosed right away. Please fix this bug!
Well written. Great educational value. Very useful
I actually think this app is awesome but there's no way to give feedback within the app. It would be good to include other currencies other than euros.

title: TopShelf Alcohol Delivery & Pickup
description:
“TopShelf offers a streamlined way to order beer, wine, and liquor with the touch of a button, the perfect solution for any event where the well has run dry.” 

It seamlessly connects you to local liquor stores in your area. Our alcohol delivery can be used for a night in, gifting, pre-gaming, parties, weddings, corporate events, office happy hours, catering, tailgates, BYOB venues, for the disabled, elderly, and much more!

Place your order, sit back, and relax. 
Your alcohol will be delivered in under 60 minutes.
Download TopShelf now for the high-quality alcohol delivery experience you deserve! 
Still, need some convincing? Receive free delivery on your first order using the promo code: TOPSHELFLIFE

- Order on-demand or schedule a delivery at your convenience.
- Scheduled Deliveries: choose a date and time to have your favorite beer, wine, and spirits delivered, up to 1 month in advance.
- New In-Store Pickup option: select In-Store Pickup from the main menu, browse products, pay online, and pick up your order in store.
- Don’t have the address of your current area? 
We’ll find it for you using automatic geolocation.
- Read full product descriptions, so you can browse, search, and order with confidence.
- Purchase accessories, ice, mixers, and garnishes along with your favorite beverages.
- Gifting: easily send alcohol as a gift to your client, significant other, family member, boss, or buddy you lost that bet to, simply select the gift option and add the gift recipient’s information at checkout.

*Must be of legal drinking age with a valid ID to order and pick up or receive a delivery (IDs are verified)
descriptionHTML:
“TopShelf offers a streamlined way to order beer, wine, and liquor with the touch of a button, the perfect solution for any event where the well has run dry.”

It seamlessly connects you to local liquor stores in your area. Our alcohol delivery can be used for a night in, gifting, pre-gaming, parties, weddings, corporate events, office happy hours, catering, tailgates, BYOB venues, for the disabled, elderly, and much more!

Place your order, sit back, and relax.
Your alcohol will be delivered in under 60 minutes.
Download TopShelf now for the high-quality alcohol delivery experience you deserve!
Still, need some convincing? Receive free delivery on your first order using the promo code: TOPSHELFLIFE

- Order on-demand or schedule a delivery at your convenience.
- Scheduled Deliveries: choose a date and time to have your favorite beer, wine, and spirits delivered, up to 1 month in advance.
- New In-Store Pickup option: select In-Store Pickup from the main menu, browse products, pay online, and pick up your order in store.
- Don’t have the address of your current area?
We’ll find it for you using automatic geolocation.
- Read full product descriptions, so you can browse, search, and order with confidence.
- Purchase accessories, ice, mixers, and garnishes along with your favorite beverages.
- Gifting: easily send alcohol as a gift to your client, significant other, family member, boss, or buddy you lost that bet to, simply select the gift option and add the gift recipient’s information at checkout.

*Must be of legal drinking age with a valid ID to order and pick up or receive a delivery (IDs are verified)
summary: TopShelf seamlessly connects you to local liquor stores in your area!
recentChanges:
We update the TopShelf app as often as possible to make it faster and give you the best experience possible. Here are some enhancements you'll find in this update:

- This release includes bug fixes and offers an improved performance for all devices.

Have a retailer or brand recommendation? Have suggestions or ideas? Have a bug to report? We love your feedback! You can email our team at support@topshelfapp.com. Thank you for being a part of the TopShelf family!

title: DrinkLess
description:
Do you want to know your current blood alcohol concentration? Or when you get sober after that second glass of wine you had on dinner? Do you need to evaluate your alcohol usage or learn more about health effects of drinking alcohol? You can do all this and more with DrinkLess self care software! DrinkLess is developed by medical doctors. With DrinkLess you can also monitor your alcohol usage with automated drinking diary.

DrinkLess supports for metric, UK and US measurement systems. It is multilingual (English, Finnish, French, Spanish, Portuguese, Swedish and German). Modifiable drink options can be fully customized to suit your purpose.

Take control of your drinking habits today!

title: FreshDirect: Grocery, Food & Alcohol Delivery
description:
Fill your fridge in just a few taps with the FreshDirect app. We’ll deliver to your door the best in seasonal farm-fresh food, local items, high-quality meat, and chef-prepared meals, plus your favorite grocery brands. You can also stock up on beer, plus get wine, alcohol, and liquor delivered through FreshDirect Wines & Spirits. 

FreshDirect serves the New York City, Philadelphia, and Washington, DC metro regions, along with surrounding areas in the northeast. Unlike traditional supermarkets or supermarket delivery, we source directly from farmers, fishermen, and ranchers, so there's less handling by middlemen, more money for producers, and food arrives to you fresher.

Perks of Using the FreshDirect App:

• Easily place or modify an order for grocery delivery from your mobile device.
• Find just what you’re looking for or discover something new with our easy-to-use search, browsable categories, and curated lists.
• Discover what’s great right now by shopping our top-rated fruit, vegetables, and seafood. 
• Check out available timeslots and schedule a delivery - express and same-day options available in select areas.
• Easily get your grocery shopping done by browsing previous orders, shopping lists, and favorites.
• Quickly get in touch with our customer service team whenever you have a question.

About FreshDirect:
FreshDirect is based in New York and has been the northeast’s leading online grocery store since 2002. We build deep and direct relationships with farmers and producers and invest in the technology that allows us to deliver food to our customers at its freshest. For more information, visit www.freshdirect.com

comments: Love FreshDirect, but this app is unacceptable. Ridiculously slow, buggy, constantly hanging and closing itself. Just a pain to use. It's been bad for a long time, and I just assumed they'd get around to fixing it eventually... Guess not.
Latest version adds everything to your cart TWICE!!! PLEASE FIX ASAP

Not Too Good Nothing but trouble trying to use this app on my Samsung tablet. Was not able to fill in my address and it kept defaulting to Required fields but would not keep the fields filled and my work address and zip code kept popping up even though this is a home delivery. Plus, I'm not even at work, have never ordered from work, so after a frustrating 20 minutes, I gave up. Do not reccomend!

Not functional most of the time every other update it seems that they fix the app somewhat and with the next they break it again the delete button does not work for removing items that aren't available so I can't go through with my order. I installed the app on my iPhone and it works just fine. Android needs the same energy you have for iOS fresh direct

Crashes and freezes Frequently locks my phone up completely for like 30 seconds, then I finally can force quit the app. Even when it doesn't freeze and crash it's very very slow. The actual food delivery service is fantastic! I'm very happy with it! But the app is garbage.

title: Sober Tree - Quit Alcohol Addiction
description:
Sober Tree application help you to control your alcohol drinking habit.

This application will help you to identify main reasons behind your alcohol addiction.

Sober Tree motivates you to fight with your alcohol addiction.

This app will give you different challenges to complete.

Main challenge is for you to grow tree forest every month.

You just have to enter your daily alcohol drinking status details in this app honestly.

Believe me this app will change your life.

You can see previous records of your alcohol consumption.

You can see analyzed report according to time period in this app.

You can also chat with other community members.

This application also provide you lot of motivational content which will help you to overcome from alcohol drinking habit.
