title: Seven Drinking Game
descriptionHTML:
A drinking game to warm up your party! Seven is perfect for a group of people who are ready to be slammed by laugh and booze!

All you need to start is:
- Three (or more) awesome buddies, who're ready for some fun!
- Delicious alcohol (the more the better);
- And last but not least, the will to push yourself into alcoholic craziness!

This app features:
- Simple yet entertaining gameplay;
- More than 400 brilliant cards, each with a unique task;
- Pleasant and memorable atmosphere;
- Delightful graphics and beautifully illustrated cards;
- 3 game modes;
- You can create your own cards;
- The ability to remove unwanted cards from your deck;
- No any annoying ads.

While the game features alcohol, please remember to drink responsibly. Have fun!

title: Tula Alcohol and Wellness
description:
Tula provides 24/7 support to help people reduce their drinking. Features include an anonymous support network, articles and information related to drinking reduction and overall wellness, relaxation and mindfulness exercises, a weekly check-in and drink tracker.

Tula is based on the Comprehensive Health Enhancement Support System (CHESS), an evidence-based framework developed at the Center for Health Enhancement System Studies at the University of Wisconsin.

title: Sura - Liquor, Alcoholic Beverages and Cocktails
description:
Sura is the number one mobile platform about liquor and other alcoholic beverages in Sri Lanka. As an Asian country we are proud to introduce Sura with many interesting features to its users. We believe that people should drink responsibly. So Sura comes with a ‘Body Alcohol Content Meter’ which helps its users to prevent from harmful incidents. The BAC meter shows the current Body Alcohol Content level of the user and the time that needs to recover the body after having drinks. Using Sura, users can find many more things about liquor and alcoholic beverages. 

In Sri Lankan context, this app provides one platform for users where they can get knowledge about liquor types like Vodka, Rum, Tequila, Wine, Whisky, Brandy and Beer. It has a collection of cocktail recipes that anyone can try at home as well. Users can find the current market price of any kind of local and foreign alcoholic beverages through the app. 
The most interesting feature in Sura is that, it sends you notifications when it’s a good day to have a drink. This is sent to users based on many factors like weather, holidays etc. Users can invite their friends through the app and can connect with Facebook, WhatsApp, Viber or Messenger to share fun memes with each other. App comes with two languages which are Sinhala and English. The default language will be Sinhala but if needed users can change it to English from settings.

#Disclaimer:

By developing Sura, we are not encouraging people to Drink. We believe people should drink responsibly. Our vision is to provide one platform for Sri Lankan liquor and beverage users where they can find interesting features while using the app.

#Key Features:

·  Updated market prices of liquor and other alcoholic beverages.

·  BAC meter which measures current ‘Body Alcohol Content’ and notify the time that needs to recover the body from last drink.

·  Automatic notifications prior on the best days to have a drink.

·  Details about various liquor types in the world.

·  Cocktail recipes that can try at home.

·   Invite friends to have a drink.

·   Share fun memes among friends in social media platforms like Facebook.
 
Please tell us in the comment section, how happy you are by using our app. 
Contact us on sura.app.info@gmail.com or our Facebook page https://www.facebook.com/suraAppLk/ for any concern and let us know the new things you are looking forward from Sura.
 In future updates we are planning to add more new interesting features. Stay tuned with us.

Have fun, but drink Responsibly!
- Greetings from Sura -

title: Cocktail Flow - Drink Recipes
description:
Cocktail Flow features beautifully presented cocktail recipes with step by step guides and features you’ll love whether you’re a novice bartender or a professional mixologist. Now we've infused the app with carefully selected premium content and features to make Cocktail Flow better every day. 

★ MY BAR, MY CABINET
Mark the cocktail ingredients you have at home in the cabinet page and see what drinks you can make from them. The cabinet contains a large number of spirits, liquors and mixers.

★ FIND THE COCKTAIL YOU’RE LOOKING FOR
Browse cocktail recipes by categories or using the advanced search function. Drink recipes are categorized by base drink (gin, rum, tequila, vodka, brandy, champagne), type (classical, long drink, tropical, creamy, shooter, non-alcoholic), strength (Light, Medium, Strong) and color (red, blue, green, pink, yellow).

★ COCKTAIL LIBRARY OVERHAUL
THe updated cocktail libary includes carefully chosen and verified cocktail recipes with personalised guidence and beautiful imagery. We reviewed our complete library and added cocktails with precise preparation steps, reference to the source and additional tips to make your drink even more special.

★ COCKTAIL FLOW PREMIUM
With Cocktail Flow Premium you can unlock 400+ premium cocktails with personalized guidance every step of the way. You can also add your own notes to any cocktail in the app and start creating your own cocktails to make the 

★ FAVORITES
Mark drink recipes you like as favorites to find them easily next time. 

★ MISSING SOMETHING? LET US KNOW
We are constantly expanding the existing packages as well as adding new ones. If there are any suggestions you have, please send them to team@cocktailflow.com

★ AND FINALLY: SIT BACK, SIP AND ENJOY
Now that you’ve created a Negroni, Singapore Sling, Pina Colada, Bloody Mary, Zombie, Moscow Mule, B52, Daiquiri, Mint Julep, White Lady, Sex on the Beach, Vesper, Manhattan, Lemon Drop, Mai Tai, Cuba Libre, Sea Breeze, Long Island Ice Tea, Cosmopolitan, Margarita, Tequila Sunrise or any other cocktail – sip and enjoy. And always remember to drink responsibly.

★ CONTACT US
We love hearing from you so if you have any questions or suggestions, drop us an email at team@cocktailflow.com and we’ll do our best to reply.

recentChanges:

● Introducing Cocktail Books section in Assistant - Check out our most beloved books we are using to pick the best recipes for You
● Smaller improvements and fixes to keep the app smooth and fresh

PS #1 - We are eager to hear your feedbacks - drop us a line anytime if you have an idea what you would like to see in the app - team@cocktailflow.com
comments: As a bartender this has helped massively with both my job and home. I often make cocktails in work that are requested by customers, some of which, are off the menu and with this app I no longer have to scroll through 5 Googled recipes. At home I make cocktails for friends and family and this makes finding available cocktails with what ingredients I have available so much easier.

The lack of an ability to filter for cocktails that you can make ruins the utility of this otherwise amazing app. There is no good reason for the "cocktails by ingredient/strength/color/era" and "cocktails I can make" to be separate lists. By separating them, the utility of both are ruined. If you decide, "I want to make something strong with rum tonight" you need to flip back and forth between the two views (3 clicks apart) and scan both lists with your eyeballs to find a match
This app comes highly rated but I find it is suffering from the premium program. A lot of basic stuff is blocked unless you pay which is offered for free by other apps.

this app used to be free and offer way more then what they offer now. it's ashame they used to sell random holiday based packs but now everything is locked behind a pay wall. this app is very well put together and I loved it in the past but unfortunately since coming to android from when I had it way back on my windows phone I won't be using an app I can look up recipes on google for free especially at the price this app is charging
Best $20 i ever spent. In addition to cocktail recipes, it tracks what i have on hand and suggests drinks from that. It also lets you track your variations on the beverages. Im very pleased,

title: Intoxication Calculator
description:
The Intoxication Calculator app estimates blood alcohol concentration, estimated time until sober, impairments and more for multiple users. These calculations are based on the provided data: weight, gender, drinks consumed and time spent drinking.

The results are derived from the "Widmark Formula", a widely used formula developed by Swedish physician Erik MP Widmark who performed research regarding alcohol kinetics in the body.

Easily add your own drinks to the drink menu or choose from a list of common drinks.

Intoxication Calculator works in real time to provide impairment estimations of multiple users.

comments: It's handy for estimating, but has no feature to calculate drink by drink. It could accept a separate time for each drink and add the total of result calculations but instead you can only set one time drinking for all drinks. Therefore it's a bit more dangerous than another calculator that has a little bit more functionality.

I'd give it 5 stars but if your bac drops to 0 for a while, added drinks show no effect. needs to have an if bac equals zero then reset. Currently you have to manually reset drinking time if it has been a while since your last drink has passed through your system. If not you can drink two beers and it says bac 0
pretty cool id love to find out how accurate it was when compared to a breathalyzer !

title: APK - Alkohol Per Krona
description:
What is APK (Alcohol Per Krona)?!
How much alcohol (ml) you get for 1 krona (SEK). The higher number, the more alcohol for your money.

The app helps you browse Systembolaget's (Government-owned liquor stores in Sweden) all products by APK! Browse the products in your favourite Systembolaget store

When all the CSN is by Christmas taken
But you don’t want your New Years to be forsaken.
How much Alcohol for each krona can you get?
We have the app to help you, don’t fret.

Supports dark mode.

Drink responsibly.

title: Alcohol Liquor Beer Collectors
description:
** Also look for our apps on Windows, Mac, and iOS devices! ** 

Quickly catalog, filter, sort, and manage all of the alcohol and beer you own. View size, brand, and add personal details. All types of alcohol and beer! 


Here are just a handful of the features you get with this app: 

- Create a free account and store your alcohol and beer collection list in the cloud online. Access from any device any time! 

- Create a Wishlist of existing and new alcohol and beer that you'd like to eventually own. 

- Filter an Sort on any field of information. 

- A coverflow view to see all of your alcohol and beer when you turn your device sideways. 

- Sort with the words The and A in the title. 

- Library or List views. View your collection as you'd see it on a wall. 

- Add your person details to alcohol and beer: Purchase Price, Storage Location, etc. 

- Edit any alcohol and beer details that are incorrect. All of our data is user driven so correct it as need and it will fix it for everyone! 

- Support for all brands, year, size, distillery, and more. 

- High resolution pictures for each alcohol and beer. 

- Shake to select a random item in your collection. 

- Offline viewing of collection, export your collection, extra themes, and more coming soon!

Check out other apps by Sort It! Apps to manage most any collection you own.

title: Drinks and Cocktail Recipes !
description:
Completely Offline & FREE collection of 10000+ drink recipes with step by step guide - both for a novice bartender or a professional mixologist. Each recipe comes with picture of drink glass used,ingredients & detailed instructions for preparation.

Need easy homemade drink recipes for a party?  Best cocktail recipes app for android with delicious drinks recipes containing step by step instructions on how to make them. Try random cocktail recipes based on the classic drink, liquor mixers, and glassware. A personal cocktails making assistant & a bartending recipes app detailing how to make drinks for bar tending. Know what bartenders are putting into your expensive drinks from this bartending guide.

This app has all the beverages recipes on base drinks (gin/ rum/ tequila/ vodka/ brandy/ champagne) and types (classical/ long drink/ tropical/ creamy/ shooter/ non-alcoholic) for events (New Years, Christmas, Valentine's Day) in several colors (red, blue, green, pink, yellow).

Experts in alcoholic drinks recipes are generally called cocktail masters. Become a cocktail master today with this drink recipes app! Its always fun going to a bar to watch a cocktail bartender doing mixology. After good food its good to have a cocktail flow down your throat.  Martini and mojito are very famous in Mexican & Spanish recipes. If you’re new to bar tending you’ll find the guide on the types of glassware used for making cocktails at the top right of each recipe in this app.

App Features:

* All Drinks: This section features all the recipes in this drinks apps.
* By Category: Displays the recipes by categories like Margaritas drinks/ Mocktail recipes/ Martini recipes/ Beer recipes/ Irish Coffee recipes/ Tequlia mixes., etc.
* By Ingredients: If you have a list of ingredients but dont have any idea on what to make, mark the cocktail ingredients you have at home in this page and see what drinks you can make from them. Contains large options of spirits, liquors and mixers.
* Popular Drinks: Displays the popular liquor drinks recipes commonly made like cosmpolitan, bloody mary, irish coffee, pina coladas, mojito cocktail drinks, etc.
* My Favourites: Bookmarking cocktails and recipes made easy. Click on the star on top of each recipe page to add to favourite to view later. Click on star again to remove it.
* Feedback: Please provide us with a good rating if you like this FREE offline cocktails app.
* View all drink recipes with picture of drink glass used in this easy cocktail maker.
* A simple how to make drinks app with new best cocktails updated frequently.

You can also email us your custom recipes and let others know you are a smart mixologist. Always remember to drink responsibly at the beverage counter / liquor centre.

title: GottoJab - Alcohol Test
description:
GottoJab estimates the amount of alcohol present in the body.

The algorithm used takes into account various physical conditions in order to obtain results very close to reality, these results represent only a "prediction" and cannot assume legal value.

Drink responsibly, drive only when sober.

title: Virtual Bar
description:
The Virtual Bar uses the latest science to help you not only get a better understanding of how different factors affect your blood-alcohol concentration – or BAC – on an individual level, but also can help you see how your night could go depending on the food you eat, the water you drink throughout the night, and other important variables. It also helps give you a sense of how long it would take for your BAC to return to 0.00, which we think will surprise you. What’s more? The Virtual Bar will tell you how you might actually be feeling at different BAC levels to help you relate to and better understand the differences between BAC levels. That’s right, we know exactly how you’re feeling. We so get you. Try out the Virtual Bar, and help us help you help yourself.
 
Disclaimer:
This is not intended as a scientific tool for measuring Blood Alcohol Concentration (BAC), but is rather designed to help adults of legal drinking age understand the factors that affect their BAC. The information presented should not take the place of your own responsible decisions about drinking alcohol, or about whether and when it will be safe for you to drive. The effects of alcohol vary among individuals because of many factors and may be different for the same person at different times. The BACs shown are solely for illustrative purposes, and do not reflect the interaction of alcohol with prescription, over-the-counter, or illegal drugs. Mixing any drug with alcohol can be dangerous to you and to others.

This is the most in depth and useful BAC calculator I've ever seen. Very useful, I love how in depth the explanations of your impairment are. I also love how the app tells you what state laws are/where you're in violation as you go up in BAC. I'm giving this app 5 stars because it's super useful, but I'd definitely like to see more drink options added.

title: Tapster - Alcohol Delivery
description:
Tapster is your trusted friend when it comes to alcohol delivery. From nips to kegs and everything in between, we’ve got what you need. Just tap the app to shop local stores for the widest selection and best deals in the Boston area.

— VIP Service
With professional, in-house drivers and around the clock support staff, you can rest assured that your booze will be delivered on-time and in-tact. 

— Whatever Your Pleasure 
We partner with only the best local purveyors of alcohol to offer a wide variety of brands and pricing options. Because a night in can be just as good as a night on the town.

— Licensed Keg Delivery
We’re called Tapster for a reason. As the only app that offers licensed keg delivery in the Boston area, we’ll bring the party to you. Whether it’s a residence or corporate event, we handle the stairs so you can handle the pouring.

Tapster is more than an alcohol delivery service. We are bringers of quality libations, leisure activities and personalized home entertainment. And we’ll never steer you wrong.

title: Alcohol Addiction Advice
description:
You will find simple guidelines for alcohol addicts so they can change their lifestyle and have a better life. Alcoholism is an addiction. Alcohol is a legal, controlled substance that lowers anxiety and inhibitions. It also has a broad range of side effects, from loss of coordination to slurred speech. Not everyone who drinks is an alcoholic, but anyone whose life is negatively affected by alcohol on a consistent basis is considered to have an alcohol use disorder. Alcohol is commonly consumed as a drink in various forms, including beer, wine and hard liquor.
Alcohol Addiction Advice gives you information on how to strength your willpower to leaver alcoholism.

Avoid buying alcohol is the first and most important step, to do so you have to plan your triggers, when you are strong enough prepare how will you react to your triggers and plan with as much detail as possible what will you do, sport, go cinema, walk, meditate, go visit some friend or family member...it´s up to you, just plan it and even write it with as much detail as possible, when the craving happens just count to 10, breathe deeply and follow your plan as well as you can until the craving pass, the more you use this technique the easier it will for you to leave your addiction.

title: Hypnosis for Alcoholism
description:
Full audio self-hypnosis session for overcoming your alcohol addiction.

We all know the side effects of drinking too much alcohol, and yet, having drunk regularly, it can seem a difficult habit to overcome.

An Addiction?

As we come to associate having a good time with enjoying a drink, there seems to be little incentive to stop drinking, or even to cut down on it. We become, at least mentally, addicted to alcohol, and start to depend on it to relieve our stress. Yet, the alcohol doesn't actually do this, and can make coping with stress or socializing even worse, as we're not tackling the source of that stress or lack of social confidence.

Overcome an Addiction to Alcohol

This hypnosis application helps you to overcome alcohol addiction by removing that desire to be in an alcohol-induced state. You will want to stay sober, and actually enjoy it, feeling fully aware and active. 

Listen to this application today and Become Independent from Alcohol.

Session Length: 31:45

title: Arud consumption diary
description:
This consumption diary is a quick and easy way to record your consumption habits. Depending on what substances you want to track, you can choose a suggested category such as cannabis, alcohol. prescription drugs etc., or define a category and dosage of your own.
 
Download the Arud app to monitor your consumption every day. Enter your daily consumption and how you feel every day, and if you want you can activate messages so that you don’t forget
 
Your data will only be stored on your phone and is absolutely anonymous. Everything is processed on your phone and stored locally. We will never store your data on an external server, so that no security gaps can arise. The Arud consumption diary lets you track your consumption habits completely independently.
 
The Arud consumption diary app on your smartphone is a handy diary to track your consumption habits every day and help you consciously deal with it. 
 
Most people consume without any problems. But when does it become damaging? With the Arud consumption diary you can assess your own consumption and get help if you want. Generate messages, reminders and alarms to always be up-to-date with your daily and past consumption.
 
What can this diary app do?
 
- Daily record of consumption habits
- Note your mood, cravings and stress levels
- Self-test to assess consumption level of substances such as marijuana, alcohol and prescription drugs
- Clear statistics of your own consumption habits
- Share reports with trusted person / therapist via e-mail
- Optional: Set goals and receive push messages when they are met
- Alcohol calculator to work out your current alcohol level
- Calorie calculator to see how many calories the alcohol you have drunk contains
 
Do you want to know if your consumption is a problem, or do you just want to track your habits out of curiosity? The Arud consumption diary app can help you.

We are committed to the health and quality of life of users, and promoting discussion of a pragmatic, science-based and sympathetic addiction policy. We support the decriminalisation of drug consumption and do not distinguish between legal and illegal substances, but between low-risk and high-risk consumption. Medical treatment for addiction should be available to all those who need it. On both a national and international level, we are heavily involved in establishing a network of hepatitis C experts to ensure treatment for infected drug users. Our international research work contributes to new knowledge and we make our expertise available in Switzerland and abroad. As a recognised FMH training institute Arud trains prospective specialist doctors and is a practical training organisation for social workers.

We respect the life choices of our patients and accept that this can include the use of psychoactive substances – as long as it is compatible with the well-being of society. We meet our patients on an equal footing and help them shape their lives in a way that minimises risks and maximises self-determination. Treatment steps are always agreed jointly and we try to make sure everyone gets a suitable treatment, taking account of the existing opportunities and limitations. We promote the independence and self-determination of those affected in daily life and work towards improving their physical, mental and social health and thus their quality of life.

Send any questions, problems or feedback regarding the app to app@arud.ch.

We will never store your data on an external server, so that no security gaps can arise. The Arud consumption diary lets you track your consumption habits completely independently.

The Arud consumption diary app on your smartphone is a handy diary to track your consumption habits every day and help you consciously deal with it.

Most people consume without any problems. But when does it become damaging? With the Arud consumption diary you can assess your own consumption and get help if you want. Generate messages, reminders and alarms to always be up-to-date with your daily and past consumption.

What can this diary app do?

- Daily record of consumption habits
- Note your mood, cravings and stress levels
- Self-test to assess consumption level of substances such as marijuana, alcohol and prescription drugs
- Clear statistics of your own consumption habits
- Share reports with trusted person / therapist via e-mail
- Optional: Set goals and receive push messages when they are met
- Alcohol calculator to work out your current alcohol level
- Calorie calculator to see how many calories the alcohol you have drunk contains

Do you want to know if your consumption is a problem, or do you just want to track your habits out of curiosity? The Arud consumption diary app can help you.

We are committed to the health and quality of life of users, and promoting discussion of a pragmatic, science-based and sympathetic addiction policy. We support the decriminalisation of drug consumption and do not distinguish between legal and illegal substances, but between low-risk and high-risk consumption. Medical treatment for addiction should be available to all those who need it. On both a national and international level, we are heavily involved in establishing a network of hepatitis C experts to ensure treatment for infected drug users. Our international research work contributes to new knowledge and we make our expertise available in Switzerland and abroad. As a recognised FMH training institute Arud trains prospective specialist doctors and is a practical training organisation for social workers.

We respect the life choices of our patients and accept that this can include the use of psychoactive substances – as long as it is compatible with the well-being of society. We meet our patients on an equal footing and help them shape their lives in a way that minimises risks and maximises self-determination. Treatment steps are always agreed jointly and we try to make sure everyone gets a suitable treatment, taking account of the existing opportunities and limitations. We promote the independence and self-determination of those affected in daily life and work towards improving their physical, mental and social health and thus their quality of life.

Send any questions, problems or feedback regarding the app to app@arud.ch.
summary: Your daily diary to track your own consumption
recentChanges: Improvements and bug fixes
comments: \lml I love this place and was surprised this app happened true! All features are included, great. No more feedback. Will use it for four months and see if I'm still satisfied.

title: ALC - Alcohol Level Coach
description:
This app (ALC) helps you to get an idea about how alcohol consumption (drinking) is influencing your body and especially your blood composition. Simply track your drinks on any occasion (e.g. Party) and watch your blood alcohol level increasing, but keep within reasonable limits! Alcohol Level Coach tries to imitate the whole process of alcohol absorption and takes several factors into account: Personal details (e.g. weight, height, age and gender), drinking speed, state of stomach, delay of absorption and custom drink mixtures. Altogether the resulting alcohol level provided by ALC should be a reasonable, but still theoretical estimate of your actual alcohol level. 
Alcohol consumption on a regular basis can be interpreted as addiction. This apps` goal is to raise your awareness for excessive alcohol consumption and its consequences. Find out what impact a certain amount of alcohol can have on your body and how long it takes to get rid of this poisonous liquid. Always keep in mind that blood alcohol values provided by this app are based on computation and therefore they must not be interpreted as reliable evidence for any purpose.
The purpose of ALC is to provide a theoretical alcohol level tester whereas other alcohol testing devices like professional breathalyser or an actual blood alcohol test will provide a more precise result of your alcohol level. Whenever you are comparing the results of ALC against a breathalyser, make sure you read the instructions of the breathalyser first. Usually you have to stop drinking for a couple of minutes before using a breathalyser in order to not distort the measurement.

title: Alcohol & Beer Converter
description:
This simple application helps you convert between beer units, such as Bottles, Pints, Cans, etc. It also lets you know how much alcohol you're drinking (the amount of ethanol contained in your beer/drink).

Beer Converter has been updated to Version 3!

With this version comes some exciting new features and bug fixes.

Beer Converter is great for converting the amounts of alcohol in any alcoholic drink, not just beer! Simply select the unit size (volume) from the dropdown (or make a custom unit), then input the alcohol content of your beverage (usually listed on the container). Finally, input the quantity.

Simple example:
If I have 2 cans of beer that contain 5% alcohol. I'd like to know how many shots of vodka (40%) that would equal in terms of alcohol content.
I can select “Can” from the first dropdown, ensure that my “Alcohol Content” field has 5, then input 2 for “Quantity.”
I can then set my “Unit to convert into” to “Shot” with an alcohol content of “40.”

Another usage scenario: How much alcohol is in 4 cans of beer at 5%?
One can simply select “Can” from the dropdown menu. Ensure that “Alcohol content” is properly set to 5% (default). Then input “4” for the quantity.

The output will tell you how much ethanol you’re consuming, which is how much pure alcohol you’re drinking.

Permissions:
Internet/Billing - For in-app billing. In an effort to keep multiple apps out of the Play store, users can purchase the Premium Version from within that app, which implements in-app billing requiring the Internet permission. This is optional and only at your explicit request.

This app is open source, so go customize it!
More info and full changelog at: http://goo.gl/3WkJa

title: AlcoCalc - Alcohol Unit Calculator
description:
AlcoCalc provides an easy way to calculate Alcohol Units.

One unit is the amount of alcohol the average adult can process in an hour. The number of units in a drink is based on the size of the drink, as well as its alcohol strength.

Knowing your units will help you stay in control of your drinking.

title: Bolt Food
description:
Order your favourite dishes to your doorstep with the Bolt Food delivery service. Whether you’re dreaming of sourdough pizza; craving tempura sushi; or desperate for an artisan burger – whatever you need, Bolt Food comes to the rescue!
How to make an order with the Bolt Food delivery app:

1. Set your delivery address
2. Pick a restaurant and choose your meal
3. Tap to order and pay
4. Track your order and watch the courier arrive
5. Enjoy the yumminess delivered straight to your doorstep!

Bolt Food app features:
- An easy and convenient interface
- Real-time order and delivery tracking
- Seamless in-app payments

Bolt Food is the most recent service of ride-hailing tech company Bolt (formerly Taxify). Bolt Food is here to challenge the efficiency of the food delivery industry all over the world, while helping the restaurants get more orders and the couriers to earn extra money.

Make some extra cash with your car, bike or motorbike. Become a Bolt Food courier here: https://food.bolt.eu

Become a Bolt Food partner restaurant here: https://food.bolt.eu

Get in touch with us via food@bolt.eu

Follow us on Facebook: http://bit.ly/boltfoodFB

comments: It's functional, but lacks a few very useful features like: 1. a global search, not just for a restaurant name (e.g. a particular product/dish); 2. in-app tipping possibilities; 3. an option to set favourite restaurants. The UI is also a bit counterintuitive, navigation isn't always easy and there are no customisable filters. And since transport cost is calculated depending on distance and whatnot, you could allow delivery from any restaurant - let me decide if I'm willing to pay/wait. :) Thanks

Well this is the 4th time I have download this app and..when I entered my cell no...I'm waiting on the code...but no code as been sent at four time...so I can gladly say this app is not working and I have waisted my data on it...I'm very disappointed..so I will give it a thumbs down.

delivery time is always much longer, ETA changing randomly every few minutes. Food was ready in 4 minutes delivery for 1.5 km takes 45 minutes... ETA is 10 minutes, 8, 10, 7, 12... car on the map jumps to start position and freezes for 10 min, jumps to half way... ETA 7 min... 8... And very hard to find food in app - shows restaurants in unknown logic - only circlek and restaurants on another side of city... where is nearest ones?

I like the app better than the rest,worked fine for me so far, i like that the delivery is not that expensive. One thing i would add: the ability to tip the person who delivers via the application. I usually like to tip but lately i don't have cash available.

Love this app. It's great that so many restaurants deliver to my location. I just wish there were some promotions and coupons for free delivery or discounts for users like me who order so frequently...

I installed this today after a year (or longer) of not having it. Why I deleted it, I don't know, but I kind of regret it now. It's fine, besides that problem. Edit: I unistalled and redownloaded it, but the problem still occurs. I will keep the application installed just in case there is an update, or if I can fix it manually somehow. -ŁÐ

First of all, I don't even understand why it was labeled as "prank", when there wasn't any sort of prank aspect to the application. Second of all, the flavors were too limited, lazy developers. Third of all, there was no sound to accompany the "prank" which made the app experience all the more mediocre, if not downright dreadful. Great game, would recommend.
Every tip of the phone to drain the "beer" leads to an eternity of Ads....at least that's what it felt like. It made me chuckle though... So 2 stars.
This game is a very hilarious prank app because others will think that you are drinking actual alcohol when indeed you are not. Hilarious. I also recommend this game.
If give it more stars except for the stupid cartoons/games after each chug-a-lug. I didn't download it for games.

title: Alcohol Tester BAC Calculator Alcohol Tracker
description:
This app is an alcohol tracker. It helps you to monitor and control your alcohol consumption. 
Blood alcohol content (BAC):
It calculates your blood alcohol concentration based on the drinks you had and provides a forecast. It tells you also when you are sober again. Furthermore it suggests a waiting time for another drink in order not to exceed a preset BAC level.
Consumption statistics:
Drink counter. It helps to keep track on long-term developements in your consumption by providing various statisitics. It shows the daily consumption in a diagramm. Additionally it calculates the equivalent amount in liter of pure alcohol per year and monitors the number of dry days vs. the number of wet days. This values are calculated on a weekly average and compared to the overall values. This way you can clearly see whether you are drinking more or less than usual.
More features:
-Advanced BAC calculator: Scientific calculation of BAC employing Widmark and Watson formulas
-Intuitive and easy input
-Shortcut for selected drinks
-only app with drinking calculator: calculates a waiting time for the next drink in order not to exceed a certain BAC value
Note: This app cannot replace a breathalyzer or blood test.

title: BACtrack
description:
Track your BAC with BACtrack®

Anytime you are consuming alcohol and want an estimate of your BAC (Blood Alcohol Content), go directly to the BACtrack® App. Designed by BACtrack Breathalyzers, the leading manufacturer of personal and professional alcohol breath detectors, this app features a Bluetooth connection to the BACtrack Mobile Breathalyzer.

Display BACtrack test results on your Android device by connecting the BACtrack Mobile Breathalyzer via Bluetooth. Armed with the power of Xtend™ Fuel Cell Sensor technology, the BACtrack breathalyzer uses the same technology used by professional groups around the world. Quickly test and view BAC results, and read safety information about corresponding impairment levels. With ZeroLine™, a revolutionary new feature that estimates your decrease in BAC over time, the app estimates when your BAC will return to 0.000%. Saved BAC readings are automatically mapped on the Tracking Graph, allowing you to get a clear picture of your drinking habits and gain insight about how your body processes alcohol. Track what you drank and where with photos, notes, and drink logs. Your BAC results remain private, or choose to share via text message, Facebook, Twitter, etc.

Download the app designed by BACtrack, the leader in personal and professional breathalyzers. Our products have been featured on MythBusters, The Doctors, The Dr. Phil Show, and Oprah's All Stars. And BACtrack was the first company to ever receive FDA clearance to sell breathalyzers to consumers for personal use.  You can trust BACtrack anytime you want to estimate your BAC – and now on your phone!

Key Features
- Bluetooth connection to the BACtrack Mobile Breathalyzer
- Learn how alcohol affects your BAC
- Fast and easy to use
- Designed by BACtrack®, the leader in personal and professional alcohol breathalyzers

Download now so that you can always estimate your BAC anywhere, anytime!

comments: App crashes, often refuses to connect to the device, and just generally is awkward to use. And now the hardware is not registering alcohol at all, so all in all a compete waste of money.
Only works in the best cases. Appears to be poorly designed and, consequently, untestable. One star because I think I can find a success path where it works.
Thr device itself works really well, the app glitches and malfunctions a lot. Sometimes the different screens overlay on top of each other, the app will disconnect from the device
It does the very basics of telling you you current alcohol reading.. Anything else it crashes

Useless app! Originally I left a more informative review hoping that the developers read it and address the issues with the app. but after seeing that my complaints are identical to those posted here more than a year ago, I just have one thing to say : the android app sucks, there's a reason it's got a 2 star average, and there's a 30% chance that it'll work on your phone thoug! So if you're feeling adventurous or lucky, get a BACtrack :)

title: Oxygen: Alcohol Delivery. Order Wine Beer & Liquor
description:
We offer an online menu ordering service for Ruth's Chris Steak House for pickup.
We also offer an online menu for beer wine and alcohol for delivery.
Customers can order from the convenience of their computer and their cellular phone or tablet.
Orders are taken and sent to a delivery driver who confirms the age is 21 and over with a photo id and signature.
Most orders are delivered with a 60 minute time period. We guarantee 90 minutes during "rush hour".
An order can also be scheduled for anytime the customer wants.

title: My Cocktail Bar Pro
description:
You have alcohol, some beverages and fruits and wonder what cocktails you can make? My Bar is for you. Just choose what ingredients you have and My Bar will show you a list of all cocktails you can enjoy and offer to your friends. 

Check out the screenshots! Features:

★ BROWSE ALL COCKTAILS ★ just a list of all cocktails available. Do you really care about 9000 cocktails other applications offer? Most of them you probably won't like. We include only carefully chosen and most popular cocktails. The cocktails you can make are highlighted, you know that you can make it. For other cocktails missing ingredients are listed.

★ MY BAR ★ all your ingredients in one place. For each one, quickly see what cocktails you can make with that particular ingredients.

★ MY COCKTAILS ★ all cocktails you can make using only ingredients you have. Below that list - cocktails that you almost can make, missing one or two ingredient. You can easily see what exactly you need to add to your bar shelf to expand a list of your cocktails.

★ CUSTOM COCKTAILS AND INGREDIENTS ★ Create your own unique cocktails and add new ingredients.

★ FAVORITE COCKTAILS ★ Manage your favorite cocktails and have them quickly accessible in a separate tab.

★ MANAGE BAR ★ choose what ingredients are on your bar shelf, see how many cocktails are available with particular ingredient.

★ BROWSE BY CATEGORY ★ Select a category to see only IBA official cocktails or shooters etc. For ingredient list select a category to see only strong alcohol, beveragers etc.

★ COCKTAIL DETAILS ★ Description, detailed recipe with variations and a list of needed ingredients including garnish.

★ INGREDIENT DETAILS ★ Browse all cocktails with Tequila, for example, quickly see which of these cocktails you can make right now.

★ SEARCH ★ Quick cocktail and ingredient search option.

★ If you cannot find a cocktail you love, tell us! We will update our cocktail database regularly.

★ Having problems with application? Want a feature we don't have? Contact us at support@mybarapp.com and we will try to help.

★ MY COCKTAILS ★ all cocktails you can make using only ingredients you have. Below that list - cocktails that you almost can make, missing one or two ingredient. You can easily see what exactly you need to add to your bar shelf to expand a list of your cocktails.

★ CUSTOM COCKTAILS AND INGREDIENTS ★ Create your own unique cocktails and add new ingredients.

★ FAVORITE COCKTAILS ★ Manage your favorite cocktails and have them quickly accessible in a separate tab.

★ MANAGE BAR ★ choose what ingredients are on your bar shelf, see how many cocktails are available with particular ingredient.

★ BROWSE BY CATEGORY ★ Select a category to see only IBA official cocktails or shooters etc. For ingredient list select a category to see only strong alcohol, beveragers etc.

★ COCKTAIL DETAILS ★ Description, detailed recipe with variations and a list of needed ingredients including garnish.

★ INGREDIENT DETAILS ★ Browse all cocktails with Tequila, for example, quickly see which of these cocktails you can make right now.

★ SEARCH ★ Quick cocktail and ingredient search option.

★ If you cannot find a cocktail you love, tell us! We will update our cocktail database regularly.

★ Having problems with application? Want a feature we don't have? Contact us at support@mybarapp.com and we will try to help.
summary: The fast and practical app to help you make the best cocktails at home!

comments: Best app for drinks and to manage your at home bar. Easy to follow. You can even at your own drinks and items.

It's a pretty great app for creating cocktails, I think one missing feature is not being able to say how many cocktails you want to make for each recipe and seeing ingredients measure change accordingly.
Really easy to use. Easy to add drinks and ingredients, and easy to edit any of the preset drinks or ingredients if you need to! My new go-to bar management app!
Fantastic app. Changed my quarantine experience completely!

Absolutely fantastic App. I have a very well stocked home bar and have tried every app to keep track of what I have and what I can make. This by far is the best one out there. Easy to use. I can view/change/update everything on my cell phone and my guests can view everything on my tablet in the bar/man cave. Perfect for my needs. There are only a few things that would make it even better, however 5 stars for the best app out there. 1. More cocktails either by default or maybe extra "bundles" to download. (Heck, I'd be happy to purchase these bundles for a few bucks). 2. Some type of mirrored web version to add / view. Typing in my own custom cocktails and ingredients on my phone takes FOREVER! 3. Prettier graphics?

title: BAC Calculator - Alcohol Tracker
description:
Every day in America, another 30 people die as a result of drunk driving crashes. That’s one person every 48 minutes.

♛ BAC Calculator can help

Don't drive drunk! Check if you are good to drive yet or not?

✔ Just tell us how many drinks you have had along with other stats
✔ We will estimate your blood alcohol content & give you the result

It's that simple.

You don't want to drive if your BAC% is anywhere close to 0.08% (that's the legal limit in most of the states & if you are over the limit you can get arrested and get a DUI)

Better to be safe than sorry! Calculate your BAC before you drive. 

❤ Use BAC Calculator & Save innocent lives ❤

title: Nairobi Drinks
description:
NAIROBI DRINKS – Alcohol delivery app. We deliver alcohol in Nairobi within 30 minutes through our fleet of motorbikes and any other place in Kenya within 24 hours through courier services.


Why buy alcohol online in Kenya? NAIROBI DRINKS is the fastest, most convenient, price competitive and the most reliable way to order beers, wines, spirits, mixers, cigarettes and condoms online.


How It Works

browse the menu

add your favourite drinks to the shopping cart

checkout with your delivery location information

we call you to confirm the order

we deliver your drinks within 10 to 30 minutes


You will never have to go to wines and spirits again when you can access all the drinks that you need with a single dial. NAIROBI DRINKS is ideal for late night alcohol delivery, gifting friends, house parties, office parties, graduation parties, wedding ceremonies, catering, office happy hours, dinner parties, while having friends over, stocking your liquor cabinet, while watching a game, a lazy Sunday etc.


Some of the reasons that you might choose NAIROBI DRINKS over the other online liquor stores in Nairobi are our flexible means of ordering that includes WhatsApp, SMS and call via 0714798820. You may also order via the shopping cart, email or social media platforms like Facebook, Twitter and Instagram. In the recent past, there have been increased demand of late night alcohol delivery which has led us to extend our working hours to midnight on weekdays and 3 AM on weekends and public holidays. This is in line with our goal of offering 24 hour alcohol delivery Nairobi.


You don’t have cash? Don’t worry because we have figured out that one too. NAIROBI DRINKS offers convenient payment methods that include cash on delivery, swiping of debit cards and credit cards, MPESA till number, banker’s cheque, bank transfers and also PayPal for those buying gifts to their friends in Kenya from abroad.

title: Alcoolo Drinking Game
description:
Alcoolo Drinking Game is a game with or without alcohol to play during your evening and your aperitif, with games for two or more with your friends.

Alcoolo is an alcohol game suitable for all evenings with its different drinking game modes, such as Aperitif, Hardcore, Caliente or even more naughty with Hot mode, you can animate your before, your evening, your aperitif, and even your after-party if you're hot enough!

In this alcohol game, no rule to remember, forget the evening games that you already know such as Picolo, Chopine, and the usual drinking games such as I never have, Beer Pong, Pyramid, Kinito .

The only condition for playing this drinking game is to have a drink, with or without alcohol, such as Vodka, Whiskey, Tequila. You can very well play with non-alcoholic drinks such as soda, a redbull or even a good fruit juice!

In the Alcoolo app, discover features that you have never seen in other alcohol game apps:

- Create your own unique and tailor-made drinking game mode with your own phrases!
- Go back during the game, navigate as in an Instagram story!
- Activate the validation of sentences, to control the game in public!
- Add or remove players during the game!
- Broadcast your screen on a television or even another phone so that your friends can watch your game live!

And many other features to discover ....

Find us on social networks!
Alcoolo on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/AlcooloApp/
Alcoolo on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/alcoolo.drinking.game/

Alcoolo contains Premium access. You can choose to unlock Premium access from the Alcoolo app and unlock all drinking game modes, as well as all Premium features such as broadcasting to an external screen.

Links to our Privacy Policy and our General Conditions of Use below:

https://www.alcoolo.fr/mentions/conditions_generales_utilisation.pdf
https://www.alcoolo.fr/mentions/politique_confidentialite.pdf

title: Alcohol and Your Brain
description:
This health education App explains the physiological effects of alcohol on the developing brain. A 7 minute video with captivating 3D animations, voiceover & graphics, takes you on a guided tour of the anatomical structures of the brain, to educate about what happens to specific structures in the brain when alcohol is consumed in excess. This information will equip the viewer to make informed choices in relation to alcohol consumption. The anatomical brain structures include the cerebral cortex, cerebellum, hippocampus, medulla, frontal lobes, hypothalamus, & nerve cells. We take a look inside the developing brain, to examine the effects alcohol has on these structures as they grow & develop, & how the physiological effects of alcohol can produce behavioural changes.

We also examine BAC, or Blood Alcohol Concentration, & how you can estimate what your BAC might be when consuming alcohol. After viewing the video, to assist your understanding of this topic, you can complete a Quiz consisting of 20 multiple choice questions. The Quiz includes an optional "Hint" button which enables you to review the portion of the video related to the question. However if a "Hint" is used to answer the question, the maximum score out of 1 for a correct answer will be .5.  You also have the option to Tweet your results to others.

This video was originally produced for a target audience of 18-25 year olds, however it contains valuable educational information for all ages. This App can be used by parents & teachers to educate a younger audience on the dangers of excess alcohol consumption. It can also be used by undergraduate medical, physiotherapy, health science, nursing, pharmacology & exercise science students to understand this topic. Additionally, health professionals can "Airplay" this App to youth health education groups, following up with a group discussion on the Quiz section.

2013 Winner - Gold Communicator Award
2012 Winner - Queensland iAward (Innovation)
2011 The Global Awards - Finalist 

Background to this production:

3Dme & the Australian Lions Drug Awareness Foundation (ALDAF) share a common vision to improve the targetting, quality, accuracy & reach of drug awareness educational initiatives. This relationship was formally recognised by the Gold Coast Mayor when he awarded 3Dme the '2010 Mayor's Corporate Social Responsibility Award'. In 2011 3Dme company founders Luke & Sonya Brannelly were presented with the Dr Harry Jenkins Fellowship Award, which is the highest recognition Lions Clubs International can bestow on an individual for outstanding service. 

The aim of the Australian Lions Drug Awareness Foundation (ALDAF) www.lionsclubs.org.au/aldaf is:
- To promote awareness & prevention of abuse of alcohol & other drugs especially the factors predisposing it
- Develop education and prevention activities, especially in local communities 
- Participate in campaigns in line with the aim of the Foundation
- Actively promote and support counselling and rehabilitation programmes.

More products available on 3Dme Store http://store.3dme.com.au/
Stock Footage
Stock Images
Learning Clips
Learning Modules
Apps and iBooks

title: Alcoholism Test
description:
Concerned about your drinking habits? This app helps you evaluate whether or not you may be addicted to alcohol. This app uses the CAGE Questionnaire - a simple, empirically-based screening for alcoholism. Alcoholism / Alcohol Use Disorder / Substance Use Disorder is a common problem that can have devastating short-term and long-term consequences. There are a bevy of effective treatments for Alcohol Use Disorder so it is important to seek help from a physician if you are concerned about your drinking. 

Disclaimer: The CAGE Questionnaire used in this app is a 4 question assessment instrument used in primary care settings. This questionnaire is NOT a diagnostic test. Please consult your physician if you are concerned about your drinking.

title: Blood Alcohol Calculator
description:
Blood Alcohol Calculator estimates the amount of alcohol present in your system, based on your input. Blood Alcohol Calculator (BAC) uses improved algorithms and calculations based on your inputs of booze and other details. BAC comes with methods to help you cure your hangovers, and some tips to prevent them. BAC also presents you some cocktail recipes to fight your hangover the following day.

Now before driving home back from a party, make sure you take the digital BAC test. Get your own digital breath analyzer now.

Note - Blood Alcohol Calculator test is based on mathematical algorithms, so estimated result may slightly differ from the actual one. The author does not take responsibility for any damages or injuries caused by using the Blood Alcohol Calculator application.

Like us at Facebook and stay tuned with all new apps and updates: 
https://www.facebook.com/BloodAlcoholCalculator
descriptionHTML:
Blood Alcohol Calculator estimates the amount of alcohol present in your system, based on your input. Blood Alcohol Calculator (BAC) uses improved algorithms and calculations based on your inputs of booze and other details. BAC comes with methods to help you cure your hangovers, and some tips to prevent them. BAC also presents you some cocktail recipes to fight your hangover the following day.

Now before driving home back from a party, make sure you take the digital BAC test. Get your own digital breath analyzer now.

Note - Blood Alcohol Calculator test is based on mathematical algorithms, so estimated result may slightly differ from the actual one. The author does not take responsibility for any damages or injuries caused by using the Blood Alcohol Calculator application.

Like us at Facebook and stay tuned with all new apps and updates:
https://www.facebook.com/BloodAlcoholCalculator

title: Cocktails Guru (Cocktail) App
description:
★ Cocktail Guru with over 15 000 cocktail recipes is your ultimate guide in the world of cocktails.

Do you want to explore art of mixology from completely new / interactive perspective ?
Do you want to learn to mix cocktails like a professional bartender?
Do you want to gain all the knowledge to become a cocktail guru ?
If YES is answer to questions above, don't hesitate and download Cocktails Guru right away! 

Application gives you all the necessary information to prepare over 15 000 cocktails.

★ You can browse cocktails in:
1. Search function (search by name, ingredients, alcohol volume, method etc.).
2. Alphabetical list.
3. Top 100 Cocktails list.
4. Popular Cocktails list.
5. Cocktail packages (Bloody Marys, IBA Cocktails etc.)

★ Each cocktail contains information about :
1. Detailed description of preparation and all the ingredients used.
2. Cocktails with similar ingredients
3. Pictures of cocktail (each user can upload pictures so you can see multiple images of particular drink)
4. User commentaries (each user can comment , so you can share your knowledge and information)

★ All ingredients are divided into 2 main categories. Alcoholic and non alcoholic ingredients. 
All the ingredients contains:
1. Detailed description.
2. Comments. ( users can leave their commentary)
3. List of cocktails which can be made from this ingredient.

★ Bartender Academy is another cool feature of this application which will help you to gain knowledge in theoretical part of mixing cocktails. It provides information regarding :
1. Bartending Tools ( You can find out what is jigger, muddler, strainer or rest of tools).
2. Cocktail Glassware (Do you know what is difference between martini and coupette glass ? :) )
3. Garnishes ( Read  something about garnishes you can use).
4. Cocktail Types ( Want to know something about sours or margaritas ? )
5. Bartending techniques ( shaking, muddling, stirring and more..)
6. Terminology ( This article contains all the slang you need to know if you are into cocktails. )

★ If you are looking  for some cocktail inspiration or  just want to browse over new content than activity screen is right place for you to visit. You can find here :
1. New pictures
2. New commentaries
3. Activity of users  you are following.

★Each user is able to build his/her own user profile within application. (You need to log in using Facebook application.). Once you are registered user you are able to :
1. Rate cocktails and other content (commentaries, images).
2. Make pictures  & cocktails favourite ("like it",those will be stored in you profile so you can easily access them later).
3. You can add commentaries. (share some of your knowledge, opinion)
4. You can add picture. (share masterpiece  you created / bought)
5. Follow other users ( you can easily see theirs activity )

We are developing much more functionality so you can look forward much more  "intelligent"  cocktail application. 

If you have any questions don't hesitate and contact us at info@cocktailsguru.com .


Enjoy Cocktails Guru Android App.

Cocktails Guru Team.

comments: This review will go to 5 stars when I can log in to the app easily. As it stands, I have to log in (it sits at loading permanently), then log in without profile and then swipe left to right. It has the best database by far, though. Most apps didn't even have a Sazerac! Fix the log in and it's 5 stars.

Log in fails; app does not filter with your ingredients. Both Facebook and Google login hang and never actually finish. I put in all my ingredients but it still shows cocktails with ingredients I do not have.

Wow what happened? Favorites stopped working so I logged out to log back in. Bad idea. Can't log in so I can't use the app anymore. Uninstall/install didn't work either. Oh well, it was good while it lasted.

For the love of God fix the favorites function! 75% of the time, i get "an error occurred, please try again later" when trying to mark a cocktail as a favorite. How am I going to find that drink again? If not for this glaring issue, i would give the app 5 stars.

I've loved this app, but it logged me out from Facebook and right now I can't log back in. I've tried Google accounts, reinstalling app and resetting my phone. Nothing works, I can't log back in. I'll change my opinion when you solve this

title: FermCalc Winemaking Calculator
description:
NOTE:  See the important installation note at the end of this description.

FermCalc is a collection of advanced winemaking calculators designed to assist both amateur and professional winemakers with calculations related to the following activities:

-  Unit conversions
-  Chaptalization & dilution
-  Acidity adjustment
-  Sulfite additions
-  Alcohol & solids content estimation
-  Blending
-  Fortification
-  Miscellaneous additions

FermCalc provides full flexibility for specifying both input and output units on all of the calculators.  All of the functionality of the popular Java and JavaScript versions of FermCalc are included in the Andrioid version.

Below is a complete list of the calculators currently available.

----------------------------------------
Unit Conversions
--  Volume
--  Mass
--  Temperature
--  Specific Gravity / Density
--  Acidity
--  Alcohol Content
--  Concentration
--  Refractivity
----------------------------------------
Sugar Calculators
--  Chaptalization & Dilution
--  Amelioration
--  High Brix Measurement by Dilution
----------------------------------------
Acidity Calculators
--  Acid Titration
--  Acidification & Deacidiication
--  Amelioration
--  NaOH Standardization
----------------------------------------
Sulfite Calculator
----------------------------------------
Alcohol Content Calculators
--  Hydrometer SG Drop
--  Hydrometer & Refractometer
--  Boiling (Spirit Indication)
--  Potential Alcohol
--  OIML Calculator
--  Dry Matter
----------------------------------------
Blending Calculator
----------------------------------------
Fortification Calculators
--  Post-Fermentation Fortification
--  Fortification Point
--  Hackbarth SG Calculator
----------------------------------------
Miscellaneous Calculators
--  Dry Measure Converter
--  Stock Solution Formulation
--  Inverse Stock Solution Makeup
--  Miscellaneous Additions
--  Yeast Assimilable Nitrogen (YAN)
----------------------------------------

A help page is provided for each calculator, with a high-level description of the calculator and definitions of the input and output fields.  Full details regarding the mathematics involved in the calculations are available at www.fermcalc.com.

IMPORTANT Installation Note:  The stock numeric keypad on some Samsung and LGE devices does not include a decimal, which makes FermCalc almost impossible to use.  The workaround is to go to Google Play and install the Google Keyboard or some other third-party keyboard.  After you install the new keyboard, go to Settings > Language and Input, and set the new keyboard as the default keyboard.  After following these steps your numeric keypad should include a decimal.

title: Track Your Alcohol Pro - Drink less, then quit!
description:
A no gimmicks, simple, effective and reliable app to track your alcohol and help you keep it under control, cut down and/or quit.

Notification widget so you can track your current alcohol free period and goals progress without even having to unlock your phone.

24Hour or AM/PM time format.

Ad free.

Set goals to gradually increase your alcohol free periods which will help wean you off at your own pace and subsequently make it easier to quit if you decide to do so.

History showing stats about your alcohol free periods and progress.

*** UPDATE ***

New color selection and dark mode features! :-)

Added Home Screen Widget feature!

title: BarBack
description:
The ultimate pocket drinking assistant, ready to help you find and make your next favorite cocktail.

BarBack features:
- The drink recommendation system: Ask The BarBack
- A curated and expandable recipe book
- A smart inventory management system
- A drink of the day
- Imperial and metric measurements
- No ads or annoying popups

- Ask The BarBack -
Just like talking with a real bartender! Tell BarBack what you're looking for and let us provide you a list of recommendations. Want something sweet and fruity? A lowball with whiskey? Something that will make you forget what day it is? There's a new and exciting drink for all of these, and more, ready to be presented to you at a moment's notice!

- Curated Recipe Book -
BarBack comes preinstalled with a collection of the most popular drink recipes in a variety of different styles. After those, you control the content through drink packs! Don't waste your time swiping through 5000+ recipes, focus on the cocktails you care about: the classics, the candy themed, the pop culture inspired, and more! New packs added monthly!

- Smart Inventory -
With the "In Stock" mode, BarBack can instantly display any recipe you can make based on your home bar. Missing a Champagne Flute or Scotch? No problem, BarBack is able to make substitutions based on what you have at hand. Heading to the local bar? Quickly switch this mode off anywhere in the application for when you want to see it all! Covering everything from glasses to garnishes, BarBack goes a step further by giving you recipes that are brand agnostic. BarBack doesn’t care what brand of Rum you have, just that you have it!

- Simple And Clean -
Clear, straight-forward, and stylized; BarBack ditches the traditional professional cocktail photos and presents drinks in a way that highlights their most important aspects, reflecting those smart substitutions made by the inventory. Quickly navigated, easy to read, and kept dark so you don't strain your eyes in low-lit bars!

Follow us on Twitter @AskTheBarBack

Download for free and get drinking!

comments: This app is really great. I would love to see a few things which I don't think are too crazy: - add notes to each recipe (i.e., i make sazerac's with an absinthe wash as well... Which I thought was pretty standard, so it's be nice to note that) - custom recipes. This would partially solve the above issue too. It'd be great to make this app my central repository of drinks. Let me put in my own things too! - shopping suggestions. List Ingredients that would allow additional drinks to be made
App is great. After you put in your inventory it gives you all the drink recipes and identifies what ingredients are in your stock.

If you’re looking for a simple app, BarBack is easy to use. The app takes inventory by bottle, case, or weight, making it versatile for whatever inventory count works best for your bar. This is very impressive looking & handy to control as well as. I love this application too much. You can also try this application & enjoy the features.

I was looking for such app long ago.Tips are very accurate. This app save me from embarrassment and unnecessary expense. It has great features like the ultimate pocket drinking assistant, ready to help you find and make your next favorite cocktail. Really appreciate the app. you should try it.

This is such a great app. I always wanted a recipe app on making cocktails so that i can try these drinks at home. This app is very user friendly and the recipes are presented in a way that could be easily understood. Its a keeper👌

title: red wine wallpaper - alcohol wallpaper
description:
set red wine wallpaper as your personalization to decorate your phone. 

buy and downloads this wine bottle wallpaper from our store page. we have the best cold drinks wallpaper. you can also download other live wallpaper in case you don’t find this lwp suitable for you, we had a vast lwp collection for your smart phone so, check the breathtaking image for your smartphone background, and you will fall in love with your mobile phone again because of cold drinks wallpaper.

in this video wallpaper videezy you can see the subtle animation of wine picture. you can see these red wine being pured out of the bottle. this giving a sensation of having summer drinks on your phone. very amazing summer drink wallpaper.

wine is made from fermented grape juice. grapes are picked, crushed and placed in buckets or vats to ferment. the process of fermentation turns the natural sugars in the grape juice into alcohol. fermentation can occur naturally, but sometimes winemakers add yeast to help control the process.

the crushed grapes are put through a press, which removes the skins and other sediment. whether this step is done before or after fermentation, along with grape color, determines whether the wine becomes red or white. decorate your phone with this champagne wallpaper.

to make white wine, grapes are pressed before fermentation. red wine is usually pressed after fermentation. after this step, the wine is aged in stainless steel or oak barrels until it’s ready to be bottled. this is indeed one of the best wine picture.

- no ads.
- summer drink wallpaper for your phone.
- includes video live wallpaper.

title: Ria Health Alcohol Reduction
description:
Ria Health is a next-generation solution for people who want to stop drinking too much. The company helps members accomplish their goals and improve their overall well-being through a combination of mobile technology, one-on-one interactions with addiction specialists and daily support. By engaging with physicians and coaches at home, measuring consumption with simple tools, and reducing cravings with FDA approved medications, members experience rapid improvement and achieve lasting and holistic impact. Ria Health’s unique use of personalized care and data science was created by a team of doctors and technology experts. 

For more information visit www.riahealth.com.

title: AlcoExpert: Alcohol Tracker
description:
With AlcoExpert, you can easily track the statistics of alcohol consumed and monitor trends in alcohol use.
Watch your average daily blood alcohol content, volume of alcohol consumed and your preferences.
You can calculate the alcohol content in the blood (in ppm) and find out after what time the body will completely eliminate the alcohol.
The calculation is carried out according to the Widmark formula (Widmark Erik M. P.). At the moment, this is the most accurate and universal formula.

comments: I checked the accuracy experimentally against practical alcohol tables volume 2 and also mathmatically but they do not match. Doesn't give the correct values for calculations of either temperature corrected ABV or LAA from gauge weight in metric. I suspect it uses approximate conversion values from imperial units prior to performing the calculations instead of afterwards making it about 1% out.
Terrible app.....put in all the info and it crashes every time....not once has it worked.

love absolutely love this app.......I run a mead group called Micro Meads AND Brews and i tell everyone in my group to use this app. hasn't failed nor crashed on me once. if I could Id give it 10 outta 10.
There's nothing else this good on the market. It's smart and straight forward. Great for distillery jobs (distillation, mixing, and bottling) or personal use. I use it daily.
Super clean interface, easy to use, and accurate calculations for a ton of different things. Great app.

title: UT DABC App
description:
The Utah Department of Alcoholic Beverage Control mobile application improves customer access to available products in its stores. The mobile application will allow customers (ages 21 and older) to quickly find products in the store(s) most convenient to them. App users are able to search for products by category, name, price, bottle size, user ratings, and availability by store. Additionally, users may opt to create a user profile where they can save their favorite items and stores, as well as to make private notes on each individual product. 

Once a product is selected by the user at the store nearest them, the user may then receive directions to that store from their current location through the primary map application installed on their device.

Once a product is selected by the user at the store nearest them, the user may then receive directions to that store from their current location through the primary map application installed on their device.

I like the app, however it would be very helpful to have an overall map with all locations shown and then let me choose one to get location details, similar to the result I see when using Google, instead of having to choose a specific location then having it shown on the map.
Can not log on!!! I've reported it 5 times... still not working , I've uninstalled, still will not work.
app seems to work. it even shows number of items in stock and the closest store.
Really need to be able to drill down to specific types of alcohol. Spirits lists all spirits. It'd be nice if I could look for just whisky, or just tequila.

title: Breathalyser BAC calculator
description:
Bacalizer is an application that allows you to estimate after which time your body will reach sobriety. Because every human body has a different metabolism, the results should be treated only as a guide. If you want to be 100% sure, use a real breathalyser.

Our promille calculator uses the modified algorithm of Erik Widmark (extended by calculations based on the state of the stomach during alcohol consumption)


Application features:
✨ Calculation of blood alcohol levels and the time when we reach sobriety.
✨ Alcohol management.
✨ Data management required for calculations.


Description of the parameters affecting the number of per mille in our body:
✨ Gender - alcohol dissolves in body fluids, the content of which depends on gender.
✨ Body weight - it is needed to calculate the mass of body fluids in the body.
✨ Height - required for calculating the BMI of our body, which allows more accurate calculation of the mass of body fluids.
✨ Alcohols - the amount of pure alcohol in grams is required for the calculation.
✨ Duration - for the result to be reliable, the dose must be spread over the duration of alcohol consumption.
✨ Saturation of the stomach - whether we drink on an empty or full stomach has an impact on the absorption of alcohol into the body.

The icons used in the application were created by Freepik, Good Ware, Pixel perfect, Smashicons, Those Icons, bqlqn, iconixar from www.flaticon.com

recentChanges: App publication
comments: This is a useful way to see if you are ok to drive after drinking. The app has an extensive collection of alcoholic drinks with their alcohol percentage quantities. All you do is enter what you drank, how much and what time and the app tells you if you are sober at the time of the query. You do have to enter your personal body characteristics so that the algorithm can be correctly applied to you. Nice job developer!

Breathalyser has changed my life! There are so many mental and physical benefits to using this before bed and in the morning. There are a ton of different cycles to choose from for different effects.I love being able to customize to match my ocean waves.

Interesting and useful app. Although it does take a bit of work to enter the drink details the first time, so i do recommend people fill this in first before drinking :) Great for planning your intake of drinks.
This is fun and useful! Great way to track your alcohol intake, it even has legal alcohol limits for all countries, so it is useful abroad too.
This app have everything I need. Four 6% beers in 3 hours is too much for me. Really useful and easy to use, intuitive I would say.

title: Saying When
description:
If you want to take charge of how much you drink, or when you drink, Saying When is a successful program that provides step-by-step directions that can help.

You could be interested in quitting drinking or just cutting down and the simple action of tracking your drinking and your urges to drink can help you get it under control.

The Saying When app was designed and developed by the Education department at The Centre for Addiction and Mental Health, Canada’s leading addictions and mental health hospital. The program itself has been used with great success for over 20 years, and is now finally available in a mobile format. You can make it work for you.

With Saying When, you can get help and keep your concerns about your drinking private. There’s no need to attend meetings or open up in front of a group. It’s a self-help approach that truly is anonymous and can positively influence your health, your job, or your relationships.

A PROGRAM THAT WORKS
Based on research and evaluation of various treatment methods for patients with alcohol problems Saying When is a self-help program that has a proven track record. The same tools that successful people have consistently used to bring their drinking under control for over 20 years are used in this mobile version. 

SELF-ASSESSMENT
Answer a few quick questions to set your baseline for success. Understanding when and why you drink will help you know when to “say when.” And if you ever think you can’t do it alone and need more support, links to resources are available.

PERSONALIZED GOALS
You set your own goals to fit your lifestyle. We’ll provide you with plenty of Tips for Success that will help you in your journey.

YOUR DASHBOARD
Your personal dashboard will let you know just how you are doing. From here you can track when you have a drink or an urge to drink and you can view your daily stats, monitor your progress and see how you’ve been handling things since you started Saying When.

This tool is not meant for people with serious drinking problems but it does provide links to reputable sources that can provide additional help if it is needed.

If you—or someone you care about—are having problems related to drinking, Saying When can help.

Find out more about The Centre for Addiction and Mental Health by visiting our website: www.camh.ca
