recentChanges:
You can now help others!
We're looking to our users to help us make a greater impact on the lives of people living with addiction and mental health issues by implementing a data donation function.
It is 100% anonymous!
It will let us know how you are using the app as well as how well you're doing on the program.
Any information we receive will help us make changes to the app going forward.

Good luck with your goals!

Update Notes: Fixed a bug which calculated the day index wrong on Home tab
comments: Please change the annoying sliding bar that you have to use to log a drink! It takes so long to get it right that I give up! So I guess that defeats the whole purpose of the app! If you could just type the measure in that would be better. Also, if you log a drink several times it would be better if you could just store presets rather than having to reselect from the same annoying sliding bar or you could just set the bar to the same as the last drink logged.
Great way to make goals and stay accountable.
Great App! Love it

I'm a real person, finally an app that actually helps...not just track your drinking, a few I tried were complicated! I just started..love it.  I do wish it had a place where you could put how much you spent...so you could watch savings.  But not like the other apps that only do it by each drink... You should be able to put how much you spent whether 1 or a 4 pack of wine or 1 bottle. :) Thanks for creating this! Xo

I've been using the app for several weeks now and find it useful, but the user experience could be improved.  Here's a few suggestions:  - When tracking a drink, once you change the type of drink, the date and time resets to current (from the one that was chosen beforehand). This is very impractical when tracking yesterday's drinks, for example.  - ‎The volume slider gets frustrating very fast, as it's difficult to set the exact round number. Clicking on the volume value does nothing. Instead, this could be an input field to enter a numeric value manually - much faster and precise than fiddling with the slider.  Other than that, a very good app.

title: АнтиКонтрафакт Алко
description:
Федеральная служба по регулированию алкогольного рынка (Росалкогольрегулирование).

Мы создали для вас приложение, которое позволяет:
- Определить легальность алкогольной продукции по данным из ЕГАИС
- Определить легальность продажи алкогольной продукции в торговой точке
- Найти ближайшие легальные пункты реализации алкогольной продукции
- Сообщить о найденном нарушении в федеральную службу по регулированию алкогольного рынка

Федеральная служба по регулированию алкогольного рынка (Росалкогольрегулирование) является федеральным органом исполнительной власти, осуществляющим функции по выработке и реализации государственной политики и нормативно-правовому регулированию в сфере производства и оборота этилового спирта, алкогольной и спиртосодержащей продукции, ограничения потребления (распития) алкогольной продукции, а также функции по контролю за производством и оборотом этилового спирта, алкогольной и спиртосодержащей продукции, по надзору и оказанию услуг в этой сфере.

title: TheDrinker - Drinking game

The evening starts to be boring or you simply want to have a good time with a game of drinking, alcohol, simple and complete? The Drinker is made for you!

Being the drinking game with one of the largest number of questions, actions, TheDrinker is the ideal application to liven up your evenings.

From the orientation of the questions, to the game modes, through the duration of a game everything is fully customizable to adapt your game to all situations.

Has questions like "I never have", "couple questions", "hot or intimate", "personal", "actions", "truths", "questions for adults".

If you are tired of alcohol games that do not meet your expectations, TheDrinker is THE drinking game for you. Constantly in development, we are working on redefining / creating questions to offer you the ideal aperitif game.

title: Alcohol Molecule
description: The suffix -ol appears in the IUPAC chemical name of all substances where the hydroxyl group is the functional group with the highest priority. When a higher priority group is present in the compound, the prefix hydroxy- is used in its IUPAC name. The suffix -ol in non-IUPAC names (such as paracetamol or cholesterol) also typically indicates that the substance is an alcohol. However, many substances that contain hydroxyl functional groups (particularly sugars, such as glucose and sucrose) have names which include neither the suffix -ol, nor the prefix hydroxy-.

title: Boozeman: Alcohol Delivery
description:
Boozeman is a liquor ordering app that delivers your favorite drink to your doorstep within 30 minutes. 
Why choose Boozeman?  
Apart from the pocket-friendly prices, we deliver to your desired location when you want.  We are available for delivery even at night. We are fast, convenient, and reliable.
How it works
Browse through the drinks menu and choose the drink or drinks you want.
Add your desired drink or item to the cart.
Checkout and add information like your location and your phone number which we can be able to reach you with. Finish the order.
We call the number you provided and confirm the order and within 30 minutes your drink is at your doorstep.
Enjoy your drink!
Our features
Apart from the delivery of alcohol we have so many different features. We offer gifts for friends and family, corporate bundles like we can restock your office fridge, help to choose drinks for an office party, gifts to give fellow colleges and business partners. We also offer simple cocktail recipes to make cocktails at home, we have weekend and daily offers and birthday offers.
one can also order from us through WhatsApp or even a phone call can work. You can contact us at 0753 000 006 to get yourself a drink. You can pay through cash and M-Pesa paybill when the delivery reaches your doorstep.
descriptionHTML:
Boozeman is a liquor ordering app that delivers your favorite drink to your doorstep within 30 minutes.
Why choose Boozeman?
Apart from the pocket-friendly prices, we deliver to your desired location when you want. We are available for delivery even at night. We are fast, convenient, and reliable.
How it works
Browse through the drinks menu and choose the drink or drinks you want.
Add your desired drink or item to the cart.
Checkout and add information like your location and your phone number which we can be able to reach you with. Finish the order.
We call the number you provided and confirm the order and within 30 minutes your drink is at your doorstep.
Enjoy your drink!
Our features
Apart from the delivery of alcohol we have so many different features. We offer gifts for friends and family, corporate bundles like we can restock your office fridge, help to choose drinks for an office party, gifts to give fellow colleges and business partners. We also offer simple cocktail recipes to make cocktails at home, we have weekend and daily offers and birthday offers.
one can also order from us through WhatsApp or even a phone call can work. You can contact us at 0753 000 006 to get yourself a drink. You can pay through cash and M-Pesa paybill when the delivery reaches your doorstep.
summary: Boozeman is an alcohol delivery app in Kenya.
recentChanges:
Our Promise
We deliver alcohol within 30 mins
Tap, Order, & let it be delivered.

boozeman is the best app i have encountered so far in delivering alcohol. they delivered it within 30mins in Kileleshwa.

title: Track Alcohol Timer - Drink less, quit your habit!
description:
A no gimmicks, simple, effective and reliable app to track your alcohol intake and help you keep it under control, cut down and/or quit.

Notification widget so you can track your current alcohol free period without even having to unlock your phone.

24Hour or AM/PM time format.

Pro version has aditional features including:

* Ad free
* Set goals to gradually increase your alcohol free periods which will help wean you off at your own pace and subsequently make it easier to quit if you decide to do so.
* History showing stats about your alcohol free periods and progress.

title: Homebrew Logbook - Beer, Wine, Cider, Mead
description:
Take the extra step to make better homebrews; be it cider, wine, beer, mead or something else, start logging your brews today.

Whether you're an extract brewer, kit brewer or you pick and choose your own ingredients for brewing, keeping logs of your homebrew procedures can help you improve or recreate brews you enjoyed in detail, and allows more experimenting in your normal brewing day.

This app can be used for logging beer logs, cider logs, wine logs, or any other log you might desire. All logs you create are stored in a database for safekeeping and multi-device compatibility, and the logs are fully customizable. 

The app contains the following features:
 - ABV Calculator: Calculate alcohol percentage in your brew
 - How to: A simple guide on how to brew
 - Minimalist Batch log: A simplified log for relaxed loggers, perfect for extract or kit 
 brewers
 - Complete Batch log: A complete log for brewers who like to log every detail from recipe 
 to bottling
 - Wine Batch log: A log specified for wine making (vinification)
 - Cider Batch log: A log specified for brewing cider
 - Mead Batch log: A log specified for brewing mead
 - Custom log: Create your own customized log for your needs,

title: AlcooTel MAAF
description:
A free alcohol test to download on your smartphone or tablet to drive safe !

Developed by MAAF Prévention et Sécurité,  AlcooTel has a new skin, with a modern design and new features. 

With a playful aspect and easy to use,  AlcooTel is the first free mobile and tablet apps that tells you wether or not you can drive  after consuming alcohol. 
Accessible for every Android users, AlcooTel is an online alcohol test completely free that allow you in a few clicks to see your Blood Alcohol Content (BAC) timeline according to your personal specifications – sex, age, weight, height-  and your consumptions. 
AlcooTel also provides options to drive you back home safely in case your blood alcohol content is up to the legal rates of your country (call a cab - call a friend). 

The information provided on this application are presented only as indicative and general guidelines.  The main objective of AlcooTel is to inform and raise awareness among dangers of drink-driving. 

Drive safe with AlcooTel !

comments: Si je mets 9 hot dogs et 1 verre de vin, j'ai un taux de 0,28. Si j'ajoute un verre de vin, le taux saute à 2,31. Si j'enlève des hot dogs progressivement un par un, le taux diminue progressivement, au lieu d'augmenter. Ce sont des hot dogs à la vodka ? :-P
La nouvelle interface est vraiment top. L'app est toujours aussi utile après quelques verres :)
a le mérite d'exister... malheureusement il y a encore pas mal de travail à réaliser avant les 5 étoiles.
Calculs erronés.. que de la nourriture, une biere à 25cl 5deg a 21h, et on se retrouve avec + 0.5g/l a 00:30 ? et si je rajoute de la nourriture, je passe a + de 1g/l. Logique ?

title: CHOPINE jeu à boire - jeu alcool
description:
Pas envie de vous prendre la tête avec un jeu compliqué ? Besoin de mettre l’ambiance, et de boire en rigolant avec vos amis ? Chopine est là pour sauver votre soirée.

Des centaines de défis, dont certains qui impliquent tout le monde en même temps, pour une soirée bien déjantée ! Tu es une petite frappe et tu veux t’amuser sans trop boire ? Le niveau Débutant est là pour toi, pendant que tes potes se défoncent (et marquent beaucoup plus de points que toi) sur les niveaux les plus difficiles.

Au fait, si vous voulez jouer (et boire) dans un bar, nous avons un niveau spécial pour ça, qui risque d’impliquer le barman et les tables voisines… :D

Attention ! Nous suggérons de ne pas jouer à Chopine au cinéma, ni dans la salle d’attente de votre dentiste. Préférez plutôt l’apéro entre potes, ou les soirées où l’alcool peut couler à profusion :D

L'abus d'alcool est dangereux pour la santé. Consommez avec modération.

title: Blood Alcohol Calculator
description: Blood Alcohol Calculator is a rough estimate of how much alcohol you have in your body. User enters information about gender, weight (kg), volume (ml) and the percentage of alcohol, the elapsed time (h). This application is only an estimate. Many other factors (for example, your body type, age, etc.) can affect the blood alcohol concentration. As a result you get a ppm of alcohol in the blood, a condition of your body and the approximate time of alcohol elimination

title: Alcohol Unit Calculator: Ad Free
description:
Alcohol unit calculator allows you to calculate and record the units in your drink with ease. You can set a weekly alcohol unit target and the units for the day and week are totalled, to easily see how you are doing. 

A message will appear if you exceed your weekly target and the daily/weekly totals are reset automatically at the end of each day/week. 

There are a number of pre-selected standard quantities for each drink, but you now have an option to enter any quantity and calculate the units.

You can track the amount of money you are spending on drinks as well as the total amount of units for the day and week.

If you have any additional features you would like to see added, let me know and I will try to add them in.

description:
Explore a fascinating world of bartending in a new way. Learn what ingredients you need and how to mix your favorite manhattans, sours, mojitos, and thousands of other cocktails.

Features include:

- 1000+ recipes updated monthly
- Step-by-step guides to mixing cocktails
- Handpicked cocktail collections: Classic Cocktails, Daiquiris, Lemonades and many more
- Search cocktails by ingredients, alcohol volume, taste, or glass type
- Add the ingredients you have in your bar. Explore cocktail recipes you can make with them. See the ingredients that you are missing to make more cocktails
- Save favorite cocktails to your account, so you never lose your picks

Missing your favorite recipe or have a feedback or suggestion? Reach us at makeitjigger@gmail.com

title: My Limit
description:
Never Drink & Drive!  Use My Limit to easily track your Blood Alcohol Content (BAC) in real-time & see your alcohol use over time. 

• Find your BAC level in seconds!
• Based on NHTSA highway safety guidelines
• No hardware required!
• Real-time countdown timers
• Choose any drink, any size!
• Set custom BAC limits!
• Simple drink counters and history
• Easy to use interface!
• Free, Free & Free!

Track your Blood Alcohol Content (BAC) in real-time with My Limit and be sure to Never Drink and Drive!  For more information, please visit My-Limit.com.


***************************************************

Note: My Limit is intended for entertainment purposes only and should not be relied upon to determine a person’s level of intoxication due to the consumption of alcohol or a person’s ability to safely or legally operate any type of machinery, equipment, or vehicles.

recentChanges:
Fixed an issue where the User Agreement "Agree" button was off screen on some devices.
Fixed an issue where the user's weight font size was too big in some cases.
comments: It's interesting - though has a strange algorithm for estimating BAC - if I have a double IPA, 11%, right now, it estimated the BAC at 0.05, and that becomes 0.034 after an hour. If I then add a second beer, it treats it as if my body didn't metabolize any of the first and estimated my BAC at 0.1 - which is fine, because it's just a spot check and not a breathalyzer or anything - and it's better to estimate high. It's not bad.

I will update it to 4 stars based on the response from the developer, and possibly update it to 5 stars after the next time I get to use it for it's intended purpose. The fact that you can enter custom drinks, which I didn't see on my first use, is definitely a plus!

Works well. One suggestion, if I'm out drinking and I order a mixed drink, it's usually done by 1 ounce mix ratios. I have not a clue how many ml that would be. Sure I could look it up, but the likelihood of me actually doing so after 2 drinks is pretty minimal.
Perhaps useful if used immediately, but there is no way to add data to a specific date or time that is not "right now", e.g. what I had a hour ago, or what I plan to have in 30 minutes.
Would be much more useful if you could add drinks at the end of your drinking and see your BAC rather than only being able to add as you go. Or being able to add previous drinks and times.

title: Alco Calculator Calendar
description:
The app will help you to stop drinking or drink less if you are social drinker, trying to quit abusing alcohol or fairly easy for those who want to keep statistics on the consumption of alcohol. Easily keep track of daily intake of alcohol and to create a powerful new habit not to drink alcohol, and to be sober and not drinking every weekend. It is also very useful for people following the step by step program of Alcoholics Anonymous. The app includes a powerful counter sobriety drunk displays statistics for the selected period and the amount of money, with a choice of currency spent on alcohol for the display period.
Application features:
- Choose the period during which you do not drink
- Counter "sober" days
- Graphically (using different colors) indicates the status of "dry" days during this month

title: Moonshine Plus!
descriptionHTML:
The calculator supports Arduino automation, calculates:
- Grain mash with saccharification of congestion by microbiological enzymes;
- Fruit, sugar and congestion of their concentrates/molasses;
- Measurement of wort: Calculation of residual Sugar content, Alcohol content and Percentage of fermentation: °Brix, °Plato, SG, %Sugar;
- Fractional distillation according to Gabriel's method;
- Selection of "Heads";
- Rate of fluid intake (flow rate);
- Temperature of the mixture of liquids;
- Calibration of the thermometer;
- Automatically corrects the correction of the atmospheric pressure coefficient at the current moment;
- Weighed enzymes depending on the given activity;
- Correction of distillate strength by temperature;
- Alcoholicity of the mixture by weight and volume;
- Current alcohol content in the cube and at the outlet of the distiller, as well as the current alcoholicity in the alemic, adjusted for atmospheric pressure;
- Mixing and diluting alcohol solutions with regard to contraction, with the possibility of calculating both volume and mass;
- Dilution of alcohol solutions with regard to contraction, adjusted for temperature;
- Determination of strength by mass and volume;
- Content of absolute alcohol (AC) in fractions;
- Sugar mash for a given number of ingredients, volume and alcoholicity, as well as a hydromodule;
- Minimal amount of fertilizing, inverting sugar and a sample of fractional sugar;
- Conducts a laboratory log of fractional distillation with the calculation of the necessary parameters and the possibility of saving the results to a file.
summary: Advanced calculator for home preparation of drinks.

title: Blood Alcohol Content Calc
description:
We are at a party or celebration and we need to make our consumption of alcohol subject to the need to leave by car. This application calculates the approximate blood alcohol content according to how we drink. First you need to set the gender and weight. Then just after drinking, we add a drink and the application calculates the current blood alcohol content and the estimated time of sobriety. It continuously updates this data so that the sobriety process can be monitored at any time.

Please note that the numbers are approximate and neither the author nor the operator of the application is responsible for its use and the consequences thereof in practice.

title: drnkApp - alcohol calculator
description:
drnkApp is BAC (bloood alcohol content) calculator / featuring a lean and sleek interface. This allows you to enter a drink in just a few seconds so you can focus on what is happening in the real world. 

Track your consumption over time or visualize your night out with the guys! And learn some fun (or not so fun) facts about alcohol and drinking along the way.

Our goal is for you to have a good time while also increasing your awareness for how drnk you actually are.

Please drink responsibly! Don't drink and drive! Do have fun!

Features:
- blood alcohol tracking over time
- chart that visualizes blood alcohol content (access by rotating your phone)
- easy as can be drink entering

### UPDATE ###

Due to the new EU GDPR (General Data Protection Regulation) we have decided to switch off our servers and delete all user data. You can continue using drnkApp in offline mode.

comments: Out of several BAC apps, this is the ONLY one that actually worked, allowing weight.and amount and most importantly showing time to sobriety. Several other apps I tried wouldn't show time.

Despite description, allows for only one profile at a time. Fine if your drinking alone, but drinking is many times a social activity, so more than one profile would make the app more functional.  --  12hr time format is non-functional: No matter how many times I adjust the settings the time to sober is never changed to 12hr format. Always remains on 24hr even though my device is currently is set to 12hr. Samsung note 3, android 4.3. Uninstalled. Try "ALCulator Free" works with multiple profiles.

I'm on a Moto G4 with Android 6.0.1. things seemed to work before I connected my phone to the cloud, but as soon as I did any time my screen locked it would remove my drinks. I'll check back if you guys respond. Thanks. Good looking app!
It says I am male when I put female
The app works rather well accept for one thing.  The  height and weight always sets to 5'11" and 165 lbs, even after repeated changes to the settings.

title: Maîtriser votre consommation d’alcool
description:
Maîtriser sa consommation d’alcool c’est se protéger soi-même mais aussi les autres !

Aujourd’hui plus de 5 millions de français sont dépendants à l’alcool mais seulement 5% d’entre eux bénéficie d’une prise en charge médicale et psychologique et social.
Avec l’app Oz Ensemble, apprenez à maîtriser votre consommation d’alcool :
✔ Auto-évaluer votre consommation 
✔ Détecter un comportement à risque
✔ Suivre régulièrement votre consommation d’alcool
✔ Échanger gratuitement avec un professionnel de l’addiction

Gratuite et anonyme, l’app Oz Ensemble est un service public développé par l’ARS Ile-de-France et par l’association CaPASSCite avec le soutien de l’ARS et de la Fabrique numérique des Ministères Sociaux.

Vous pouvez paramétrer des rappels, afin de faciliter votre parcours et vous aider dans votre suivi de consommation.
Cette application est une version bêta, en cours d'amélioration avec vos retours utilisateurs et vos attentes. Si vous souhaitez vous impliquer dans cette démarche d'amélioration ou de développement, n'hésitez pas à nous contacter.

Retrouvez nous sur www.ozensemble.fr

title: Alcohol Party Calculator
description:
Need to know what bottle of booze has the most amount of alcohol in it for the cheapest price?

How about the amount of alcohol that you will need for a party?

You can calculate both with this app!

The cost volume analysis portion of the app will accept a volume (metric or English units), a proof (0-200), and a price (currency does not matter). It will then tell you the cost per unit of pure alcohol. For example, a 750ml bottle of 80 proof for $10 will cost 3.3 cents per ml of pure ethanol. Likewise, a 64oz bottle of 90 proof for 15 euros would cost .52 euros per ounce of pure ethanol.

The party estimator portion of the app will tell you how much alcohol you need for a party. Just fill out all of the input boxes and use the slider to move the average BAC (how drunk you want people to get) to whatever you desire. Please be aware that this is an average and that each person is responsible for the amount they consume (some people may drink more than others). This will give you an ESTIMATE of the alcohol required based on the algorithm for determining BAC. The output is in liters because most liquor is bottled in .75 or 1.75 L containers. 

This app is available to everybody for educational/recreational use. Please follow all applicable drinking laws.

Support and a link to the source code can be found at the website in the contact details section. GNU GPL 3.0

Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/alcoholpartycalculator?ref=notif&notif_t=page_new_likes

title: Craft Beer – Calculator
description:
Application to perform calculations related to the cooking and brewing of craft beer.

The application currently has 5 modules divided into 2 sections, elaboration and measurement, to facilitate the calculations in the production of Craft Beer


1 - Apparent Alcohol Calculation / Attenuation:
- Alcohol: By entering the original gravity and the final gravity, the alcohol grade that the beer will have is obtained.
- Attenuation: The attenuation reflects the reduction of wort density, as a result of fermentation. It will also be calculated starting from the original gravity and final gravity.

Variables:
- Original Gravity
- Final Gravity

Calculation:
- Alcohol
- Attenuation

2 - Calculation of IBU - Tinseth Method
IBU - International Bitterness Unit (International Bitterness Unit) is a number that denotes the bitter tenor characteristic of beer. The larger the IBU, the more bitter the beer will be. The responsible of this argregory is the hop that in addition to bitter tenor can deliver flavors and aromas.

Variables:
- Gravity of the lot
- Lot volume (in liters)
- Alpha-acid content of hops
- Amount of hops and if this is in FLOWER or PELLET
- Cooking time (in minutes)

Calculation:
- IBU
- Total IBUs

3 - Correction of Gravity (by Temperature):
Many of the calculations needed to cook craft beer come off gravity. The gravity varies depending on the temperature, for this reason to make more accurate measurements it is necessary to adjust the results.

Variables:
- Temperature
- Calibration of the hydrometer
- Measured gravity.

Calculation:
- Corrected gravity

4 - Carbonation with CO2
When the coldest beer is, the more CO2 will dissolve inside it, being less outside the beer, in the empty space of the barrel.

Variables:
- Beer temperature
- Expected volume of CO2.

Calculation:
- Pressure in bars

5 - Converter Brix / Gravity:
The Brix degrees are a unit of quantity (symbol ° Bx) and they serve to determine the total ratio of dry matter (usually sugars) dissolved in a liquid. They are quantified with a refractometer. Through this formula the result in Brix degrees are converted to specific gravity. Brix degrees can also be obtained starting from gravity. This calculation is constantly used in the production of craft beer.

Variables:
- º Brix
- Gravity

Calculation:
- º Brix / Gravity

The elaboration of a craft beer, is born from the idea of creating something on a smaller scale and in a "manual" way, in order to preserve the maximum control over the elaboration and ensuring a final product of higher quality. The objective of this App is to provide the brewer with the necessary calculations for the elaboration of his beer and give him tools so that he can have control over the flavors and characteristics in the production of his craft beers.

Any improvement or suggestion will be welcome.
Enjoy a good craft beer!

Craft Beer - www.astun.com.ar

title: Cocktails & Drinks Guide Best Recipes by Bartender
description:
Cocktails & Drinks Recipes by Bartender is a FREE app with which you can prepare the most popular cocktails at home. All you need is alcohol, several ingredients, and our app... and GO! 

Cocktails & Drinks Recipes by Bartender contains recipes for such many popular cocktails, such as Old Fashioned, Margarita, Cosmopolitan, Negroni, Moscow Mule, Mojito, Whiskey Sour, Manhattan, Gimlet, Sazerac, Paloma, Sidecar, Mint Julep, French 75, Martini, Daiquiri, Martinez and many-many-many others.

☆ FEATURES ☆

✓ Recipes. Recipes of the best cocktails in the world with the necessary ingredients and a complete description of the cooking process.

✓ Party Planner. The Master which helps in calculating the number of necessary ingredients for the preparation of selected cocktails and party organization.

✓ My Bar. The Tool that allows you to keep a record of alcoholic beverages in the home bar.

✓ Information Reference section which contains information about alcoholic beverages and accessories used for the preparation of cocktails.

✓ Searching cocktails by various criteria - name, type, main alcoholic beverage

Install our app and organize bright and unforgettable parties for friends!

title: Drinks:Ration: Feel better by drinking less
description:
Please note, Drinks:Ration is currently undergoing a closed trial period. Only users with a token are able to sign up to use the app. 

Do you currently, or have you served in the Armed Forces? Is it time to feel better and save money by drinking less alcohol, if so, Drinks:Ration can help. Drinks:Ration allows you to keep track of the units and calories in your drinks, set goals and provide feedback on how you drink compared to others. 

With Drinks:Ration, you can: 

- Track the units and calories in your drinks 
- Learn more about the health benefits of cutting down
- See how you compare to others
- Set goals to support you in drinking less alcohol
- Feel supported with regular and personalised feedback via text message and notifications
- Visualise your drinking behaviours and identify difficult periods
- Support research by allowing access to Google Fit data.

Drinks:Ration has been developed by the King’s Centre for Military Health Research with support from the British Armed Forces, University of Liverpool, Combat Stress and the veteran community. By using this app you’ll be helping us understand the drinking behaviours of the Armed Forces Community and enabling us to help those in need.

Drinks:Ration has been funded by the Medical Research Council and the Forces in Mind Trust.

title: Alcohol Addiction Self  Test
description:
It is a comprehensive tool to self assess your addiction to alcohol. 

This App has the following features;

• A comprehensive tool to assess your addiction to alcohol.
• In App 10 questions will be asked.
• At end it will provide you a score and description about your alcohol drinking habit. 
• Its easy to use and navigate.
• Useful for general public  to get information and evaluate themselves for alcohol addiction.

Therefore, join us by using this App to improve your health and safety. Keep in your mind, this is only a tool. Consult with your healthcare provider about your health plan. Keep in your mind that prevention is always cheaper than the treatment.

Patient Data Science, LLC

title: Breathalyzer
description:
A form to enter user information (name, age, sex, height, weight, corpulence) to optimize the calculation of the alcohol absorption curve. Several profiles can be created.
- A step-by-step guideline on how to measure your blood alcohol concentration by exhaling into the breathalyzer:
1. Connect the smartphone to the device via Bluetooth®,
2. Initialization and preheating of the breathalyzer,
3. Measurement of the driver’s BAC,
4. Calculation and transmission of the result to the mobile terminal via Bluetooth®,
5. Display of the driver’s BAC result on the mobile terminal accordingly to the legal alcohol limits of the county they are currently in,
6. Alcohol elimination curve evolution follow-up,
7. If the driver’s blood alcohol level exceeds the legal limit, the application offers a 24/7 drive-you-home service to pick the driver up at the very location from which the request was issued.

title: TSM Drink Log
description:
How can you "drink responsibly" if you don't know how much alcohol you are really drinking? 

Warnings about harmful alcohol use typically use “standard units.” That can be confusing to most people, who are not going to take the time to convert alcohol by volume (ABV%) and ounces or milliliters into these standard units. Track your drinks with the TSM Drink Log and let the app calculate that for you.

Create Drinks

Whether you're a beer, wine, or liquor drinker, you can add your drink to your own custom list and save it for easy entry later on. Add a name, the ABV%, and create different sizes in oz or ml. The TSM Drink Log will convert the information to standard drinks (sd) based on your geographic area. 

Medication Tracking and Reminders

If you are using the TSM Drink Log with the Sinclair Method, you can log your medication time with one touch and edit the quantity if your doctor has recommended taking less than a full dose. Logging medication sets an alarm for the minimum wait time - the built-in timer is set for 60 minutes if you have been prescribed naltrexone and 120 minutes if you have been prescribed nalmefene. (Prescription medication should only be obtained through your doctor according to all local and Federal laws. Follow your doctor's instructions for any medication use.) 

Chart Alcohol Reduction Progress

Logged drinks automatically update your drink reduction chart. If you are on TSM and would like to see your overall reduction for treatment, input your "pre-TSM" drinks/week average in the Settings for "Week 0." This chart makes it easy to show your medical provider your progress during follow-up appointments.

Connect to Peer Support

Easily access the Options Saves Lives moderated peer support forum, a community with more than 1,500 members around the world.

recentChanges: Updated Privacy Policy
comments: I got rid of this app because you have to log in on real time basis.you can't go back a day after and log in your drink and nal.for people who drink you have to wait until your done drinking to log in .or most log on the day after drinking. It also has trouble opening.so not very helpful in what it was designed to do.i hope developers of this app can figure out how to improve the app.
The amount of data that can be added is great and the graph is very useful but it did take a while to get the hang of how to enter everything

I took nexlrexone almost a year and was wondering why I hadn't reached extinction. I downloaded the app and 6 months later extinction. I realized that i must have been drinking before the time limit.. This drink log helped me not fudge the time between taking naltrexone and drink. Thanks to the C3 foundation for creating this app. I like to go look back at the log to see where I came from. It had been about 2 years since extinction.
Wish this app was better executed. It's very basic, and not user friendly. Wish there was a manual way to input the pill reminders. Also would be nice if you could see your progress on a calendar.

The app works well and is reliable. The chart provides a good summary of your drink history and you can easily scroll back through the log to look at previous days. It could just do with a few more features.

title: AppsRhino Alcohol Store
description:
Shop online for the biggest selection of Beer, Whiskey, Vodka, Wine, Rum & many more. 
Compare prices instead of being locked into one non-negotiable cost. Pick and choose exactly what you want and get your drinks delivered or skip the line with in-store pickup.

FASTEST ALCOHOL DELIVERY IN TOWN
Our team works tirelessly to make sure your favorite drink can be in your hands within an hour. Because, that's how drink delivery should work, right?

DELIVERY ANYWHERE
We’ll deliver to your apartment, house, office, the beach, the park, the birthday party, even your wedding reception (yes, we have done weddings!)—wherever you need us. 

NO DELIVERY FEES
Honestly, we hate them as much as you do. That's why we have made delivery charges FREE. 

NO ORDER MINIMUMS
Sometimes you just want a six pack of beer or bottle of wine, we get it. We won't peer pressure you, that's a party foul. 

REAL-TIME TRACKING
Keep tabs on your delivery progress on a live map.

Easy Payment
Conveniently pay with your credit card in the app and show ID upon delivery or pickup.

Top Shelf Service
Our outstanding customer support team is always ready to help out if you run into any issues.

title: Labox Alcoholometry, Wines and Spirits
description:
For Wines and Spirits professionals: Alcohol and volume conversions, Alcohol ullaging, Reduction or Raising the alcohol level
 
Developed by EC Consulting: LABOX® offers ergonomic "Boxettes", unique in the world, to make your calculations and conversions more reliable.
Alcohol and volume conversions as a function of temperature follow the International Legal Metrology Recommendation (OIML) R22 of 1975.
EC Consulting has published works about these Alcohol Tables to be discovered in the application.
Calculations of volume in a barrel are based on the mathematical model used in the Triple Census Book of Mr PRUVOST-LE-GUAY.
Calculations for raising or reducing the alcohol level take into account the contraction factor inherent in hydroalcoholic mixtures.
EC Consulting is a company created in 2010 by an expert in Quality Control of Wines and Spirits production. It is part of a community of Experts in this field.

title: Standard Drinks
description:
How many 'standard drinks' are in that drink? Let's work it out!

People across the world have a different way of measuring an alcoholic drink. When shopping for alcohol, especially overseas, it can be difficult to quickly work out what is actually in a drink

This can be a problem when looking for the best value purchase too

The easy-to-use calculator screen lets you calculate how much alcohol is in any quantity, size, and strength package of alcoholic beverages. If necessary it will also work out the 'price per standard' and 'price per drink'

The Favourites feature allows you to store your calculations for future use. Perhaps you encounter a different quantity or price of the same drink? You can also organize by price, price per litre, price per standard, or total standards for easy comparison with other drinks

Different units of measurement are supported. Currently millilitres, centilitres, litres, and US ounces

description:
Alcovisor®’s professional models has been adopted by law enforcement agencies,  medical and education facilities, transportation agencies and DOT (Department of Transport) workplaces; while our personal models which enable health concerning individuals to check their own alcohol blood contents with professional grade fuel cell sensor after alcohol consumption.

-	Alcovisor Elite could pair up with Alcovisor Alcohol Tester
-	Start test as instructed on the smartphone screen, blow through the installed mouthpiece, then BAC (blood alcohol content) value will be displayed in a second.*

-	Mouthpiece is detachable for personal hygiene. 
-	BAC test data is logged and plotted as a graph. Sequential tests over time allow users picture how their body react to alcohol after consumption. 

Remarks
*for detailed using instruction please refer to individual user manual.

title: MyDéfi - Réduisez votre consommation d'alcool
description:
L’application MyDéfi offre une aide personnalisée et anonyme aux personnes qui souhaitent diminuer leur consommation d’alcool. Pendant 12 semaines, MyDéfi vous accompagne comme un coach personnalisé, il calcule votre consommation journalière et l’analyse, vous informe sur votre état de santé et vous apporte des conseils personnalisés en fonction de votre consommation d’alcool.

Le programme de MyDéfi s’inspire de consultations réelles en alcoologie. L’application s’appuie sur des techniques de soins validées scientifiquement, basées sur des méthodes motivationnelles, thérapies comportementales, l’utilisation d’un journal de consommation, le suivi régulier et les informations ciblées. 


LES FONCTIONNALITÉS DE MYDÉFI

- Carnet de consommation d’alcool : Chaque jour, renseignez votre consommation journalière d’alcool ;
- Graphiques : Analyser l’évolution de la courbe de votre consommation, depuis le début de votre inscription ;
- Conseils personnalisés : Recevez des conseils personnalisés en fonction de votre consommation d’alcool ;
- Un soutien quotidien : MyDéfi vous soutient quotidiennement pour vous aider à reprendre le contrôle de votre vie ; 
- Pistes de réflexion : MyDéfi vous aide à mieux discerner le lien entre la consommation d’alcool et les effets négatifs qu’elle entraine, et inversement, le lien entre la diminution de consommation et l’amélioration de nombreux facteurs.


POURQUOI UTILISER MYDÉFI ?

La consommation excessive d’alcool est responsable de nombreuses complications, physiques, psychologiques et sociales. L’arrêt total de consommation est parfois indiqué, mais n’est ni nécessaire ni souhaitée pour tous les consommateurs. Une diminution de consommation permet de réduire les risques de complications ainsi que les effets négatifs liés à la consommation excessive. MyDéfi vous accompagne dans cette démarche qui vous permettra de reprendre le contrôle de votre vie.


COMMENT UTILISER MYDÉFI ?

MyDefi peut être utilisé indépendamment ou en association à une prise en charge médicale. Votre seule tâche sera de renseigner, chaque jour, la consommation d’alcool de la veille. Des messages personnalisés et des conseils divers vous seront donnés. 
Appropriez-vous ces messages et ces pistes de réflexion, et adaptez-les à vos besoins pour pouvoir avancer.
Si vous êtes suivi par un médecin, vous pourrez lui montrer l’évolution de votre consommation via MyDefi.

title: Drinks App : Free beverage and cocktail recipes
description:
This drinks app offers information on fantastic cocktail recipes, both alcoholic and non-alcoholic. With this app for drink and cocktail recipes, you can discover both popular cocktail recipes (such as Mojito, Manhattan, Whiskey Sour) and some unusual but very delicious cocktail recipes. There are 4 main sections in this beverage app

1. Home

In this drink and cocktail recipes app, you can view the most popular, latest and random cocktail recipes with following cocktail categories.

1. Ordinary Drink
2. Cocktail
3. Milk/Float/Shake
4. Other/Unknown
5. Cocoa
6. Shot
7. Coffee/Tea
8. Homemade Liqueur 
9. Punch/Party Drink	
10. Beer
11. Soft Drink/Soda
12. Alcoholic
13. Non - Alcoholic
14. Optional - Alcoholic

 Under this section you can see 3 types of drinks and coktail recipes

1. Alcoholic drinks recipes
2. Non-Alcoholic drinks recipes
3. Optional Alcoholic drinks recipes

In drinks app you can search for drinks recipes by its name and notice how to prepare this drinks and what the ingredients are with images for the selected drink.

In the drinks app you can search Ingredients by its name and notice the description about the selected ingredients. Also you can see which drinks (alcoholic cocktails and optional alcoholic cocktails recipes or non-alcoholic mocktails recipes) can be made using the selected ingredients.

4. Favourite

As of the version 2.0.2 , you can save your favourite cocktails , mocktail or drinks recipes and ingredients in the favourite section.

title: ABC of Alcohol, 5th Edition
description:
This Wiley - Blackwell app-book,ABC of Alcohol, 5th Edition, is developed by MedHand Mobile Libraries. Improve your performance with relevant, valid material which is accessed quickly and with minimal effort in the palm of your hand using Medhands patented technology.

Functions include: 

•	A powerful search 
•	Bookmarks, History and Highlighting  
•	Complete set of medical calculators; Body Mass Index, Peak Expiratory Flows, Dehydration Correction Calculator and more 
•	Notes and picture notes

The misuse of alcohol presents both individual physical and psychological problems as well as wider social consequences. Alcohol misuse is a frequent cause of attendance in accident and emergency departments and an underlying factor in a range of long term and chronic conditions commonly treated and managed within primary care settings.

This expanded fifth edition includes new chapters on alcohol and the young person, alcohol related liver disease, neurological problems, alcohol and the older person, alcohol and cancer, and the alcohol nurse specialist. There is also improved coverage of the role of alcohol health workers, and guidance on the availability of voluntary alcohol services more generally, and the concluding resources chapter provides further guidance on how to access appropriate services. It incorporates current NICE guidelines, the Government’s Alcohol Strategy 2012, as well as case study scenarios and examples of best practice throughout.

From a new editor and a multidisciplinary contributor team, ABC of Alcohol is a practical guide for general practitioners, family physicians, practice nurses, primary healthcare professionals as well as for junior doctors, medical and nursing students.


Authors:Anne McCune (Editor) 

Publisher: Wiley – Blackwell 


________________________________________ 

Medhand Mobile Libraries offers a SUBSCRIPTION FREE application without edition upgrade. Offering most trusted and well recognized medical guidelines provided by excellent publishers like Wiley Oxford University Press, McGraw-Hill, Pharmaceutical Press, Elsevier and more.

title: Alcohol Test-DrinkSafely
description:
DrinkSafely uses an algorithm that calculates the alcohol content in your body through information such as gender, weight and quantity. In this way
results are obtained that are close to reality, but in any case they are only a prediction and should not be considered 100% legal.
Drive only if you are sober, and if you really must, DRINKSAFELY. This is why the app offers services like:
"Call your friend" to get you to pick up or drive in your place, after all the friends are seen in time of need!
 "Taxi nearby" if your friend can not come, look for the nearest taxi and get directly into bed.
 "Restaurant nearby" if you have to drink, it's better with a full stomach.
 "Bar nearby": you do not know where to go? Do you have to drive? Use this feature and maps you will find a nearby bar, also with the use of the app you will already know how much to drink to not exceed the limit.

Thanks to the icons on the site https://icons8.it/

title: Cocktail Recipes
description:
You want to have a party and don't know what drinks to please the guests? These functional and the best app is for you. We offer you non-alcoholic and alcoholic cocktails with history of origin of beverages. Collection include drink recipe categories such as list and types of cocktails, primary alcohol by volume (drinks with similar ingredients), standard drinkware and favorites recipe. Each liquor contains information about detailed description of preparation. You can choose a lot of ingredients for your best cocktail and mix them. For example you have some alcohol, some fruits and  beverages and wonder what cocktails you can make? We show you a list of all popular cocktails you can enjoy and offer to your family or friends.

Many barman prepare drinks very unusual cooking methods, but the most famous cocktails still remain: B52, Long Island, Bloody Marys,  Cosmopolitan and Tequila Sunrise. All you need to ask yourself what you want : alcohol cocktail or shots (shooters), hot drink or martinis. Or maybe you like non-alcoholic punches?
Also you can choose a children's drink without adding alcohol with juice and soda or the usual best milkshake recipes. 

Features:

- See how many cocktails are available with particular ingredient
- Build your own simple recipe database by gathering recipes in one app
- Top 100 Cocktails list
- Cocktail packages (Mojito, IBA recipe Cocktails)
- Learn bartending techniques and terminology 
- Popular alphabetical cocktails list
- Search engine (search by name, ingredients, alcohol volume, method)
- Mix up the ingredients in this fun cooking game
- Learn how to cook tasty drink & food (cook book)
 
 Dear friend, if you cant find a cocktail you love, tell us! We will update our cocktail database special for you!

title: Am I Drunk - Drink Counter
description:
Enter your drinks (as you drink them) and this app will calculate your Estimated Blood Alcohol Content, helping you to have a safe night out.

- Constantly re-calculates your BAC as you sober up.
- Drinks are saved even if the app closes or phone restarts.
- Can add custom drinks as required.
- Adjusts BAC to allow for your gender and weight.
- Supports multiple countries for local 'standard drink' sizes and driving limits.
- All of your data stays on the device; no internet or account required.

title: SHALLi alcohol
description:
Feeling tough to make decision which alcoholic drink is appropriate for you now? Try our yet another Heads OR Tails application and make your decision easy.

This application uses your phone's sensors when you hold your phone and from their recorded signal, which is actually influenced by your momentary body reaction, it tries to determine whether given alcoholic drink is appropriate for you. This application tries to be more clever then simple random coin toss.

How does SHALLi alcohol works?

In order to determine whether the given alcoholic drink is appropriate for you or not you only need to hold your phone in certain position while concentrating on given alcoholic drink/object. Based on obtained sensors‘ signal application then evaluates the most likely influence of given object on you at given moment.

THE RESULT OF MEASUREMENT:
The measurement result can be seen on the user´s display immediately after the measurement is completed. The results are displayed in green, gray or red color depending on the effect that the measured object has on your body. 

⚫ Green/positive: It means that the measured object has been evaluated as suitable for you at given moment. 

⚫ Grey/neutral: It means that the measured object has no influence on you but is definitely not suitable for you. Such a result is considered rather negative.

⚫ Red/negative: It means that the measured object has been evaluated as not suitable for you at given moment.

Notice: Keep in mind that this application does not guarantee accuracy of displayed results under all circumstances.

title: Vivino: Buy the Right Wine
description:
With 42 million users, Vivino is the world’s largest wine community and the ultimate destination for discovering and buying wines. 

HOW IT WORKS
• Scan: Take a photo of any wine label or restaurant wine list or search by wine
• Learn: Instantly see detailed information about the wine and all available purchasing options
• Review: Community powered wine ratings, reviews, average price, food pairings and more provided on every wine
• Buy: To purchase, tap the green buy button and have it shipped to your door - always buy the right wine
• Rate: Add your own ratings and reviews to build your wine profile and enhance your personalized recommendations
• Track: Easily keep track of wines you have tried, including personal rating, notes and date consumed
• Store: Free cellar tracking to always know what wine you have on hand in your collection

STATS
• 42 million users 
• World’s largest wine library with 11.9 million wines
• 2 million wines viewed daily on average
• 1 billion wine labels scanned to date
• 220,000 wineries featured

KEY FEATURES
•  Wine Buying Made Easy: Vivino is the ultimate online destination for all your wine buying needs - the largest wine selection, personalized wine recommendations, free shipping options and honest community ratings and review. 
• Crowdsourced Ratings & Reviews: Leverage reviews and ratings from the world’s largest community of wine drinkers to always select the best wine. 
•  Restaurant Wine List Scanner: Always select the best wine from any restaurant wine list menu.
•  Quick Compare: Pick the best wine right at the shelf by scanning multiple wine labels to instantly view ratings, region, price and food pairings all on one page.
•  Taste Profile: Track and organize your scanned and rated wines to determine your personal taste profile, discover new wines and see how you rank against friends and the Vivino community.

recentChanges:
For every moment, we help you discover the perfect wine. In this update:
— Introducing Taste Profile — a better way to find the right wine for you. Easily set your preferences including grape, region, style and more. Quickly see what wines you've liked (or disliked) and we'll help you discover new ones. Try it now by tapping on your photo in the profile section!

Contact our customer support team at vivino.com/​support or select "Help and Support" from the Vivino app (under Profile > Settings).
comments: I really have nothing else to say. The app is a lost cause. I made a point many years ago when the app was first launched about the app kept messing up the syncing process between the quantity or record of a wine entry with the record at the database server. This problem was never fixed! Today I found the same error with the quantity of a wine I have just couple days ago, and I found the quantity of the wine was unchanged. Can u trust a tech company can't even get its database syncing right?

This should allow two ratings. For looking up wines and getting descriptions and reviews, this app is great. You can even take a photo of the label and most of the time it'll find it. This has kept me away from accidentally buying sweet wines (not my gig). Love it for this use. Then I used Vivino for ordering wine - I have done it twice. Once the order was placed and weeks later it didn't ship. No notice why or if it would be shipped. Cancelled that. Later I tried again, ordering a case of one of my go-to wines from a different sub-retailer in Vivino. The order was shipped in a very reasonable time this order, but upon opening it they had substituted for the entire case with a different wine. No warning, just did it. Were it one bottle, I would be (only) ok with this, but for a case, without warning, this is unacceptable. The thing that has ended my ordering on Vivino is that, having had this happen, I can't get Vivino to even answer an email or respond to the 'contact' tab on their site. I frankly don't know if anyone works there anymore, certainly nobody is manning the email address or contact input. I have reached out both ways for the third time today and will be calling the credit card to have the charges reversed.

Why only 4 stars?! The application is good, pretty sure I'll use it for several times, but the 1st thing I noticed, that the tutorial after the "see how it works" button is completely unreadable (at least for me it is..). Light brownish background with small grey text. Please take into consideration to change it. :)
Love it and recommend it often. It's a great way to broaden your palette. I've tried so many new wines based on a decent rating and generally been happy I did. Also helped me to avoid a few bad ones.

Used to be a good app, but now it's just annoying when it takes over your screen to install a non-existent update, that usually comes along a week after the first red screen appears. Suggestions to remove the annoyance have gone unheard (contacted via the app)
